name: WetBrush Go Green Detangler - Lavender WetBrush Go Green Detangler - Lavender
description: An innovation in hair care, the eco-friendly Go Green Detangler has totally transformed our locks (and lives)! Detangling in mere minutes, this (let’s be honest, fairly ordinary looking) comb is the secret to happy hair, healthy scalp, and no more mornings spent wrestling (crying) over that nape-of-the-neck dread that’s developed… Lightweight and easy to wield, the Go Green Detangler seamlessly separates all knots and tats without compromising precious strands. This is all due to the revolutionary ‘Intelliflex’ technology; the thin, strong yet super flexible bristles have brains – yielding or unbending as required – to glide through tangles with next-to-no tugging, tearing or tress distress. What’s more, the ball-tip bristles are perfect for gently stimulating circulation near the scalp, to better feed your follicles and encourage new growth. But wait, it gets better – when you’re ready to replace your brush, you’ll be happy to know that it will naturally biodegrade within five years!

name: Amika The Kure Multi-Task Repair Treatment Amika The Kure Multi-Task Repair Treatment
description: The brainchild of a collective of creatives, hairstylists, chemists and formula enthusiasts, amika's mantra is 'all hair is welcome'. Centred around dry, damaged tresses, The Kure Multi-Repair Treatment is a fast-acting rinse-out mask that also doubles as a leave-in treatment; the ultimate form of damage control, it works to strengthen your strands and repair damage in a mere 60 seconds! Think: freshly trimmed ends in a treatment. (We can dream...) Clinically proven to repair and strengthen the damage caused by everyday stressors, heat and chemical treatments (compared to control after three uses), this bond repair treatment is a hair necessity for depleted strands. Packed with bond cure technology, it targets the most abundant bonds in your hair, which break the most frequently during daily wear and tear. What's more, it is infused with plant butters (think: mango butter extract, borage oil and shea butter) and vegan proteins to lend the formula an abundance of conditioning omega fatty acids, vitamins and minerals. Your strands will thank you for it! Committed to creating formulas that fit your values, all amika products are cruelty-free, held in 100% recyclable packaging and made with 90%+ post-consumer recycled plastics to reduce virgin plastic production.
how_to_use: Fine hair types: after using the kure bond repair shampoo and conditioner, apply multi-task repair hair treatment from roots to ends. leave on for at least 1 minute and rinse. Coarse hair types: after using the kure bond repair shampoo, apply multi-task repair hair treatment from roots to ends. leave on for at least 1 minute and rinse. follow with kure bond repair conditioner. Pro tip: for stronger results, can be used as a leave in treatment. Next, apply a dime-sized amount of the closer to hair, mid lengths to ends, prior to any additional styling products. focus on damaged ends. add more as needed. For best results, use multi-task 1-2x per week with the entire kure system

name: BLEACH LONDON The Big Pink Super Cool Colour 150ml BLEACH LONDON The Big Pink Super Cool Colour 150ml
description: Ensure that your mane is anything but run-of-the-mill (without the colour commitment) with BLEACH London’s Super Cool Colour, a non-permanent hair colour cream mask that transforms bleached and toned tresses. In just 30 minutes, this rich, luscious mask can reveal a rainbow of bold, chic shades. From beautifully bright ‘The Big Pink’ to perfect pastels ‘Awkward Peach’ and ‘Blullini’, to brilliantly bold turquoise ‘Washed Up Mermaid’, there’s a shade to suit every aesthetic. Each shade has a different lifecycle - the more subtle 'Rosé' will fade in 1-3 washes, while the ultra-bright 'I Saw Red' lasts from 3-30 washes - so be sure to check before you invest; plus, the colour and fade will vary depending upon the tone and porosity of your hair. Sure to satisfy the wildest colour chameleons and indecisive individuals, get ready to explore your every shade craving. Like the entire BLEACH range, Super Cool Colour is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason we love it. Want to get the best out of your new-found colour? Stock up on the corresponding toning shampoo and conditioner to maintain vibrancy!
how_to_use: Wearing gloves, apply generously to shampooed, towel dried hair. Massage or comb through mid-lengths and ends to ensure you cover all the hair evenly, leave to develop for 30 minutes. Rinse out with lukewarm water and style as desired. For best results apply on very light blonde, bleached hair. Colour may vary depending on existing tone and porosity of hair. One bottle is suitable for short hair or colouring freshly bleached and toned roots. For shoulder-length hair you'll need two bottles. name: JVN Nurture Deep Moisture Mask 147ml JVN Nurture Deep Moisture Mask 147ml
description: Meet the ultimate weekly treatment for thirsty locks of all types and textures - even fine hair. JVN Nurture Deep Moisture Mask infuses every strand with intense moisture for lasting hydration, softness and manageability that won't weigh you down. With notes of fruity blackcurrant and smooth vanilla to make this mask a real treat to use, Nurture Deep Moisture Mask gets to work replenishing dried out tresses in as little as 3 minutes. Rice protein and camellia seed oil add shine, softness and strength, while JVN's patented (and sustainable!) sugarcane-derived hemi-squalane instantly improves hair health and restores 'slip' - without the drying effects of silicones.
how_to_use: Apply to freshly shampooed mid lengths and ends, and use a wide tooth comb to disperse through the hair. Leave on for 3-5 minutes, and rinse. Use in place of conditioner weekly.

name: JVN Complete Blowout Styling Milk Travel 25ml JVN Complete Blowout Styling Milk Travel 25ml
description: Bring the heat (but not the damage) with JVN Blowout Styling Milk Travel. A heat-activated style saver, this lightweight lotion locks out heat damage and humidity while extending your style for up to 48 hours - making it a go-to for weekends away. With a fast absorbing texture that won't weigh strands down, this styling milk is enriched with orchid milk to deeply hydrate and seal in moisture - helping to replenish parched strands. Ionic peptides guard against heat damage up to 450°F, for healthier hair whether you're straightening, curling or opting for a bouncy blow dry. Cassia bark polymer creates gentle hold, humidity resistance and style 'memory' to cut down on restyling time the next morning. With a subtle citrus, amber and cashmere musk scent, this hair hero creates styles that smell as good as they look.
how_to_use: Apply to palms and rub together, smoothing down mid lengths and ends before lightly adding whatever remains to roots. Activate by blow drying - then flat iron, curl or wave to your heart's desire!

name: Davines OI Oil Davines OI Oil
description: Quirkily cool yet results-driven, Daviness OI range is powered by roucou oil (pronounced ru ku) a secret ingredient beloved by native inhabitants of the Amazon rainforest, who rely on the fruits of the Lipstick Tree to protect their hair against the sun and other daily stresses. Intensively replenishing, Davines have harnessed the potency of this wonder-extract to create a range of shine-enhancing, moisture-boosting hair care treatments suitable for all hair types, these exquisite products are perfect for nourishing, smoothing and controlling weakened, dry or tempestuous tresses. Available in two sizes, pick from either 135ml or 50ml for home and away.

name: Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Joia Conditioner 90ml Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Joia Conditioner 90ml
description: Replenish frizz-prone hair with this rich conditioning formula inspired by Rio. Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Joia Strengthening & Smoothing Conditioner infuses locks lasting moisture for a silky, soft-to-the-touch finish. Formulated with patented SOL Seal Technology (plant-based keratin micro-capsules), this strand-smoothing conditioner works to strengthen your hair as it repairs damage by ionically bonding your split ends. Made with all hair types and textures in mind, this creamy formula cloaks your lengths with a weightless, moisture-rich blend of antioxidant Brazil nut selenium and fatty acid-rich buriti fruit oil. What's more, this luscious conditioner is infused with the brand's iconic Cheirosa '62 scent to transport you to the sun-soaked beaches of Rio as you comb away the tangles.
how_to_use: After using Brazilian Joia Strengthening + Smoothing Shampoo, apply a generous amount, concentrating on mid-strand to ends. Leave 2-3 minutes, or more as desired, then rinse. Use with Brazilian Joia Strengthening + Smoothing Shampoo for maximum benefits.

Slotting right into your wash day routine with ease, this booster shot harnesses the power of hair-reviving pea sprout extract to add a much-needed splash of resilience. Renewing your hair from root-to-tip, this 100% vegan blend of scalp-loving essentials stimulates healthy hair growth and wards off breakage, split ends and dryness. New hair, who’s this?

name: Hair Gain Comb Hair Gain Comb
description: Designed to make light work of what can often be a major detangling task, the biodegradable Wide Tooth Comb teases out stubborn knots, prevents shedding and is perfectly suited for all hair types and textures.

name: Function of Beauty Curly Hair Conditioner 325ml Function of Beauty Curly Hair Conditioner 325ml
description: Perfect for hair that twists and turns, the Curly Base Conditioner enhances your curl pattern and lays the foundation for manageable, moisturised hair that maximises the three boosters of your choice. Powered by ultra-nourishing shea butter, this vegan conditioner helps with manageability while locking in moisture and shine, so you can style your curls with ease. The 97% naturally-derived formula is a complex blend of silicone-free conditioning agents designed to provide the slip curly hair needs for any kind of 'do. Not to mention the exclusive 'Nude Peach' fragrance bursts with notes of peach nectar, jasmine and lemon zest, making it an absolute sensorial treat to massage into your scalp and transform your shower into a spa. Whatever three boosters you choose – from anti-frizz to curl definition – this conditioner is more than your average nourishing must-have, instead, it's elevated hair care made just for you.

Delivering a surge of supportive hydration to quench the thirst of dry, crunchy coils, expect a salon-worthy experience right from the comfort of your bathroom!

name: Gisou Honey Infused Leave-In Conditioner 150ml Gisou Honey Infused Leave-In Conditioner 150ml
description: An overachiever if ever we laid eyes on one, Gisou’s Honey Infused Leave-In Conditioner works hard to *takes a deep breath*: hydrate, smooth, detangle your mane, all while protecting hair from heat damage, pollution and breakage. Phew! How does it do it? Well, of course, there’s Gisou’s star ingredient, honey, front and centre. A natural humectant (meaning it slurps up and holds hydration within the hair shaft), honey is packed with vitamins, amino acids and antioxidants to impart strength, help repair damage and add all of the shine. Alongside that, you’ll find baobab extract, argan oil and panthenol, all of which work together soften and condition hair while making the styling process a whole lot more manageable.

name: BLEACH LONDON White Toner Kit BLEACH LONDON White Toner Kit
description: Whatever the shade, the ultimate blonde ambition is to banish brassiness for good – and BLEACH London’s White Toner Kit is one of the best ways we’ve ever found. Neutralising yellow, orangey pigments, this semi-permanent (it lasts around 16-20 washes) post-bleach toner kit keeps hair at its brightest blonde, whether you’re golden, white, silver or platinum. Containing a tube of colourant, a bottle of developer lotion (peroxide) and a repairing treatment mask (to nourish stressed-out strands), alongside a pair of plastic gloves and an instruction leaflet, this really does contain everything you need to carry off effortless application. As if all that wasn’t enough, the collection is completely cruelty-free and vegan – like all of BLEACH’s products – so you can feel caring as well as cool.
how_to_use: Instructions included in box. This semi-permanent dye will last for around 16-20 washes. The colour achieved and the length of its duration can be influenced by many factors including: Condition of hair, previous treatments, hair colour, porosity, length and fineness of hair. The final effect will depend on your hair colour. Best results will be seen on already very pale yellow bleached or highlighted hair. If your hair isn’t already blonde, use BLEACH London TOTAL BLEACH or BLEACH London DIY DIP DYE to lighten your hair first. You may need more than one pack if your hair is long, thick or hasn’t been dyed before. It’s always a good idea to have another pack to hand just in case one runs out before you’re finished colouring. Follow with BLEACH London SILVER SHAMPOO every other wash to extend brightness.

description: Brittle, lacklustre lengths? It’s time to call in for damage control, and the Treatment Mask by Ouai will hydrate, fight frizz and condition with a medley of nourishing ingredients – all held in 100% recyclable packaging. Formulated specially for fine to medium hair types, this lightweight (but hardworking!) mask won’t Ouai down your strands, helping you to split up with split ends for shiny, soft, healthy hair. Using a nourishing blend of shea butter, panthenol and hydrolized keratin, this elixir fights frizz, strengthens, enhances moisture levels and controls flyaways while tackling damage from the very root. name: Kitsch Eco-Friendly Jumbo Open Shape Claw Clip (Various Colours) Kitsch Eco-Friendly Jumbo Open Shape Claw Clip (Various Colours)
description: The secret to minimalist styling with just a *touch* of quirkiness, the Eco-Friendly Jumbo Claw Clip is about to become the chicest new addition to your hair accessory wardrobe. What’s so great about a claw clip that made them a staple in every nineties up-do? Well, they can be used to style and hold even the thicket of manes (they work brilliantly in curly or coily hair too!), the stylish designs that are both classic and statement at the same time are made from recycled materials — yay! After all, who doesn’t love a more sustainable option when it comes to our hair care? Oh, and did we mention how much less damaging a claw clip can be to your mane compared to your usual scrunchie or hair tie? Hair breakage? We don’t know her.
how_to_use: Keep the clip dry to avoid damage.
ingredient: Recycled materials.

name: Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Glossy Nourishing Anti-Frizz Hair Oil 58ml Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Glossy Nourishing Anti-Frizz Hair Oil 58ml
description: Ultra-hydrating and divinely scented, Sol de Janeiro’s Brazilian Glossy Nourishing Hair Oil promotes mirror-like shine and impressively sleek strands. It’s infused with a nourishing cocktail of Brazilian oils (read: patauá, buriti and pequi) which are brimming with antioxidants, fatty acids and essential vitamins that deeply moisturise, smooth and enhance the lustre of your lengths. This luscious oil is also laced with the brand’s iconic Cheirosa ’62 scent that’s sure to transport you to the sun-soaked beaches of Rio as work it into your strands. It’s credentials are pretty stellar too; in a clinical study conducted by an independent third party lab, the oil (when used as directed) was clinically proven to repair split ends and provide 72-hour frizz control and up to 450° heat protection.
how_to_use: For Wet/Damp Hair: Use this oil treatment as a before air drying or heat styling to tame frizz — or as a heat protectant for up to 450 degrees. Ideal for dry, damaged hair. For Dry Hair: Rub a small amount of oil in between your palms, and start with your ends, working your way up to mid-shaft. Benefits of application on dry hair include taming flyways, managing frizz, enhancing shine, or adding hydration in between washes.

description: A leave-in conditioning serum to separate curls while providing soft, flexible hold, Davines’ Curl Building Serum promotes elasticity, fights against frizz and protects from humidity. Perfect for those keen to boost definition for beautifully bouncy curls, coils, waves or ringlets, this featherlight formula ‘wraps’ every hair to create shape and ward against weather’s worst efforts (take that humidity). Perfect for porous or delicate hair that is brittle or prone to split ends, this keeps your curls healthy and helps to recover hair’s ‘spring’.
how_to_use: Apply a small amount of product to damp hair before styling.

name: Aveda Rosemary Mint Purifying Shampoo 250ml Aveda Rosemary Mint Purifying Shampoo 250ml
description: If your hair seems to never quite feel as fresh as you'd like then it's high time you introduced Aveda's Rosemary Mint Purifying Shampoo into your tress-care sessions... This effective cleansing formula is powered by a medley of deeply clarifying ingredients that help to leave your hair feeling squeaky clean, revitalised and ever-so shiny. It's made 97% naturally derived ingredients and features micelles to gently lift product build-up and impurities without disrupting the balance of your scalp and strands, as well as white vinegar to purify your hair without stripping it! The finishing touch is an invigorating aroma of certified organic rosemary, peppermint and spearmint that promises to stimulate your senses as you shower.

name: Fable & Mane Sahascalp Amla Soothing Serum Fable & Mane Sahascalp Amla Soothing Serum
description: As Hindu mythology would have it, the amla tree grew from where Brahma’s tears hit the earth during meditation. Said to have been the first ever tree to germinate, its berries are rich in vitamin C and a popular Ayurvedic remedy for keeping scalps in tip-top condition. Delightfully weightless, the SahaScalp Amla Soothing Serum harnesses the power of amla to deeply condition hair and soothe itchy scalps. Bakuchi (extracted from babchi plant seeds) balances the crown chakra and helps to rejuvenate sensitive skin while hydrating and encouraging skin cell regeneration. Aloe then strengthens and nourishes dry scalps, and vitamin E cools itchiness. A root-to-tip nourishing elixir, this serum nourishes hair, clears product build-up from the scalp, softens hair, smooths cuticles, adds shine and protects hair from further breakage — all with a deliciously mindful scent that instils a sense of peace and calm. Think: a chakra-balancing blend of ripe blackcurrant with tea rose and fresh orange blossom on a bed of woody amber and musk.
how_to_use: Part dry hair. Apply a few drops for fine hair, one full dropper for thick hair. Rub between your palms. Massage into scalp with a focus on your crown to release stress. Focus on dry areas of the scalp. Follow this ritual bi-weekly; for best results leave in overnight. For a deeper treatment, massage a generous amount onto scalp, rinse then cleanse. Safe for all scalp types and suitable for colour-treated hair. Formulated without silicones, parabens, phthalates, sulphates, animal derived ingredients. Cruelty-free and vegan.
ingredient: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Coconut Alkanes, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, C13-15 Alkane, Emblica Officinalis Fruit Extract, Psoralea Corylifolia Seed Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Flower/Leaf Extract, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Flower Extract, Trigonella Foenum-Graecum Seed Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Brassica Campestris (Rapeseed) Seed Oil, Nigella Sativa Seed Oil, Propylene Glycol Dibenzoate, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Salvia Sclarea (Clary) Oil, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Melia Azadirachta Extract, Butylene Glycol, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Tocopherol, Water (Aqua), Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Parfum (Fragrance), Linalool, Geraniol, Limonene

description: Say goodbye to dull, lacklustre locks with Coco & Eve's Youth Revive Pro Youth Conditioner, an age-defying formula that seeks to restore volume, strength and shine. Brimming with botanicals such as PRO-VITALI B (a sustainably-sourced honey blend) and coconut oil, the creamy conditioner protects against breakage and split ends for a fuller, thicker-looking finish. The formula is supported by retinol, caring for both the scalp and strands to encourage optimal conditions for hair growth; while prebiotics help to balance excess oils for a fresher feel. Stubborn tangles and seemingly unmanageable hair are no match for this fortifying formula…

description: Available in eight colour-correcting hues, this weightless mineral powder clings to your hair to cover the look of greys and any dark roots that threaten to peek out to deliver seamless, consolidated colour. Complete with a mirror and double-ended application brush (one side flat for broad sweeps and one small and domed for targeted precision), colour cover-ups have never been so easy. It settles over your strands with a never stiff, sticky or waxy finish, instead, youre bound to forget you even applied it. The no-mess formula is designed to last from one shampoo to the next, withstanding even your most restless nights and high-energy workouts. Just when we thought we couldnt love them anymore, these powders have a water-resistant finish so swimming is never off the cards!
how_to_use: Apply to dry hair. Load up the small end of the brush with powder. Use free hand to pull hair flat/taut against head and press brush down firmly into roots, starting from scalp and working out - do not use sweeping motion. Apply more powder as needed. To extend highlights, use the side edge of the small brush. Lightly dust off any excess powder with wide end of the brush.

description: Leave-in conditioner just got luxe: Oribes Supershine Moisturizing Cream is here to satisfy even the thirstiest, driest locks, elevating shine, calming frizz and restoring strands with supernatural softness. A soy protein biopolymer provides anti-frizz benefits without build up, wheat amino acids help hair to retain moisture, moringa seed extract (rich in vitamins A and C) enhances natural colour and shine, keratin protects the hair shaft from the elements and, last but certainly not least, glycerin (a natural humectant) gives volume, moisture and shine. Giving an intense, high gloss finish without overburdening locks, this cream evens out the moisture level in your hair, returning everything to brilliant balance. Especially good for medium-to-thick, extra-long hair, use this cream on damp or wet tresses and dry however you wish.

name: Bouclème Curl Defining Gel 100ml Bouclème Curl Defining Gel 100ml
description: Fed up of frizzy, lifeless curls that refuse to stay in line? The Curl Defining Gel from Bouclème creates a non-sticky cast around your curls to hold your style and keep it in shape... and all in a vegan and alcohol-free formula! If smoothed and defined curls are on your wishlist, then add the Curl Defining Gel straight to your bag and get ready to give your tresses a new lease of life. A best-seller for good reason, this serum-like gel promises to deeply hydrate your mane and reveal unrivalled body and bounce without any greasy residue or flaking. It's touchably-soft curls from here on out thanks to a blend of nourishing virgin coconut oil, argan oil and linseed extract, and with no drying alcohol and a fully vegan, 99% naturally derived formula, we're wondering what we ever did without this sunshine-hued bottle...
how_to_use: Application differs depending on your curl texture and desired results. Apply to soaking wet hair. For extra volume: Pour gel into palms and graze gel over canopy, tip head forward and graze underneath. Apply more gel to ends and scrunch hair up towards head. Scrunch and hold each section for 10 seconds to encourage curl formation. For volume control: Use fingers to rake gel through hair in sections starting at the back of the head and working towards the front. Ensure even distribution. This method works well for medium/thick textures to elongate curls and prevent shrinkage. Style as usual. Avoid touching hair until completely dry to prevent frizz. Once hair is completely dry, tip head forward and scrunch out gel.

description: Introducing amika’s latest haircare hero: the Mirrorball High Shine + Protect Antioxidant Shampoo. This aptly named product does everything its title suggests, giving your locks the most brilliant shine while deeply nourishing each strand from root to tip. It’s packed with antioxidants including sea buckthorn — an under-the-radar ingredient that works to strengthen the hair while giving it the ultimate glow-up.  And the benefits don’t stop there. This moisturising formula hydrates the hair without weighing it down, while also protecting against pollution build up. Plus, it’s designed to protect colour vibrancy, making it a brilliant choice for dyed hair. For maximum mirrorball shine — and compliments — use it alongside the coordinating conditioner.

name: Oribe Travel Gold Lust Oil 50ml Oribe Travel Gold Lust Oil 50ml
description: Treat your hair to some golden goodness with Oribe's Gold Lust Nourishing Hair Oil, a luxurious yet light oil that absorbs swiftly into strands calling out for an SOS. Each protective drop of this liquid gold penetrates the hair to deeply condition, strengthen and smooth, imparting intense nourishment and incredible shine. A rich blend of emollients conditions and softens hair without weighing it down: argan oil adds lightweight shine, reduces frizz and shields strands from damaging UV rays and pollutants; jasmine oil helps to combat a dry, itchy scalp and enhance shine further; sandalwood extract, amur cork bark extract and barley extract stimulate the hair cuticle; cassis seed oil imparts moisturising omega-6 and omega-3 acids and, finally, shea butter (rich in vitamin F) moisturises and softens dryness and damage, adding lustre and helping to prevent further damage. Oribe's signature bio-restorative complex (including plant collagen, caffeine and biotin) defends hair from oxidative stress while also guarding against the deterioration of natural keratin. Providing thermal protection, detangling and reducing drying time - on top of all of the above! - there's really nothing this hair miracle can't do. Plus, the alchemist-style bottle is sure to add a touch of luxe opulence to your dressing table.
how_to_use: Apply throughout damp hair as a pre-shampoo or overnight treatment. Use on damp hair before blow drying for heat protection or apply to dry hair for extra lustre, conditioning and frizz control. Use on dry hair before going in the sun for protection.

name: Hair By Sam McKnight Happy Endings Nourishing Balm 80ml Hair By Sam McKnight Happy Endings Nourishing Balm 80ml
description: A styler with serious benefits, this defining, de-fluffing and de-frizzing balm deeply conditions every strand it touches — think of this as hair care and a styler in one pretty-in-pink bottle. Best friend to the lazy beauty maven, the Happy Endings Nourishing Balm combines hair care with the styling prowess that Sam McKnight is famed for. In need of a primer to use ahead of styling? This multi-tasking balm perfectly preps your hair and makes light works of styling your ‘do. Is second-day frizz ruining your look? Just a pump or two of this conditioning cream tames flyaways and smooths as you work it through to leave you with perfectly tamed tresses. If your carefully styled curls are lacking definition, fear not, as this powerhouse product adds definition to your waves and curls to keep them perfectly coiffed. Even better? Thanks to ‘Vegabead Microcapsules’ that boost manageability and shine (without adding build-up either), you can re-style and smooth your hair as the day goes on — these shine-boosting microcapsules reactivate whenever you comb or brush your strands… we’re just as impressed as you are!.
how_to_use: Apply to wet or dry hair, massage 2-3 pumps evenly over the palms of your hands, work into the ends and up through the mid lengths of your hair.
ingredient: Aqua, Propylene Glycol, PPG-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Cetearyl Glucoside, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Panthenol, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum, Polyacrylamide, Glycerin, C13 14 Isoparaffin, Tocopherol, Algin, Coco-Glucoside, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sorbitan Oleate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Laureth-7, Carrageenan, Chitosan, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Xanthan Gum, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract, Limonene, Spathodea Campanulata Flower Extract, Citric Acid, Sorbic Acid. ALLERGENS: Limonene.

name: Act+Acre Intelligent Hair Towel Act+Acre Intelligent Hair Towel
description: Not only will the Intelligent hair towel elevate your wash day rituals to spa-level heights of luxury, this waffle knit microfiber towel reduce friction and frizz to reveal healthy, swish-worthy strands. Act+Acre are on a mission to transform damaged, over-wrought tresses and leave them soft, shiny and visibly healthy. A vital part of your wash day routine that you might not have given a second thought to is how you wrap up your mane post-wash. Before you click ‘add to bag' it's time for a quick science lesson... after water exposure, your hair texture shifts as hydrogen bonds break which are integral to how your hair stays in shape. From frizz to curl pattern and overall volume, the way you care for your hair during the drying process dramatically impacts the look and feel of your strands. So make way for the Intelligent Hair Towel, this clever microfiber creation stops breakage in its tracks to ensure your style stays frizz-free, not to mention speeding up your drying time by 50%!
how_to_use: Flip damp hair forward and place the towel at the base of your neck. Twist hair into the tail end of towel. Leave hair wrapped for at least five minutes for optimal drying. Wash with other like colours on the cold setting and lay flat or hang to dry.
ingredient: Size: 10x25in / 26x64cm. Microfiber

name: Coco & Eve Youth Revive Pro Youth Hair and Scalp Mask 212ml Coco & Eve Youth Revive Pro Youth Hair and Scalp Mask 212ml
description: Here to protect against three major signs of lacklustre lengths – loss of shine, strength and volume – Coco & Eve’s innovative Youth Revive Pro Youth Hair & Scalp Mask gives your locks a new lease of luscious life. Featuring a PRO-VITALI B honey blend, retinol and probiotics, the skin care-inspired concoction nourishes the scalp and strands for a healthier and stronger-looking finish. The five-minute mask also helps to balance excess sebum and oils – meaning fewer hair-wash days on the horizon (hurrah!). Suitable for all hair types and textures, the once-weekly formula provides your locks with a much-needed surge of moisture, resulting in less breakage and visible split ends; all while inducing a silk-like softness and shine.
how_to_use: After shampooing, evenly distribute a generous amount of product from the scalp to the lengths and ends of the hair. Leave on for 5-10 minutes, then rinse with warm water. Use 1-2 times a week.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Cetrimonium Chloride, Octyldodecanol, Mel Extract / Honey Extract / Extrait de miel, Retinol, Royal Jelly Extract, Propolis Extract, Leptospermum Scoparium Branch/Leaf Oil, Magnolia Officinalis Bark Extract, Piper Nigrum (Pepper) Seed Extract / Piper Nigrum Seed Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil / Cocos Nucifera Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil / Persea Gratissima Oil, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Seed Extract / Citrus Grandis Seed Extract, Panthenol,Sodium Ascorbate, Tocopherol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Dipalmitoylethyl Hydroxyethylmonium Methosulfate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Glyceryl Stearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Fragrance / Parfum, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Hydroxide, Sorbic Acid, Benzoic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Linalool.

name: Oribe Shampoo for Magnificent Volume 8.5 fl. oz. Oribe Shampoo for Magnificent Volume 8.5 fl. oz.
description: Uplift your hair and mind with Oribes Shampoo for Magnificent Volume, which promises to restore your mane to all its magnificence with volume and thickness. Sulphate-free, the formula features coconut and natural sugar derived cleansers to cleanse gently yet effectively, without disrupting your hairs oil balance. A high-tech polymer blend plumps up the hair shaft for fullness and body, while hydrolysed vegetable protein and keratin proteins strengthen strands and provide heat-activated protection against thermal styling damage. Amber and moringa seed extracts deliver antioxidant protection and weightlessly condition, leaving locks full, lush and easy to love.
how_to_use: Oribe says: Massage, indulge (for at least one minute), rinse.

name: BLEACH LONDON Fade To Grey Conditioner BLEACH LONDON Fade To Grey Conditioner
description: Swear by slate-toned tresses with BLEACH LONDON’s Fade To Grey Conditioner. Targeting brassiness in pre-lightened hair, this toning conditioner helps to maintain the coolest manes in the capital. Treating chemical-treated lengths to a softening session, this formula helps to fade out-of-place warm tones and maintain your smoky style. Shaking up your look (and skipping the salon appointment) - all without making a colour commitment - this clever formula grants a slate grey sheen that’s perfect for topping up the coverage of already toned hair (on light blonde lengths gradual build up is key!). As if all that wasn’t enough, the collection is completely cruelty-free and vegan – like all of BLEACH’s products – so you can feel caring as well as über-cool.
how_to_use: Apply to shampooed hair and massage through to ends. Leave in for 3-4 minutes. Comb and rinse thoroughly. Always follow the sensitivity guide in the package. Can stain skin, nails, bathroom tiles and grouting. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes. If product gets into eyes, rinse with water immediately. Avoid contact with clothing and towels.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Cetyl Alcohol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Diethylhexyl Succinate, Amodimethicone, Ceteareth-20, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Polyquaternium-10, Wheat Amino Acids, Cocodimonium Hydroxypropyl Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Panthenol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Trideceth-12, Dextrin, Parfum (Fragrance), Linalool, Benzyl Salicylate, Tetrasodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Triethylene Glycol, Sodium Benzoate, Basic Violet 2, Basic Red 76, HC Blue No.16, Basic Brown 17, Basic Brown 16.

name: Act+Acre Detangling Brush Act+Acre Detangling Brush
description: Act + Acre’s Detangling Hair Brush does exactly as it’s name suggests — but so much more. Made with double-length bristles, it smooths, detangles and minimises snags, while giving your scalp the most wonderful massage.  Designed to work through knots and tangles without causing breakage, you can use it on wet, damp anddry hair — the latter will also help to distribute the scalp’s natural oils while preventing frizz and boosting shine. Use yours to work through knots without causing breakage, and relish in the fact that it’s made with post-consumer recycled plastic, so you’re doing your bit for the planet, too.
how_to_use: Rinse thoroughly in case of contact with eyes.

name: Kitsch Recycled Plastic Small Claw Clips Kitsch Recycled Plastic Small Claw Clips
description: The secret to minimalist styling with just a *touch* of quirkiness, the Recycled Plastic Small Claw Clips are about to become the chicest new addition to your hair accessory wardrobe. What makes these particular mini-sized claw clips just so special? They can be used to style even the thicket of manes (they work brilliantly in curly or coily hair too!), plus the stylish designs (think: matte black and trendy tortoiseshell) can easily be dressed up or down. And as they’re made from recycled plastic, they're a more sustainable option too! Oh, and did we mention how much less damaging a claw clip can be to your mane compared to your usual scrunchie or hair tie? Hair breakage? We don’t know her…
how_to_use: Keep the clip dry to avoid damage.
ingredient: 97% GRS ABS, 3% Iron.

name: OUAI Fur Bébé Pet Shampoo 474ml OUAI Fur Bébé Pet Shampoo 474ml
description: The only cleanser that’s deserving of your beloved fur bébé’s coat, Ouai’s Pet Shampoo is specially formulated for pampered pets – lifting dirt and intensely hydrating from snoot through to tail. Enriched with nourishing ingredients that won’t aggravate itchy or sensitive skin, this formula uses rambutan seed extract, vegetable protein and panthenol to soften fur and deliver a Crufts-worthy shine. Cue: instant waggy tails, satisfied purrs and very, very happy humans, because this shampoo is infused with the brand's delicious (and unbelievably long-lasting) 'Mercer Street' scent too. A far cry from whatever your pet rolled around in the other week, (OI – COME BACK HERE!) this formula is bursting with Italian lemon, iris, white musk, lily, jasmine sambac and Turkish Rose for infinitely sweet snuggles and no wrinkled noses. Formulated without any gluten, parabens, phthalates, SLS or SLES, this cruelty-free shampoo will have your pet begging for bath time (well, we can dream), and you can kiss goodbye to dirty paws on your freshly-mopped floor. You’re welcome.
how_to_use: Brush your fur bébé before shampooing. Wet coat thoroughly. Massage liberally from back of ears to tail. Be careful to avoid eyes. Rinse well and towel dry.
ingredient: Water / Aqua / Eau, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Lauryl Glucoside, Decyl Glucoside, Glycerin, Cocamide MIPA, Fragrance / Parfum, Panthenol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Nephelium Lappaceum Seed Extract, Hibiscus Rosa-Sinensis Flower Extract, Tamarindus Indica Extract, Vinegar, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein, PEG-150 Distearate, Polyquaternium-7, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol, Maltodextrin, PEG-200 Hydrogenated Glyceryl Palmate, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol.

name: OUAI Thick Hair Conditioner 300ml OUAI Thick Hair Conditioner 300ml
description: A ‘get rich quick’ treatment for thick hair demanding the TLC treatment, OUAI Haircare’s Thick Hair Conditioner rescues ‘big’ hair that’s in need of attention. With replenishing marshmallow root and a strengthening cocktail of keratin, shea and avocado butters to boost elasticity and promote manageability, this frizz-fighting, smoothing and gloss-granting formula renders the most strong-willed strands much more biddable – softening coarse, porous lengths to promote definition and grant a sleek, post-salon swish. Deliciously scented like all OUAI creations, this post-cleansing formula stars the brand’s signature ‘Mercer Street’ perfume – a medley of orange, peony, magnolia, jasmine, musk and orris. Available in a chic 300ml bottle or a 946ml refill pouch - that's the equivalent of just over three full-sized bottles - this must-have new launch is as chic as it is sustainable too.
how_to_use: After shampooing, apply to ends, then comb through with fingers. Leave for around three minutes before rinsing thoroughly.
ingredient: Aqua (Water, Eau), Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride (Anti-static Agent/Agent Antistatique), Parfum (Fragrance), Cetrimonium Chloride (Anti-static Agent/Agent Antistatique), Panthenol, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Althaea Officinalis Root Extract, Dimethicone, Amodimethicone, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Polyquaternium-37, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Lauryl Glucoside, Divinyldimethicone/Dimethicone Copolymer, C11-15 Pareth-7, Laureth-9, Glycerin, Trideceth-12, C12-13 Pareth-23, C12-13 Pareth-3, Dimethiconol, Propoxytetramethyl Piperidinyl Dimethicone, Trideceth-6, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopherol, Isopropyl Alcohol, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Citric Acid, Sodium Chloride, Sorbitan Oleate, Sodium Hydroxide, Acetic Acid, Sodium Acetate, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Hexyl Cinnamal

name: Davines Heart of Glass Rich Conditioner 250ml Davines Heart of Glass Rich Conditioner 250ml
description: A nourishing conditioner that enhances blonde tones, Davines’ Heart of Glass Rich Conditioner maintains brilliantly blonde hair while it provides intense nourishment and fortifying action on the hair fibre thanks to biacidic bond complex and the baobab extract. It balances unwanted undertones, while illuminates blonde shades. Part of Davines ‘Heart of Glass’ edit – which derives its name from a famous song from the 80s, sang by a very blonde artist who has become an icon – this collection of products are designed to highlight the beauty of blonde hair, both natural and bleached, lightened and dyed; or hair that has been exposed to sunlight, the frequent use of the brushes or straighteners, all elements that could weaken its fibre. On a mission to preserve the planet’s vital biodiversity, each hair care ‘family’ (Heart of Glass, NOUNOU and so on), represents an extract under threat, so by choosing to use this shampoo, you’re supporting the globe and its varied inhabitants – from plants to people!
how_to_use: Apply to towel-dried hair along lengths and ends. Leave on for 5 minutes, then comb and rinse thoroughly. Rinse thoroughly in case of contact with eyes.
ingredient: Aqua / Water / Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Glycerin, Cetyl Alcohol, Hydrogenated Farnesene, Cetrimonium Chloride, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Parfum / Fragrance, Glyceryl Stearate, Orbignya Oleifera Seed Oil, Isopropyl Alcohol, Benzyl Alcohol, Maleic Acid, Disodium Edta, Sodium Benzoate, Genipa Americana Fruit Extract, Poly-Glyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Sclerotium Gum, Sorbitan Isostearate, Thioctamidoethyl Dimethylamine Maleate, Sodium Hydroxide, Corn Starch Modified, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Linalool, Coumarin, Hydrolyzed Adansonia Digitata Seed Extract, Retinyl Palmitate, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil / Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil.

name: HELLO KLEAN Clarifying Scalp Soak 200ml HELLO KLEAN Clarifying Scalp Soak 200ml
description: Whether product build-up has left your lengths limp and lacklustre, or pollution is raining on your parade, this Clarifying Scalp Soak from HELLO KLEAN is here to change your fortunes. Tested on all hair types - from wispy fine hair to gloriously textured coils - this vegan-friendly soak is especially effective for oily scalps and trichologistas with extensive styling regimes. The multitasking formula works two-fold to detoxify your scalp, shifting build-up (be it from product, excess oils or hardwater minerals) and delivering skin-loving ingredients that ultimately encourage healthy, softer hair. Want to see its qualifications? It's powered by apple cider vinegar and phytic acid to whisk away follicle-clogging residue without stripping your scalp; fermented rice water and tamanu oil then replenish moisture levels to nourish your hair and scalp; finally, pro-vitamin B5 and rice seed protein help to restore damaged hair, improving its integrity and making it less brittle. Consider us obsessed...
how_to_use: Apply to your wet scalp and take a moment to massage it in. Let it soak in for a minimum of five minutes before rinsing thoroughly. Follow with conditioner if desired. Use twice a week for optimum results, in between shampoo days, or as often as needed.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Coco-Glucoside, Lauryl Glucoside, Polysorbate 20, Saccharomyces/Rice Ferment Filtrate, Caprylyl Glycol, Acetic Acid, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Acrylamidopropyltrimonium Chloride/Acrylamide Copolymer, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Polyquaternium-70, Butylene Glycol, Dipropylene Glycol, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Seedcake Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Seed Protein, Phytic Acid, Calophyllum Inophyllum (Tamanu) Seed Oil, Panthenol, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Gluconolactone, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Benzoate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Potassium Sorbate, Calcium Gluconate.

name: Sol de Janeiro Triple Brazilian Butter Hair Repair Treatment (Various Sizes) Sol de Janeiro Triple Brazilian Butter Hair Repair Treatment (Various Sizes)
description: Majorly overdue a trim? Restore dry, damaged strands (and impress your hairdresser when you next see them) with Sol de Janeiro's restorative mask: the Triple Brazilian Butter Hair Treatment. The decadently rich formula harnesses a trio of Brazilian butters to make light work of tangles, fend against damage and effectively smooth split ends... The butters in question are Cupuaçu, Murumuru, and Tucumã - deeply hydrating ingredients that provide nourishment and increase resistance against breakage! It's also formulated with their patented SOL Seal Technology (plant-based keratin micro-capsules) to strengthen your hair as it repairs damage by ionically bonding your split ends. Don't believe us? In a clinical split end repair study conducted by an independent 3rd party lab, it was seen to mend up to 96%(!) of split ends when used as directed. Expect healthy-looking, smooth and shiny strands that won't feel weighed down in the slightest!
how_to_use: Set aside some quality time for you and your strands... After cleansing hair, apply the mask to wet hair, evenly coating from root to tip, concentrating on the ends. Leave on for 10 minutes (or more) before rinsing thoroughly. For best results use once a week or once every other week, or any time your hair needs a boost of repair & hydration - after excessive heat styling, a colouring treatment or straightening treatment.
ingredient: Aqua (Water, Eau), Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Parfum (Fragrance), Glycerin, Isopropyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Polyquaternium-37, Phenyl Trimethicone, Astrocaryum Tucuma Seed Butter, Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Theobroma Grandiflorum (Cupuaçu) Seed Butter, Euterpe Oleracea (Acai) Fruit Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Bertholletia Excelsa (Brazil Nut) Seed Oil, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Bixa Orellana Seed Extract, Sorbitan Oleate, Coco-Glucoside, Algin, Xanthan Gum, Chitosan, Carrageenan, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polysorbate 60, Polyquaternium-10, Dehydroacetic Acid, Sodium Chloride, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Acetate, Tetrasodium EDTA, Benzyl Salicylate, Butylpheny Methylpropional, Coumarin, Limonene.

name: Living Proof Full Dry Volume & Texture Spray 95ml Living Proof Full Dry Volume & Texture Spray 95ml
description: Achieve fuller-looking hair with the Living Proof Full Dry Volume & Texture Spray. Delivering volume, texture and a long-lasting finish, the styling spray helps create salon-worthy results. Dispensing texturising molecules throughout the hair, the spray instantly elevates your locks, adding dimension and voluminous shape. The improved valve enables a controlled distribution and a softer spritz, allowing you to have more precision over the product. Formulated to provide heat protection up to 210°C, the spray is compatible for use with heated styling tools.
how_to_use: For use on dry hair. Shake the bottle well before each spritz and hold 6-10 inches away from the head. Begin spraying from the root, moving through to the ends of the hair and work in with your fingers. To create even more volume, tilt your head sideways or upside down and apply for bigger results.

name: R+Co Television Perfect Hair Shampoo (Various Sizes) R+Co Television Perfect Hair Shampoo (Various Sizes)
description: The perfect way to introduce yourself to this renowned brand, R+Co's Perfect Hair Shampoo can be used by absolutely anyone to achieve truly beautiful, healthy and perfect camera-ready hair. Housed in R+Co's signature white opaque bottles with a chic, white noise television design, this bottle is the stuff of dreams. Formulated with juniper berry extract to help maintain your scalp's optimal oil balance while adding weightless moisture, this amazing ingredient also detoxifies hair follicles and soaks up impurities on the hair and scalp to keep it healthy. Glycerin also helps to retain moisture and maintains moisture balance in hair while badassu seed oil deeply conditions and moisturises hair and scalp dryness. Scented with DARK WAVES (a warming and romantic blend of cardamom, pineapple, tangerine, lavender, bamboo and blonde woods) this is a must-have addition to your collection as well as a perfect gift for any friend as it caters to all hair types. Packaged in a sleek white opaque tube with quintessential R+Co imagery, TELEVISION (like the rest of this unmissable range) is vegan, cruelty-free, gluten-free, colour-safe and free from parabens, sulphates, mineral oils and petrolatum. Trustworthy and transparent, you need this hair care range in your life. Available in a sized-to-try bottle (50ml) as well as the original (241ml), now's the time to discover this hair care essential.
how_to_use: Spread across and through hair, rinse and follow with R+Co's {TELEVISION Perfect Hair Conditioner}.

name: Oribe Impermeable Spray 200ml Oribe Impermeable Spray 200ml
description: Shield your hard-earned hairdos from the fatal effects of humidity with Oribe’s Imperméable Anti Humidity Spray, a subtly texturising finishing spray with powerful protective benefits. Just the thing if humidity or the weather wreak havoc on your blow dry, curls or sleek straight locks, this fine spray features a ‘Miami-tested’ anti-humidity shield, as well as UV protection and light hold. A unique copolymer enhances and extends the longevity of hairstyles in any climate, while panthenol swells the hair shaft to volumise and pro-vitamin B5 thickens, conditions and builds soft volume. Use it on finished hair to block frizz, set your style and add texture, or apply before styling for texture and hold.
how_to_use: Spray on finished hair to block frizz, set style and add texture. Can be used before styling for texture and hold.

name: OUAI Super Dry Shampoo Travel Size 56g OUAI Super Dry Shampoo Travel Size 56g
description: From celebrity coiffeuse Jen Atkin – responsible for maintaining the manes of Klan Kardashian, Gigi Hadid and Gwen Stefani (to name a few) – OUAI’s Super Dry Shampoo helps to clean and volume while lightly fragrancing your mane. Phenomenally oil-absorbent but non-powdery, this is so featherweight that it’s completely invisible – refreshing hair in-between washes and adding root ‘oomph’ to hair that’s falling flat. It’s a definite must-have addition to your hair care arsenal (and it looks très chic in your bathroom cabinet/desk drawer/handbag…). Available in a sized-to-try bottle (56g) as well as the original (127g), now's the time to discover this wash day-delaying hero.
how_to_use: Shake it up. Holding the bottle 6" from your hair, blast roots then, flip hair over and fluff with your fingers. Jen's Tip: Apply to dry hair to revitalise yesterday’s style for perfectly lived in hair.

name: JVN Embody Volumising Foam 200ml JVN Embody Volumising Foam 200ml
description: JVN's Embody Volumizing Foam knows a thing or two about building body confidence. Backing big hair energy, the multi-tasking foam provides a 24-hour hold, providing a lasting style without leaving your hair sticky, flaky or dry. Working without weighing down your strands, the lightweight formula provides fizz-control while hydrating your hair to achieve smoother and bouncier styles. Packed with protein and vitamins, it's nutrient-rich blend is entirely plant-based to treat your tresses with clean and sustainable air-infused technology. Combined with hemisqualane, the silicone-free, non-aerosol foam keeps your look locked down thank to its long-lasting style retention.
how_to_use: Dispense two to three pumps of foam into your hands and distribute through damp hair. Apply at the root for volume or mid lengths and ends for more body.

name: BLEACH LONDON Rose Shampoo 250ml BLEACH LONDON Rose Shampoo 250ml

name: Philip Kingsley Density Amino Acid Protein Booster (120 Capsules) Philip Kingsley Density Amino Acid Protein Booster (120 Capsules)
description: Hello… is it volume you’re looking for? Restore harmony back to weak and damaged hair with the amino acid-infused supplements from Philip Kingsley’s new Density collection — created to bring the ‘va-va-voom’ back to your hair. Trust in the science of Trichology and let the hair and scalp specialists at Philip Kingsley restore volume and health back to even the finest of strands. Nutritional deficiencies, stress, over-styling and hereditary influences can all be detrimental to our hair health, and a topical regime will only be able to do so much to help bring a balance back to your scalp. Completing your hair care routine with optimal vitamin and mineral support for lacklustre manes, these supplements are uniquely formulated with the powerhouse antioxidant vitamin C to contribute to normal collagen formation and a dose of biotin and selenium for truly envy-inducing hair. Boosted by essential amino acids to support the maintenance of healthy hair, these vegan capsules improve the quality of your mane (and nails!) in as little as three months for a *swish* that you just can’t quit.
how_to_use: Take two capsules, twice a day. Do not exceed recommended daily intake. Not to be used as a substitute for a varied and balanced diet. Suitable for adults only. For best results, take for a minimum of three months. Suitable for vegans and vegetarians. For best before end date, see base of box. Be patient. Visible improvements in hair quality can take up to three months, however you’ll likely see quicker results in your nails.

name: BLEACH LONDON Rose Super Cool Colour 150ml BLEACH LONDON Rose Super Cool Colour 150ml
description: Ensure that your mane is anything but run-of-the-mill (without the colour commitment) with BLEACH London’s Super Cool Colour, a non-permanent hair colour cream mask that transforms bleached and toned tresses. In just 30 minutes, this rich, luscious mask can reveal a rainbow of bold, chic shades. From beautifully bright ‘The Big Pink’ to perfect pastels ‘Awkward Peach’ and ‘Blullini’, to brilliantly bold turquoise ‘Washed Up Mermaid’, there’s a shade to suit every aesthetic. Each shade has a different lifecycle - the more subtle 'Rosé' will fade in 1-3 washes, while the ultra-bright 'I Saw Red' lasts from 3-30 washes - so be sure to check before you invest; plus, the colour and fade will vary depending upon the tone and porosity of your hair. Sure to satisfy the wildest colour chameleons and indecisive individuals, get ready to explore your every shade craving. Like the entire BLEACH range, Super Cool Colour is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason we love it. Want to get the best out of your new-found colour? Stock up on the corresponding toning shampoo and conditioner to maintain vibrancy!
how_to_use: Wearing gloves, apply generously to shampooed, towel dried hair. Massage or comb through mid-lengths and ends to ensure you cover all the hair evenly, leave to develop for 30 minutes. Rinse out with lukewarm water and style as desired. For best results apply on very light blonde, bleached hair. Colour may vary depending on existing tone and porosity of hair. One bottle is suitable for short hair or colouring freshly bleached and toned roots. For shoulder-length hair you'll need two bottles. For long hair that's below your shoulders, you'll need three to four bottles. If your hair is very thick we recommend adding an extra bottle.

Created in collaboration with professional hair stylist - and creator of 'The Rachel' haircut - Chris McMillan, together they created a line of hair care that focuses on the scalp - products that dissolve years of buildup while nourishing hair with biocompatible proteins and oils. name: Bouclème Curl Defining Gel 300ml Bouclème Curl Defining Gel 300ml
description: Fed up of frizzy, lifeless curls that refuse to stay in line? The Curl Defining Gel from Bouclème creates a non-sticky cast around your curls to hold your style and keep it in shape… and all in a vegan and alcohol-free formula! If smoothed and defined curls are on your wishlist, then add the Curl Defining Gel straight to your bag and get ready to give your tresses a new lease of life. A best-seller for good reason, this serum-like gel promises to deeply hydrate your mane and reveal unrivalled body and bounce without any greasy residue or flaking. It’s touchably-soft curls from here on out thanks to a blend of nourishing virgin coconut oil, argan oil and linseed extract, and with no drying alcohol and a fully vegan, 99% naturally derived formula, we’re wondering what we ever did without this sunshine-hued bottle…
how_to_use: Application differs depending on your curl texture and desired results. Apply to soaking wet hair. For extra volume: Pour gel into palms and graze gel over canopy, tip head forward and graze underneath. Apply more gel to ends and scrunch hair up towards head. Scrunch and hold each section for 10 seconds to encourage curl formation. For volume control: Use fingers to rake gel through hair in sections starting at the back of the head and working towards the front. Ensure even distribution. This method works well for medium/thick textures to elongate curls and prevent shrinkage. Style as usual. Avoid touching hair until completely dry to prevent frizz. Once hair is completely dry, tip head forward and scrunch out gel.

name: The Ordinary Sulphate 4% Cleanser for Body and Hair 240ml The Ordinary Sulphate 4% Cleanser for Body and Hair 240ml
description: With a 'gentle-is-essential' formula, the Sulphate 4% Cleanser for Body and Hair is an effective cleanser that rids your hair, skin and scalp of excess sebum, dirt, debris and product residue - without leaving skin feeling stripped, dry or irritated. With a lightly foaming formula, this multipurpose product uses a modified sulphate derivative called SLES-2, at a minimal concentration of just 4%. This modified sulphate is an effective cleansing agent - its a surfactant, which dissolves the barrier between dirt and oil on your skin, scalp and hair, allowing this to be rinsed away easily with water - but doesn't feature the irritating, sensitising or drying attributes we often associate with traditional sulphates. Instead, it helps to maintain the skin barrier - both on your body and your scalp - to keep it hydrated and healthy. In fact, this cleanser can even safely be used to a colour-treated mane without stripping it.
how_to_use: Work the cleanser into wet hair and body. Rinse. If irritation occurs, rinse off, cease use, and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Keep out of reach of children.

name: The Ordinary Behentrimonium Chloride 2% Conditioner 240ml The Ordinary Behentrimonium Chloride 2% Conditioner 240ml
description: With a minimalistic-yet-effective formula, the Behentrimonium Chloride 2% Conditioner will help to condition, soften and detangle hair without unnecessary, filler ingredients. The star ingredient here — as the name may suggest — is behentrimonium chloride. Though you might not have heard about this ingredient much, it’s likely on the INCI list of some of your favourite conditioners, and The Ordinary have tailored this lightweight formula to hero it at a 2% concentration (a low potency that still allows for the full efficacy of the ingredient). This helps to condition your mane (yes, even if its colour treated!) while adding plenty of slip and helping to detangle strands. In turn, this makes brushing or combing through your hair a whole lot easier, leading to less damage and stress in the long run.

name: Davines OI Absolute Beautifying Hair Butter 250ml Davines OI Absolute Beautifying Hair Butter 250ml
description: Quirkily cool yet results-driven, Davines’s ‘OI’ range is powered by roucou oil (pronounced ru ‘ku) – a ‘secret’ ingredient beloved by native inhabitants of the Amazon rainforest, who rely on the fruits of the ‘Lipstick Tree’ to protect their skin and hair against the sun and other daily stresses. Intensely replenishing, Davines have harnessed the potency of this wonder-extract to create a range of shine-enhancing, moisture-boosting hair care treatments – suitable for all hair types, these exquisite products are perfect for nourishing, smoothing and ‘controlling’ weakened, dry or tempestuous tresses. By combining high-grade natural ingredients with first-rate scientific rigour, Davines’s founders the Bollati family have expanded their Parmese research laboratory into a multi-national hair care business with an inspiring range of original and authentic products, beloved by hosts of discerning celebrities and beauty buffs around the world. Available in two sizes, pick from either 250ml or 75ml for home and away.

For medium to fine hair: apply on dry hair and leave in for 10 minutes. Proceed to rinse well and shampoo as usual. For an extra nourishing boost: apply both before and after shampooing as noted above.

description: Designed to rival your go-to rinse-out shampoo, Living Proof's Perfect Hair Day (PhD) Advanced Clean Dry Shampoo not only keeps hair clean between washes, but it even cares for it too. No really, the shine and softness are unreal... It's made with fast-absorbing powders to soak up oil and sweat, which the brand's advanced powder removal system then easily eliminates for a fresh start. A helping of conditioning agents then adds softness, shine and manageability in between washes, while the refreshing spray neutralises odours and balances the scalp's sebum levels to keep your hair clean for longer. Stock up on the full size (198ml) to add to your at-home hair care collection, or throw the travel size (92ml) in your handbag for an on-the-go refresh.

Perfect hair Day™ Advanced Clean Dry Shampoo can be used on most hair types. For thicker, coarser hair, section more thoroughly upon application. Originally formulated for Audrey Hepburn, the formula boosts elasticity, manageability, bounce and shine, delivering rich moisture in the cuticle without weighing strands down. You can even sleep in Elasticizer Extreme Rinse thoroughly and shampoo and condition as normal. name: SILKE London Cleopatra Hair Ties SILKE London Cleopatra Hair Ties
description: The brainchild of a London hairstylist, SILKE London’s brand-founder Maria was frustrated – waking up each day to frizzy, fragile hair (and a pillowcase strewn with split ends). The solution? 100% pure silk, which not only respects hair and reduces risk of breakage, but also helps to smooth and enhance shine so your locks stay strong, long and lustrous. Each pack boasts six silk-wrapped bobbles, to effortlessly secure your ballet bun, high pony or pigtails (whatever your hair’s thickness) – just choose from three colours: ‘Cleopatra’ (classic black), ‘Coco’ (pretty champagne-pink) or ‘Frida’ (with a rainbow of rich, sumptuous jewelled hues). As well as looking gorgeous (as great on your wrist as in your hair) SILKE Hair Ties glide against hair, eliminating the friction, clawing and snapping of abrasive traditional elastics, to prevent damage, breakages and split-ends. Redesigned with your feedback in mind, these are the best hair ties you'll ever own...

name: Pattern Leave-in Conditioner 289.8ml Pattern Leave-in Conditioner 289.8ml
description: Say goodbye to your gorgeous frizz halo with the Leave-In Conditioner that adds floods of moisture with that little bit of oomph needed to nourish curls after your wash routine but before styling. As with all PATTERN hair care, the Leave-In Conditioner is free of sls/sles, parabens, formaldehyde... the list goes on. But what it has got is a natural blend of oils - we're talking coconut, sweet almond, tea tree, avocado - and honey to deliver moisture and lock it in at the same time. Not only does this nourishing formula make it easier to detangle your mane but its lightweight texture adds soft definition with a light hold. Leaving a light floral scent comprised of neroli, rose and patchouli, make dry, frizzy hair a thing of the past and prepare to see your best curls and coils yet.

Unlike other dandruff treatments, Flaky Itchy Scalp Shampoo does not dry out the hair or strip it of colour, gently cleansing with specialised ingredients instead and removing build up and irritation, so effectively that 99% of those tested in a consumer trial said that it cleared their flaky scalp. With a delicate apple fragrance, this can be used every day as your main shampoo, or in conjunction with the shampoo recommended for your hair texture. Available in travel and full sizes, you need never be without your favourite hair saviour...
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair Lather well with a gentle kneading of the scalp Rinse and repeat if necessary Follow with the appropriate Philip Kingsley conditioner and scalp toner Use daily to cleanse your scalp and thereafter at regular intervals as required
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, TEA-Lauryl Sulfate, Lauryl Betaine, PEG-4 Rapeseedamide, Piroctone Olamine, Citric Acid, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Chloride.

name: HELLO KLEAN Hard Water Conditioner 350ml HELLO KLEAN Hard Water Conditioner 350ml
description: Dealing with all the tell-tale signs of hard water? Think dryness, brittleness, brassiness and dullness. Meet your new hair hero, HELLO KLEAN Hard Water Conditioner. Specially formulated to counteract the effects of minerals and heavy metals, it restores softness, strength and shine from root to tip. Rinsing away roughness caused by mineral-heavy water, this replenishing conditioner is fortified with reishi mushroom and reparative rice proteins. Hyaluronic acid infuses strands with moisture, to plump up dry, brittle hair, while provitamin B5 boosts hair strength to ward off breakage. Free from silicones, this lightweight formula seals in hydration and adds just enough slip without weighing locks down.
how_to_use: After shampooing, gently squeeze out any excess water. Rub a desired amount of conditioner between your hands and comb through the hair with your fingers. Leave for one minute before rinsing thoroughly.

name: VIRTUE Healing Oil 50ml VIRTUE Healing Oil 50ml
description: Available in 20ml and 50ml sizes, the Healing Oil infuses dry and damaged lengths with an impressive dose of shine-giving moisture, calling upon a nourishing blend of proteins and oils to protect and restore your hair. Formulated with Alpha Keratin 60ku, a whole- human keratin born from regenerative medicine - this restorative formula binds directly to areas of damage and fills them. What’s more, there’s a nourishing blend of Tahitian tiare flower (to help remedy weak and damaged strands) and antioxidant-rich Kalahari melon seed oil to protect against environmental aggressors while imparting lasting hydration. Made from clear oils, this innovative formula grants a glossy finish that won’t mar your colour of weigh down your lengths. The luscious oil has a delicious tropical scent with notes of creamy coconut, yuzu extract and woody undertones that linger subtly on your tresses after use. The results? Seriously soft, healthy-looking hair with an unrivalled shine.

Hair appears silky-smooth and tangle-free as the lightweight formula conditions hair from root to tip to enhance hair styling. Topped off with antioxidant-rich moringa seed oil, the leave-in conditioner helps to defend strands against the visible effects of UV and pollution. Vegan.

name: Davines OI Absolute Beautifying Shampoo 280ml Davines OI Absolute Beautifying Shampoo 280ml
description: Quirkily cool yet results-driven, Davines’s ‘OI’ range is powered by roucou oil (pronounced ru ‘ku) – a ‘secret’ ingredient beloved by native inhabitants of the Amazon rainforest, who rely on the fruits of the ‘Lipstick Tree’ to protect their skin and hair against the sun and other daily stresses. Intensely replenishing, Davines have harnessed the potency of this wonder-extract to create a range of shine-enhancing, moisture-boosting hair care treatments – suitable for all hair types, these exquisite products are perfect for nourishing, smoothing and ‘controlling’ weakened, dry or tempestuous tresses. By combining high-grade natural ingredients with first-rate scientific rigour, Davines’s founders the Bollati family have expanded their Parmese research laboratory into a multi-national hair care business with an inspiring range of original and authentic products, beloved by hosts of discerning celebrities and beauty buffs around the world. Available in two sizes, pick from either 280ml or 90ml for home and away.

name: Davines DEDE Conditioner Davines DEDE Conditioner
description: A light, detangling conditioner for those with fine or fragile hair, Davines’ DEDE Conditioner leaves your locks soft without limiting lift so your hair has a beautiful bounce. Perfect for those who’re committed to everyday cleansing, this delivers intense (but non-suffocating!) nourishment, to help tease the tangles and amplify shine while providing protection from daily aggressors. Ideal for all those prone to limp, lifeless lengths this is brimming with mineral-rich red celery extract (a source of fortifying sodium, potassium and calcium) and, although it feels wonderfully rich, it will strengthen your hair without quashing its volume. Sourced from a farm in Orbassano (a town in the Torino region), the red celery used within Davines’ DEDE range – part of their ‘Essential Haircare’ edit – is one of a handful of crops that are lovingly reared by Italian growers; showcasing the brand’s commitment to sustainability, as well as to supporting local industry. On a mission to preserve the planet’s vital biodiversity, each hair care ‘family’ (DEDE, NOUNOU and so on), represents an extract under threat, so by choosing to use this incredibly gentle (and very good-looking!) conditioner, you’re supporting the globe and its varied inhabitants – from plants to people!
how_to_use: Apply to towel dried hair after using {DEDE Shampoo}. Leave on for 2-5 minutes, comb through then rinse.

description: Designed to detoxify and loosen the product build-up, Pacifica’s Scalp Love Rosemary Mint Serum is infused herbal extracts of sage, thyme and witch hazel to bring balance to your scalp. Made in the USA with best globally sourced ingredients, this rosemary and mint-scented serum is the perfect way to purify congested scalps without disrupting the delicate ecosystem. As soothing and hydrating as it is detoxifying, this cocktail of panthenol, aloe leaf juice, sage, thyme and witch hazel can be used as a purifying pre-shampoo step or as an overnight treatment to thoroughly refresh your scalp.

description: To give your hair maximum volume while gently hydrating, Philip Kingsley's Body Building Conditioner boosts fine, limp hair with weightless body and bounce. It's enriched with wheat protein to both achieve this plumping and strengthen, as well as silicone to add shine and reduce static, all without adding any unwanted weight. Meanwhile, behentrimonium chloride smooths the cuticle and quickly detangles. Suitable for daily use and safe for colour-treated hair, Body Building Conditioner makes fine hair healthier and more manageable. And now this 'oomph'-boosting formula comes in a handy travel size (75ml) too because nobody fancies flat hair on their holidays.

description: Delivering a very happy medium, this gently refreshing shampoo restores control and near-blinding shine to hair that feels dry and dull. It’s infused with hair-strengthening hydrolysed keratin to encourage smooth, frizz-free lengths, while a blend of babassu and coconut oil grants deeply nourishing hydration to your hair. Last but definitely not least, the miracle ingredient behind this shampoo’s glossy shine is vitamin-rich kumquat fruit extract. description: Had it up to here with an itchy scalp? name: NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Shine Oil Mist NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Shine Oil Mist
description: The ultimate finishing spritz, NatureLab TOKYO's Shine Oil Mist lends locks a glass-effect gloss that's enhances the multiple tones of your tresses with nourishing butters and plant-derived oils. Brimming with antioxidant-rich grape extract – key to protecting the scalp by reducing the cell-damage wrought by free radicals – alongside pearl extract (it boosts hair's own enzymes to grant an iridescent finish) and platinum fibre (which wraps every shaft with a weightless, naturally reflective veil that ensures a phenomenal, mirror-like shine), this nutritive mist helps to elevate lustre and shield from the impact of heat and the elements. With a delicate perfume of violet and almond, as well as strand-plumping hyaluronic acid (it absorbs up to 1000 times its own weight in water), this super-charged blend is a boon for all those with bleached, coloured of chemically-treated hair – dialling up the brightness while widening the gap between appointments. Sulphate-, paraben- and cruelty-free, and made with sustainably sourced ingredients – not to mention the minimum packaging – say 'Hello!' to great hair and a squeaky-clean conscience.

name: Olaplex No. 5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner 100ml Olaplex No. 5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner 100ml
description: This chic and minimalist bottle holds the miracle-working active ingredient bis-aminopropyl diglycol dimaleate, which will help strengthen and repair damaged hair post colouring, bleaching, perming or heat-styling. A daily restoring and hydrating conditioner, this silky fluid deeply hydrates and strengthens hairs as well as repairing shattered hair bonds in-between your salon or styling sessions so you can carry on maintaining your favourite hair colour and style without the worry of damaging your hair beyond repair. name: Olaplex Unbreakable Blondes Mini Kit Olaplex Unbreakable Blondes Mini Kit
description: Calling all blondes! Say goodbye to dull, brassy, brittle hair with the Unbreakable Blondes Mini Kit, a four-step ritual designed to restore visible strength and vibrancy to blonde, lightened and grey hair. Working as a two-part system, the No.0 Hair Treatment and No.3 Hair Perfector™ draw upon the brand’s patented bond-building technology to repair visible damage and brittleness. Next up is No.4P Blonde Enhancer™ Toning Shampoo, a purple shampoo formulated to banish brassiness and brighten your blonde; all while cleansing hair of impurities. Completing your vibrancy-boosting routine, No.8 Bond Intense Moisture Mask restores weightless moisture (goodbye dry, dehydrated hair), adds shine and enhances smoothness.
how_to_use: No.0 (40ml): Before you wash your hair, apply No.0 slowly to dry hair, distributing evenly from root to tip and working into small sections by squeezing the liquid into the hair to be fully absorbed as you go. Hair should be damp, not drenched. Let process for 10 minutes then follow with No.3. Do not rinse at any point. No.3 (30ml): Use directly after No.0. Apply generously to damp hair from scalp to ends until hair is thoroughly saturated. Leave on for a minimum of 10 minutes (or longer if desired). Then, rinse well. No.4P (20ml): Apply to wet hair. Lather fully and leave on for 1-3 minutes. Rinse well. For more intense toning, leave on hair up to 5 minutes. No.8 (20ml): Apply mask to clean, damp hair mid-length to ends and work through with fingers. Leave on for 10 minutes. Rinse well and style as usual. Start with 2 pumps for shoulder-length hair. Use more for longer, thicker hair, and less for fine or short hair.

description: Dealing with all the tell-tale signs of hard water? Think dryness, brittleness, brassiness and dullness. Meet your new hair hero, HELLO KLEAN Hard Water Shampoo. Massage in to transform the bamboo charcoal-infused formula into a rich lather, lifting away the unwanted minerals that can leave lengths feeling limp and lacklustre. Oat protein restores softness and shine, while licorice root extract helps to stimulate growth to counteract any hard water-induced hair fall. Lactic acid infuses strands with hydration and boosts strength to leave strands feeling less fragile, super soft and totally weightless.

name: Philip Kingsley Elasticizer Deep-Conditioning Treatment 75ml Philip Kingsley Elasticizer Deep-Conditioning Treatment 75ml

A luxurious pre-shampoo conditioning treatment, Elasticizer has attained legendary status thanks to its deeply conditioning effects; originally formulated for Audrey Hepburn, it boosts elasticity, manageability, bounce and shine, delivering rich moisture in the cuticle without weighing strands down. Infused with exotic scent, this Coconut Breeze incarnation captures the scent of sunshine and pure white sands, taking your head on a holiday with warm notes of coconut, jasmine, almond and vanilla. Leave it on for a minimum of 10-20 minutes, or even overnight for a deep treatment when your hair needs some TLC. You can even sleep in Elasticizer Rinse thoroughly and shampoo and condition as normal. name: Amika Mighty Mini Dryer Amika Mighty Mini Dryer
description: amika's first travel-friendly hair dryer, the Mighty Mini Ionic Dryer is small enough to pop in your hand luggage, while still packing a powerful punch. In fact, we'd go as far as to say this is the secret for quick, frizz-free drying, wherever you are. Despite its small size, the Mighty Mini Ionic Dryer offers 1100 watts of drying power. And it harnesses amika's next-gen heat technology, emitting far-infrared heat that instantly penetrate the cortex of the hair cuticle, heating from the inside out. This means that hair is heated evenly and in half the time of conventional hair dryers, greatly reducing the risk of damage. It also means a whole lot less frizz and a whole lot more shine, no matter where you are in the world. Result.

description: All hair types can reap the rewards of Aveda’s smoothing pre-style treatment… formulated for all hair types and textures, from fine, medium and thick manes to straight 1A’s, wavy 2A-2C’s and curly 3A’s-3C’s and colour and chemically-treated hair. Transform your tresses with the revamped formula of the Smooth Infusion Style-Prep Smoother, infused with sand ginger to naturally protect vulnerable strands from the drying effects of UV rays. It’s smooth hair from here on out thanks to the botanical smoothing oil blend of Kalahari melon seed oil and Tamanu oil that conditions your cuticles and leaves your hair with a lust-worthy softness and shine. If you find yourself constantly battling against frizz-inducing humidity, you can thank Aveda for the invisible plant polymer shield that cloaks every single strand to repel water without the need for silicone. Finished with Aveda’s own ‘Pure-Fume Aroma’ of bergamot, palmarosa and Australian sandalwood to scent your tresses with an indulgent floral fragrance, we’re struggling to find a reason not to make this a mainstay in our styling routines. Available in a sized-to-try 25ml and shelfie-worthy 100ml, you need never be without this anti-frizz serum saviour.
