name: Bouclème Curl Cleanser 100ml Bouclème Curl Cleanser 100ml
description: Perfect for a co-wash day, the Curl Cleanser reinvigorates dry, undefined curls with mild cleansing agents coupled with nourishing ingredients. A creamy, non-foaming cleanser that boosts shine and strengthens curls. A mid-week wash doesn’t get much better than this. The Curl Cleanser (available in 100ml and 300ml) can be used for gentle washing or to keep the co-washers among us going. Starting with the scalp, this luxe formula uses decyl glucoside, a mild cleansing base to keep greasy roots far, far away; a helping of virgin coconut oil moisturises and strengthens, alongside organic aloe vera to condition and cleanse. Not only will your hair feel hydrated and soft, but it’ll look it too as Bouclème have formulated this shampoo with argan oil to impart a glossy, enviable shine.
how_to_use: Wet hair. Apply to fingertips and gently massage onto the scalp. Apply more to the length of your hair. Loosely detangle. Rinse thoroughly. Follow with conditioner.

name: BLEACH LONDON Fade To Grey Shampoo BLEACH LONDON Fade To Grey Shampoo
description: Swear by slate-toned tresses with BLEACH LONDON's Fade To Grey Shampoo. Battling brassiness in pre-lightened hair, this toning shampoo helps to maintain the coolest manes in the capital. Formulated with innovative anti-green stain (if you know you know) technology, this gentle mask-like cleanser refreshes lengths while helping to fade out-of-place warm tones and maintain your style. Shaking up your look and skipping the salon appointment, all without making a colour commitment, this clever formula grants a slate grey sheen that's perfect for topping up the coverage of already toned hair (on light blonde lengths gradual build up is key!). As if all that wasn't enough, the collection is completely cruelty-free and vegan – like all of BLEACH's products – so you can feel caring as well as über-cool.
how_to_use: Lather well into wet hair and massage through to ends. Leave in for 5-10 minutes then rinse thoroughly. Always follow the sensitivity guide in the package. Can stain skin, nails, bathroom tiles and grouting. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes. If product gets into eyes, rinse with water immediately. Avoid contact with clothing and towels.

name: Oribe Straight Away Smoothing Blowout Cream 5 oz. Oribe Straight Away Smoothing Blowout Cream 5 oz.
description: Transform even thick, curly, unruly tresses into smooth, sleek and straight locks with Oribe’s Straight Away Blowout Cream. Providing heat protection up to 450°, the formula minimises damage from heat styling while also strengthening, thanks to heat-activated protein and hydrolysed quinoa, which reduces breakage while providing subtle body and movement. The cream also fights humidity and frizz, smoothing strands with a straightening copolymer blend, sealing split ends with great mullein flower and nourishing with yacón root juice, a tropical plant native to Peru. Not only does this make blow drying easier and more manageable, it also makes your lock looks last longer – simply distribute evenly through damp hair and let your dryer do the rest of the work.
how_to_use: Distribute throughout damp hair, section by section, before blowing out silky smooth. A flat-iron finish adds extra perfection

name: BLEACH LONDON Total Bleach Kit BLEACH LONDON Total Bleach Kit
description: Bottling BLEACH London’s colour expertise so you can access it from the comfort of home, this Total Bleach Kit contains salon-standard bleach to lighten hair up to seven levels for gorgeous, platinum blonde shades. To help you achieve your lightest, brightest blonde – whether you’re a bleach-a-holic or just need a root touch-up – this kit contains a bottle of developing lotion (peroxide), two sachets of bleaching powder and a nourishing conditioning repair mask. Alongside this, there’s a pair of gloves (to keep your hands bleach-free) and an instruction leaflet to guide you through the mane-changing process. As if all that wasn’t enough, the collection is completely cruelty-free and vegan – like all of BLEACH’s products – so you can feel caring as well as über-cool.
how_to_use: Instructions included in box. This kit lightens hair up to 7 levels and contains BLEACH London REINCARNATION MASK for optimum hair health and is suitable for roots up to 2.5cm long. The colour achieved and the length of its duration can be influenced by many factors including: Condition of hair, previous treatments, hair colour, porosity, length and fineness of hair. Not suitable for hair that is very dark, has been dyed with henna, metallic dyes or colour restorers. Best results will be seen on mid-coloured untreated hair. You may need more than one pack if your hair is long, thick or hasn’t been dyed before. It’s always a good idea to have a second pack to hand just in case one runs out before you’re finished colouring.
ingredient: Bleaching Powder :- Potassium Persulfate, Ammonium Persulfate, Sodium Metasilicate, Magnesium Carbonate, Sodium Stearate, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Paraffinum Liquidum (Mineral Oil), Tetrasodium EDTA, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate. name: BLEACH LONDON Rose Conditioner 250ml BLEACH LONDON Rose Conditioner 250ml
description: As well as moisturising strands, BLEACH London’s Rosé Conditioner imparts a subtle touch of stunning pink colour. It can be used to neutralise unwanted green tones in your hair, or to enhance blonde shades with a soft, pastel pink rinse. Ideal used after BLEACH’s {Rosé Shampoo}, this is the perfect way to change up your style without making a big colour commitment, while also softening with shea butter and strengthening with hydrolysed wheat proteins. What’s more, like the entire BLEACH line, the luscious formula is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason to love it.
how_to_use: Apply to shampooed hair and massage through to the ends. Leave for 3-4 minutes. Rinse thoroughly. Use with BLEACH’s Rosé Shampoo for depth of colour.

name: OUAI Texturizing Hair Spray 130g OUAI Texturizing Hair Spray 130g
description: The perfect way to add some ‘grit’ to slippery hair types, OUAI’s Texturizing Hair Spray is ideal for recreating that enviable ‘French girl’ look – a tousled sexiness that exudes Parisian nonchalance. Invert your head and spray the roots to create ‘oomph’ (and absorb oil), then spray the lengths and ‘tszuj’ with fingers to achieve a separated, choppy finish. Enriched with OUAI’s ‘Smart Technology’ – a cocktail of nourishing ingredients including amino acids, tamarind seed, keratin, ama oil, hibiscus and jasmine to strengthen, enhance moisture levels, repair and protect from humidity – this refreshes, volumises and perfumes your strands with the delicate scents of Italian bergamot, rose, lily of the valley, waterlily, iris and white musk (ideal to disguise a stale, night-on-the-town odour).
how_to_use: Shake it up. Holding the bottle 6" from your head, mist dry hair from roots to ends. For ultimate volume, flip hair upside down and spray. Jen's Tip: Mist it on dry hair and scrunch strands out with your fingers for a loose, lived-in look. Flip hair upside down and spray for instantly fresh-looking hair.

name: OUAI Wave Spray 145ml OUAI Wave Spray 145ml
description: From celebrity coiffeuse Jen Atkin – responsible for maintaining the manes of Klan Kardashian, Gigi Hadid and Gwen Stefani (to name a few) – OUAI’s ouai-ve spray grants gorgeous separation and flexible hold while perfuming your hair with its heavenly blend of Italian lemon, rose de mai, magnolia, lily, blackberry, cedarwood, amber, patchouli, sandalwood and white musk. Simply twist still-damp hair and mist lengths with Wave Spray then ‘unravel’ to reveal enviable, ‘French girl’ bed-hair texture.

name: dpHUE ACV Hair Rinse - 8.5 oz dpHUE ACV Hair Rinse - 8.5 oz
description: The cycle of over-shampooing is a hard one to kick but it’s essential for maintaining the vibrancy of your hair colour. dpHUE's advice? Skip the shampoo, reach for the rinse — their Apple Cider Vinegar Hair Rinse, that is. Made with artisanal crafted apple cider vinegar from George Paul Vinegary, it's a shampoo substitute that gently cleanses and removes impurities without stripping hair colour and natural oils that are essential to scalp and hair health. It works in tandem with argan oil, lavender extract and aloe vera to help seal the cuticle, add shine, protect your colour, soothe your scalp and moisturise your strands. Who said you needed to shampoo to reveal your shine?
how_to_use: Wet scalp and hair. Squeeze excess water out. Apply directly to scalp. Massage into scalp and hair. Leave in 1–3 minutes. Rinse thoroughly.

name: Drybar Hold Me Hair Clips Drybar Hold Me Hair Clips
description: The key to the bouncy, sought-after blow-dry lies in the prep, so make sure you section your hair in style with the Hold Me Hair Clips, the easy (and cute) way to hold small to large sections of your tresses without leaving stubborn dents behind. Perfect for keeping your strands out of the way while you create your bouncy blowout, these 'alligator jaw' hair clips are designed to stay put without slipping as you style. Efficiency is the goal when heat styling, and these grips make your drying time more effective and less time-consuming thanks to the jointed arm that holds small or large sections of hair. Created for use on wet and dry hair, these buttercup-yellow grips are a hair care essential.
how_to_use: Use to section hair during blow-drying, curling, or straightening. For damp styling, use lower arm as a comb to create vertical sections in hair and clip. Makes blow-drying more effective and efficient. For dry styling, use lower arm to create horizontal sections below the part in dry hair and clip for optimal use of Drybar Detox Shampoos & Conditioners.

name: Olaplex Hero Bundle Olaplex Hero Bundle
description: Over done it with the dye or scorched your strands with your straighteners? Allow us to introduce you to OLAPLEX's Hero Bundle: a three-piece routine of their hair repair heroes. Earning upwards of 500 reviews, the No 3 Hair Perfector (100ml) is a pre-shampoo that's powered by star ingredient bis-aminopropyl diglycol dimaleate (sounds science-y, we know) to strengthen and repair damage post-colouring, bleaching or heat styling. A daily cleansing and repairing shampoo, the No 4 Bond Maintenance Shampoo (250ml) deeply hydrates and strengthens hairs as well as repairing shattered hair bonds in between your salon or styling sessions, so you can carry on maintaining your favourite hair colour and style without the worry of damaging your hair beyond repair. Follow this with the No 5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner (250ml), which repairs hair bonds and gently restores hydration levels without adding excess weight. This hydrating formula is perfect for eliminating damaged frizz and promoting strong, healthy and shiny hair.

name: Hair by Sam McKnight Deeper Love Intense Treatment Mask 50ml Hair by Sam McKnight Deeper Love Intense Treatment Mask 50ml
description: Is your mane calling out for a little tender loving care? Treat your tresses to the newest launch from the genius mind that is Sam McKnight and introduce the Deep Love Intense Treatment Mask to your hair care ritual. Intensely nourishing, this hydration mask restores dull and lacklustre hair to its former glory. Brimming with shea butter and ‘RepHair’ to soften stressed-out strands and bring back the much-coveted lustre you’ve been lacking, this 5-minute mask is the perfect excuse to indulge in self care moment. Catering for damaged strands, an infusion of plant keratin gives your hair the love and attention it deserves and is sure to leave you with that ‘just-left-the-salon-’ swish. With a 50ml and long-lasting 200ml to choose from, you’d need never be without the ‘love’ of your hair’s life…
how_to_use: Apply to wet air, gently comb through, leave in for at least 5 minutes then rinse.

name: Coco & Eve Super Hydrating Conditioner 258ml Coco & Eve Super Hydrating Conditioner 258ml
description: Two times thicker than the average conditioner for intense and mask-like conditioning, the Super Hydrating Conditioner will revive damaged hair with a powerful blend of hyaluronic acid and Balinese botanicals. For visibly glossier, shinier and smoother lengths, a hyaluronic acid complex feeds parched hair with moisture – turning back time on dryness, coarseness and frizz – while pineapple fruit enzymes slough away dirt, dry skin and excess product build-up. A fermented oil complex (featuring the likes of argan, almond and green tea oils) gives shine and strength without weighing hair down, and nourishing avocado pumps strands with proteins and vitamins before sealing hair cuticles for a lustrous look. Coconut feeds lengths with fatty acids to seal split ends too, and the iconic coconut and fig scent will transport you straight to a tropical island...
how_to_use: On clean and damp hair, work a small amount onto lengths and ends. Leave for up to three minutes, then rinse thoroughly. Pro-tip: use after the {Super Hydrating Shampoo} for thoroughly cleansed and hydrated hair.

name: HELLO KLEAN Shower Head Refill Cartridges HELLO KLEAN Shower Head Refill Cartridges
description: A hero for skin and hair, the HELLO KLEAN Purifying Shower Head tackles the drying effects of hard water - no plumbing qualification or water softening system required. When it's ready for a refresh, simply swap in a new Shower Head Refill Cartridges to continue saving water, boosting pressure and filtering out unwanted metals, chlorine and impurities. Featuring advanced two-step filtration powered by amino acids, activated carbon fibre and KDF 55, this clever shower system head removes water-soluble metals (including lead, iron, mercury and nickel), trihalomethane (THMs) and odour. This softer water is kinder on skin and hair, and the boosted pressure makes short work of rinsing out suds for lightweight locks and happier skin.
how_to_use: Remove the Purifying Shower Head and lay on a flat, stable surface. Place a wrench onto the triangle tip of the shower head, handle facing outwards. Place one hand on the wrench, and hold Shower Head with your other hand. Press down and steadily turn the headpiece counterclockwise. Refill the headpiece cartridge. Twist the bottom handle counterclockwise to swap out the carbon cartridge.

name: Aveda Botanical Repair Strengthening Conditioner 200ml Aveda Botanical Repair Strengthening Conditioner 200ml
description: Winner of the 'Ultimate Shampoo and Conditioner' Grazia Award in 2020 and the 'Best Conditioner for Damaged Hair' Marie Claire Hair Award in 2021, Aveda’s Botanical Repair Strengthening Conditioner nourishes and instantly detangles, helping to rebuild brittle strands for a supple, soft and silky result. With 98% nature-derived ingredients, this deep-conditioning hero smooths, strengthens and separates compromised hair – feeding your lengths with a cocktail of healing, replenishing extracts that maximise shine and help minimise breakage. Suitable for all hair types and textures – even colour-treated and chemically processed – this featherweight formula helps to restore heat- or bleach-weakened hair to its natural glory, while its heavenly scent will envelop your headspace with beautiful, mood-boosting fragrance.
how_to_use: Use following Botanical Repair Strengthening Shampoo. Massage into wet hair, rinse well.

name: Drybar The Double Shot Blow-Dryer Brush Drybar The Double Shot Blow-Dryer Brush
description: We're pretty sure it's not just us that has spent hours on end trying to grapple with a barrel brush and hair dryer to create the hairdresser-level blow-dry at home… only to end up with aching arms and frizzy, flat hair that simply refuses to cooperate. If this picture resonates a little too profoundly with you then (thankfully) Drybar has just the tool to solve all your hair woes. The Double Shot Oval Blow-Dryer Brush combines the hot air of a hair dryer with the structure and shape of a round brush to help you create the lusted-after blowout of dreams. Gone are the days of trying to coordinate two tools and constantly rest your aching arms, this does all the work for you. Great for hair types from wavy to curly and poker straight, this ergonomically-designed tool is lightweight and easy to use so you can style your hair stress-free. Customise your blowout with three temperature settings, and the combination of nylon and tufted bristles brings you total control and optimal tension over your tresses. Worried about frizzy strands ruining your 'do? The clever minds at Drybar have infused ionic technology into The Double Shot to help seal the hair cuticle and leave your strands shining and frizz-free. You can use this on wet or even dry hair to extend the life of your style and create a smooth, complete look between hair wash days. The at-home blow-dry just got a seriously effortless upgrade…
how_to_use: After shampooing, thoroughly towel-dry hair to remove excess water. Brush out hair using a detangling brush or comb, and separate into large sections. Place The Double Shot underneath each section and work it slowly from roots to ends until the section is dry and smooth. For Volume at the Roots: Use horizontally at the crown and pull through from roots to ends in an upward motion. For Extra Thick or Long Hair: Rough dry with a regular blow-dryer before using The Double Shot. To Extend Your Blowout: Use on DRY hair to create a smooth, finished look.
ingredient: Dual Plug

name: Briogeo Superfoods Avocado and Kiwi Mega Moisture 3-In-1 Leave-In Spray 51ml Briogeo Superfoods Avocado and Kiwi Mega Moisture 3-In-1 Leave-In Spray 51ml
description: Available in a handy travel size (51ml) or long-lasting full size (170ml), the Superfoods Avocado + Kiwi Mega Moisture 3-in-1 Leave-In Spray fortifies, nourishes and protects your mane wherever you are — all while adding just the right amount of slip and helping to detangle too. With 97% naturally-derived ingredients, this leave-in spray is fortified with spinach, chia seeds, and cocoa seed butter, which together leave strands shiny and much more manageable. Alongside that you’ll find avocado oil, packed with fatty acids to nourish and condition hair; kiwi extract, which is high in vitamin C to undo and protect against environmental damage that can leave hair dry and deflated; and organic sunflower extract, a powerful antioxidant that stops UV damage in its tracks.
how_to_use: Shake well and spray lightly throughout clean, damp hair, focusing on mid-length to ends. Gently comb through hair to evenly distribute product and detangle. Do not rinse out.

name: Aveda Scalp Solutions Balancing Shampoo 200ml Aveda Scalp Solutions Balancing Shampoo 200ml
description: Introducing the Scalp Solutions Balancing Shampoo, your new wash day essential set to restore out-of-whack scalps and reveal silky soft strands. Available in a full size 100ml and travel-friendly 50ml, this shampoo is a must-add to your wash day rituals. The skinification of hair is here to stay, and Aveda’s problem-solving Scalp Solutions range has everything you need to restore harmony and reset your scalp. Start your wash day the right way with the Scalp Solutions Balancing Shampoo, enriched with plant-derived cleansing agents this restorative formula gently cleanses while removing problematic product build-up. Whether your scalp is normal, dry or oily, this cooling shampoo works to boost hydration by up to 92%… salon-worthy shine incoming in three, two, one...
how_to_use: Massage into wet hair and scalp. Rinse well. Follow with scalp solutions replenishing conditioner. Use daily or as often as needed.

name: Oribe Gold Lust Dry Shampoo 300ml Oribe Gold Lust Dry Shampoo 300ml
description: Oribe's opulent Gold Lust Dry Shampoo is in a different league to traditional formulas. Not only does it instantly refresh scalp and strands, it also nourishes and smooths locks, imparting the brand's signature Cote d'Azur scent with advanced fragrance-retention technology, which allows it to remain throughout the day. The formula features a translucent starch blend to instantly absorb dirt, oil, impurities and product build-up, leaving hair feeling 'just washed', while celery seed extract reduces oil on the scalp, helping to extend the time between washes. Alongside this, bamboo and rice silks leave hair instantly smooth and silky-soft, myrrh extract nourishes and fortifies and lavender and chamomile moisturise and hydrate to sooth a dry, itchy scalp. Oribe's signature bio-restorative complex (including plant collagen, caffeine and biotin) defends hair from oxidative stress while also guarding against the deterioration of natural keratin. With notes of Calabrian bergamot, white butterfly jasmine and sandalwood, Oribe's signature scent makes this dry shampoo a total pleasure to use - plus, the bottle adds a touch of luxe opulence to any dressing table (or handbag).
how_to_use: Shake well. Spray eight to ten inches from scalp. Tousle with fingers or brush through until product is completely absorbed. The result: clean, weightless, healthy hair.

name: OUAI Fragrance Free Curl Crème 236ml OUAI Fragrance Free Curl Crème 236ml
description: To craft their Curl Crème - Fragrance Free - the brand's very first unscented formula - the minds behind OUAI Haircare turned to the most knowledgable, discerning people they know: their very own curly-haired community. That's right, this luscious blend was co-created with 150 members of their community and faced over a year of testing before they were sure it was worthy of touching your curls... This does-it-all styling cream is brimming with conditioning plant oils that add definition, shine and impressive hydration to parched coils, curls and ringlets. It's unique consistency first goes on like a cream before melting into your hair with the swiftness of an oil; speaking of which, at the heart of the formula is a frizz-smoothing duo of chia and linseed oils that emphasise the shape of your curls as well as protecting them against humidity. Coconut oil then floods your hair with hydration and helps to seal damaged cuticles, while babassu oil softens and enhances shine. The fragrance-free edition is also ideal for cocktailing with other curl treatments without overwhelming your senses! That's not the only thing they left out; this vegan cream is also free from silicones, SLS, parabens, phthalates and gluten. Psst, the tube is also made out of sugarcane plastic, making it 100% recyclable!
how_to_use: On wet hair: To prevent breakage, section and detangle your hair using a wide-tooth comb (stay away from bristle brushes because they can disrupt your curl pattern) Start with a dime-size amount of Curl Crème and evenly distribute it with your fingers (it’s super creamy and melts into your curls like an oil) Comb through each section using your fingers to ensure Curl Crème blesses each and every curve Let your hair dry, then say hello to your softest curls ever If you plan on heat styling later and want heat protection, pair Curl Crème with OUAI Leave In Conditioner, our multitasking detangler and leave-in that provides thermal heat protection and weightless hydration On dry hair: A little bit of Curl Crème goes a long OUAI in refreshing day-two or day-three curls. On dry hair, apply Curl Crème sparingly and directly to your curls to help define and smooth frizz and flyaways.

name: NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Volume Shampoo NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Volume Shampoo
description: If your hairs looking limp and in need of an oomph boost then reach straight for NatureLab TOKYOs Volume Shampoo a build-up dissolving and root-lifting cocktail of plant extracts and proteins to amplify lift and build body. A petal-pink cleanser that smells like Japans cherry blossoms, this expertly blended shampoo is a boon for limp hair that requires reviving. Starring apple extracts to replenish the scalp and maintain equilibrium (they're great for inhibiting hair loss), alongside rice and soy proteins to add weightless moisture and fortify delicate strands so your hair becomes thicker and less prone to breakage, this treats every strand with the same care you'd show to your prized silks and cashmeres. The addition of sakura extract great for preserving your colour and optimising brightness makes this the ultimate threat for flat, brittle and flyaway manes. We're calling it a 'hair lift' in a bottle... Want to top up your bottle without getting another bottle? You can now invest in refills; double the portion of a bottle but with 85% less plastic than two full-size bottles, these eco-friendly pouches are as good for the earth as they are your purse.
how_to_use: Wash, rinse and repeat if required.

name: Function of Beauty Thermal Protection #Hairgoal Booster Shots 11.8ml Function of Beauty Thermal Protection #Hairgoal Booster Shots 11.8ml
description: Better safe than sorry! We’re sure that in a different, far away land, high temperatures don’t result in damage or split ends but until we crack that code, Thermal Protection Hair Goal is here to be your ultimate bodyguard against every heat styling faux pas. Shielding your strands against high heat, this formula is fused with sesame protein that works to seal in moisture and resurrect your once-healthy locks. Coating your tresses with much-needed protection, this 100% vegan styling essential ensures that your ‘dos stay safe at all costs. Is that a salon-worthy finish we detect?
how_to_use: Snap open your #hairgoal. Pour 1 shot into any of your Function of Beauty hair care bases. Each box contains 2 shots. Shake (or stir!) for 15 seconds!
ingredient: Water(Aqua/Eau), Hydrolyzed Sesame Protein Pg-Propyl Methylsilanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Butylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Potassium Sorbate, Hexylene Glycol.

name: Color Wow Dream Coat Curly Travel Size 75ml Color Wow Dream Coat Curly Travel Size 75ml
description: The fan-favourite formula but served up in a travel-friendly iteration, Color Wow's Dream Coat for Curly Hair Travel is a savvy way to stay on-the-go with the crunch-free formula that restores bounce and definition without weighing your curls down! The featherweight styling aid is powered by a tri-polymer complex – known as Elasta-flex – that ensures your tresses stay silky, glossy and hydrated without losing their flexibility. It’s carefully crafted to support the styling routines of wavy, curly and spiralled strands with an undetectable (bar its show-stopping glossy finish) veil that revives limp and non-defined manes.
how_to_use: After shampooing and conditioning or alternatively, wetting hair thoroughly, gently squeeze out excess moisture. Comb if desired. Spray liberally, section by section (making sure to spray underneath sections as you go !). Air dry, or blow-dry using a diffuser.

name: Augustinus Bader The Scalp Treatment 30ml Augustinus Bader The Scalp Treatment 30ml
description: On the hunt for a treatment that boosts scalp health by calming irritation and clearing blocked hair follicles — leading to a fuller, stronger, shinier mane that (we guarantee) will turn heads? Look no further than Augustinus Bader’s The Scalp Treatment with TCF8. This supercharged serum delivers a healthy dose of scalp-loving ingredients directly where you want the, including the amnio-acid rich ‘TFC8 Complex’, which promotes skin renewal and repair, helping to ‘rev up’ sluggish hair follicles and boost strand growth considerably. Alongside this is a powerful ‘Multi-Mineral Active Complex’, which uses a carefully-formulated cocktail of magnesium, zinc and copper energise the cells and tissue of your scalp; l-arginine, an amino-acid present in keratin that helps to smooth and hydrate your mane, preventing breakage in the process; and peppermint extract which refreshes and balances the scalp to help return it to its natural pH level.
how_to_use: Apply a few drops to a clean, damp scalp in sections from the hair line to the crown of the head, focusing on problem areas. Use the push button and specific glass nozzle for a precise application. Gently massage into the scalp with your finger tips or a comb. Do not rinse. Leave to dry naturally or blow dry and style as usual. Use 2 to 3 times per week as needed.

name: OUAI Rose Hair and Body Oil 99ml OUAI Rose Hair and Body Oil 99ml
description: OUAI Haircare’s blissfully scented, moisturising Rose Hair & Body Oil is too good to confine to just one part of your body... Enriched with absinthium, shea and rosehip oils, it works to nourish and protect stressed-out tresses – when applied from mid-lengths to tips, it offers UV protection, seals in moisture and re-injects shine back into lacklustre locks. Applied to thirsty skin (or pulse points, perfume-style) this luxurious oil softens, hydrates and illuminates, imparting a radiant glow. OUAI’s signature fragrance blend of rose, bergamot, lychee and white musk is pretty much impossible to resist and, once applied to your mane and limbs, all will be fooled into thinking it’s your natural scent. Free from parabens, silicones and animal testing, this looks, smells and does good – what more could you want from an oil?
how_to_use: Apply a pump from mid-lengths to tips of hair before styling to seal in moisture and shine while protecting against heat damage Rub a thin layer over skin to soften, hydrate and illuminate. Massage into pulse points for an extra dose of OUAI N°5.

name: Hair by Sam McKnight Lazy Girl Dry Shampoo Hair by Sam McKnight Lazy Girl Dry Shampoo
description: A dry shampoo and a styling product in its own right, Hair by Sam McKnights Lazy Girl Dry Shampoo is perfect for those lazy (or hectically busy!) days in between washes. The ultra-light powder mist absorbs excess oil to refresh hair from scalp to ends. As well as these revitalising capabilities, this hard-working hair hero also imparts enviable body, volume and subtle texture and hold its enough to fool everyone into thinking that your locks are freshly washed. Sam McKnight's top tip is to spray it onto a brush for a lighter effect this is ideal for fringes and for absorbing any excess oil around the hairline, especially after applying skin care or make up. The culmination of McKnights iconic expertise and experience in the industry, his irresistible hair care collection offers the products you need to achieve professional standards of styling at home in mere minutes and we just can't get enough. As well as professional appeal, this dry shampoo smells divine, with a luscious, botanical scent (green leaf, herbs, watery flowers and pepper, against a backdrop of frankincense, cedar and juniper wood crafted by perfumer Lyn Harris) so that your locks will smell sublime as well as looking timelessly chic.Available in a full-size and an all-new travel (50ml) size, you can keep one at home and one close at hand.
how_to_use: Shake well before use. For best results, direct spray into hair roots. Work through the hair with a brush. For a lighter effect (great for fringes and oiliness in the hair line) spray onto a brush and sweep through gently.

name: Davines VOLU Volume Enhancing Shampoo 250ml Davines VOLU Volume Enhancing Shampoo 250ml
description: Tailored towards those with fine hair that’s consistently smothered by everyday build-up and environmental grime, VOLU Shampoo gently cleanses without damaging your strands’ structure. With a mixture of mild surfactants to leave hair clean without weighing it down, and hops extract to revitalise, soothe and provide a natural root-boost, this heavenly-scented Shampoo will soon transform limp, lacklustre locks into enviable crowning glories.

name: Davines MELU Anti-Breakage Lustrous Shampoo 250ml Davines MELU Anti-Breakage Lustrous Shampoo 250ml
description: This shampoo is ideal for long hair that's prone to breakage and split ends as it will cleanse gently without damaging the strands' structure. The MELU range is intensely nourishing thanks to natural ingredients like olive oil and strengthening spinach leaf extract (a vitamin-rich antioxidant), but won't weigh the hair down, so it's ideal if you have long, fine tresses. This shampoo will make your hair incredibly manageable, full-bodied and shiny, plus it smells divine!

name: HELLO KLEAN Clarifying Scalp Soak 50ml HELLO KLEAN Clarifying Scalp Soak 50ml
description: Whether product build-up has left your lengths limp and lacklustre, or pollution is raining on your parade, this Clarifying Scalp Soak from HELLO KLEAN is here to change your fortunes. Tested on all hair types - from wispy fine hair to gloriously textured coils - this vegan-friendly soak is especially effective for oily scalps and trichologistas with extensive styling regimes. The multitasking formula works two-fold to detoxify your scalp, shifting build-up (be it from product, excess oils or hardwater minerals) and delivering skin-loving ingredients that ultimately encourage healthy, softer hair. Want to see its qualifications? It's powered by apple cider vinegar and phytic acid to whisk away follicle-clogging residue without stripping your scalp; fermented rice water and tamanu oil then replenish moisture levels to nourish your hair and scalp; finally, pro-vitamin B5 and rice seed protein help to restore damaged hair, improving its integrity and making it less brittle. Consider us obsessed...

name: Philip Kingsley Elasticizer Extreme Rich Deep-Conditioning Treatment 75ml Philip Kingsley Elasticizer Extreme Rich Deep-Conditioning Treatment 75ml
description: An intensified version of an iconic hair hero, Philip Kingsley’s Elasticizer Extreme will transform your hair care ritual, even if you’re struggling with very dry, damaged hair. A luxurious pre-shampoo conditioning treatment, Elasticizer has attained legendary status and legions of fans thanks to its deeply conditioning effects – and this edition contains higher active doses of its clever ingredients to offer even more intense benefits. Originally formulated for Audrey Hepburn, the formula boosts elasticity, manageability, bounce and shine, delivering rich moisture in the cuticle without weighing strands down. Leave it on for a minimum of 10-20 minutes or even overnight for a deep treatment when your hair needs some TLC. A total treat for tresses, the formula stars hydrolysed elastin, castor oil, olive oil and glycerine to boost hydration and lock in moisture, to leave hair looking intensely nourished, healthy and shiny – and all before you’ve used shampoo. Impressive! With frequent use, you can expect stronger, healthier hair and less breakage – you’ll never want to wash your hair without it.
how_to_use: Apply before shampooing Dampen the hair with water and apply Elasticizer Extreme in sections to mid-lengths and ends, ensuring maximum coverage Cover hair with a shower cap or towel. The heat created helps the nutrients to be fully absorbed Leave for a minimum of 10-20 minutes, or as long as you wish. You can even sleep in Elasticizer Extreme Rinse thoroughly and shampoo and condition as normal. You can shampoo twice if you want to ensure all residue is removed Suitable for use on coloured hair Note: Do not use Elasticizer 72 hours before or after dying your hair as it may affect how the colour takes during this period only

name: Briogeo Vegan Boar Bristle Brush Briogeo Vegan Boar Bristle Brush
description: A boar bristle brush without... well, boar bristles, this vegan alternative offers the same smoothing and polishing benefits without any animal-derived fibres. Great for detangling straight, wavy, curly or coiled hair, Briogeo's Vegan Boar Bristle Brush helps to tease any tats without damaging strands - paving the way to a high-shine (less frizzy!) finish. Lightweight, ergonomic and thoughtfully engineered, this bristles feature ballpoint tips to gently massage the scalp - stimulating bloodflow to invigorate your roots - while the multi-layered bristles glide through every strand to separate while minimising 'ouches'. Sufficiently resilient to cope with even thick hair, this vegan and cruelty-free option leaves hair smooth and healthy-looking. Plus, it's lilac! Sold.

ingredient: Synthetic bristles.

name: Gisou Propolis Infused Polishing Primer 75ml Gisou Propolis Infused Polishing Primer 75ml
description: Diminishes frizz, reduces drying time, increases hold… there’s not much the Propolis Infused Polishing Primer can’t do when it comes to shaving time (not to mention effort) off your styling routine. The key ingredient here really is propolis, a volume- and definition-boosting superhero that fuels all of Gisou’s superstar styling range. Produced and used by bees to build strong beehives, propolis contains plenty of oils, vitamins, minerals and flavonoids to protect your hair and keep it at its most healthy. It doesn’t just enhance your styling process either; it helps to restore strands back to their former glory by preventing breakage and repairing split ends.
how_to_use: Squeeze a pea-sized amount of primer onto the palms of your hands and warm by rubbing hands together. Work hands through damp or dry hair by running fingers from root to tip. Style as desired.

name: BLEACH LONDON Champagne Super Toner Kit BLEACH LONDON Champagne Super Toner Kit
description: Champagne-hued locks are officially chic – and there’s no better way to nail this trend than BLEACH London’s Champagne Toner Kit. A nourishing semi-permanent toner, this covetable kit contains all you need to add pearly blonde, golden tones to pre-lightened hair. There’s a tube of colourant, a bottle of developer lotion (peroxide) and a deeply conditioning treatment mask to care for coloured strands, as well as a pair of plastic gloves and an instruction leaflet to keep things as foolproof as possible. As if all that wasn’t enough, the collection is completely cruelty-free and vegan – like all of BLEACH’s products – so you can feel caring as well as über-cool. It will last for around 16-20 washes on pre-lightened hair.
how_to_use: Lasts for around 16-20 washes. For use on pre-lightened hair. If your hair isn’t already blonde, use BLEACH LONDON TOTAL BLEACH, BLEACH LONDON DIY DIP DYE or BLEACH LONDON BEACH LIGHTS to lighten hair first. The colour achieved and the length of its duration can be influenced by many factors including: Hair condition, porosity, length, fineness, shade and any previous treatments. The final effect will depend on your current hair colour. Best results will be seen on already bleached or highlighted blonde hair. You may need more than one pack if your hair is long, thick or hasn’t been dyed before. It’s always a good idea to have another pack to hand just in case one runs out before you’re finished colouring. Follow with BLEACH LONDON LIVE FOREVER SHAMPOO every other wash to maintain your sparkling tone.

name: Pattern Styling Cream 443.6ml Pattern Styling Cream 443.6ml
description: Rich and juicy with nourishing ingredients, the versatile Styling Cream delivers unrivalled levels of moisture to coat curls and bring out the best of your curl pattern, no matter what style you don. As with all Pattern hair care, the Styling Cream is free of SLS/SLES, parabens, formaldehyde... the list goes on. But what it has got is a oil-rich blend of shea butter, cacay oil and sweet almond oil that helps to nourish curls and protect them from breakage, while improving hair retention so all the good stuff can stay in. Holding frizz down with a lightweight hold, this curl cream is perfect for setting twist outs, braid outs, bantu knots and much much more. Leaving a light floral scent comprised of neroli, rose and patchouli, this cream makes dry, frizzy hair a thing of the past and is designed the bring out the best of your own unique curls.
how_to_use: Apply hair styling cream on wet hair or dry hair as you style or braid. Pro tip: For protective styles, use this hair product to seal the hair with moisture before styling. Extra pro tip for healthy hair: For locs hair type, apply styling curl cream as you retwist each strand for shine, definition & hold.

name: Briogeo Farewell Frizz Smooth + Shine Hair Care Minis Briogeo Farewell Frizz Smooth + Shine Hair Care Minis
description: Sure to trigger a life-long obsession with one of Briogeo's bestselling lines, this Farewell Frizz Smooth + Shine Hair Care Minis set stars a four-piece hair care routine that spans from shampoo to styling creme. Expect silky, frizz-free locks! Repairing damage and protecting against future breakage and colour fade, this sulphate-free Farewell Frizz™ Smoothing Shampoo (59 ml) comprehensively cleanses without stripping hair, so that all that marvellous moisture is maintained. Packed with ultra-nourishing rosehip, argan and coconut oils, the Farewell Frizz™ Smoothing Conditioner (59 ml) swiftly restores a silky sheen to dry, brittle and lacklustre locks by sealing the uplifted cuticle to lock in moisture. Like luscious, lock-loving milk, the Farewell Frizz™ Rosarco Milk Leave-In Conditioning Spray (51 ml) restores hair’s softness, strength, manageability and moisture levels, while also acting as an effective barrier against heat. Offering further heat protection and weightless hydration for a flawless finish, the Farewell Frizz™ Blow Dry Perfection & Heat Protectant Crème (59 ml) leaves hair smooth, shiny and protected from heat up to 425°F – curling wands and straightening irons at the ready!
how_to_use: Farewell Frizz™ Smoothing Shampoo: apply to wet hair and vigorously massage for about 30 seconds as the lather builds, then rinse. If your hair has extra build-up, rinse and repeat. Farewell Frizz™ Smoothing Conditioner: after shampooing, dispense and apply evenly throughout hair length. Let sit for two minutes before rinsing. For best results, finish with Rosarco Milk™ Reparative Leave-In Conditioning Spray and/or Rosarco Oil™ prior to blow drying or using heat tools. Farewell Frizz™ Rosarco Milk Leave-In Conditioning Spray: spray throughout clean, damp hair with focus on mid-length to ends of hair. Blow-dry or air-dry and style as usual. Farewell Frizz™ Blow Dry Perfection & Heat Protectant Crème: apply one to two quarter-sized amounts to freshly washed, damp hair, evenly from root to tip then blow dry and style as desired. Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. For external use only.

name: SILKE London Coco Hair Ties SILKE London Coco Hair Ties
description: The brainchild of a London hairstylist, SILKE London’s brand-founder Maria was frustrated – waking up each day to frizzy, fragile hair (and a pillowcase strewn with split ends). The solution? 100% pure silk, which not only respects hair and reduces risk of breakage, but also helps to smooth and enhance shine so your locks stay strong, long and lustrous. Each pack boasts six silk-wrapped bobbles, to effortlessly secure your ballet bun, high pony or pigtails (whatever your hair’s thickness) – just choose from three colours: ‘Cleopatra’ (classic black), ‘Coco’ (pretty champagne-pink) or ‘Frida’ (with a rainbow of rich, sumptuous jewelled hues). As well as looking gorgeous (as great on your wrist as in your hair) SILKE Hair Ties glide against hair, eliminating the friction, clawing and snapping of abrasive traditional elastics, to prevent damage, breakages and split-ends. Redesigned with your feedback in mind, these are the best hair ties you'll ever own...
how_to_use: Use to tie your hair up, in lieu of traditional elastics which can snap your precious strands.
ingredient: Specially selected super elastic interior, 100% pure silk exterior.

name: Solaris Labs NY Intensive LED Hair Growth Brush Solaris Labs NY Intensive LED Hair Growth Brush
description: Brush your way to healthier hair (and scalp) with the LED Hair Brush from New York beauty tech innovators, Solaris Laboratories. Combining LED light therapy with gentle vibrations, this clever brush fast-tracks you to your hair growth goals. Used like any other hair brush, the silicone bristles expose the scalp to both red and blue LED light therapy. These wavelengths are known to help stimulate growth, slow hair loss, promote thicker locks, soothe irritated scalps and increase the size of hair follicles for stronger strands. A relaxing massage (courtesy of 6000 gentle vibrations per minute) seals the deal for shiny, swishably healthy hair, aiding the absorption of hair care products and boosting blood flow to nourish every follicle.
how_to_use: Use on dry hair only. Alternate between the different modes during each use:  Gentle vibratory massage on the scalp for 1 minute. Using the red LED mode, massage and brush your hair for a few minutes. In blue LED mode, comb the lengths of your hair for a few minutes.

name: Oribe Bright Blonde Shampoo - Travel 2.53 fl. oz. Oribe Bright Blonde Shampoo - Travel 2.53 fl. oz.
description: Achieve your most beautiful blonde with Oribe’s Bright Blonde Shampoo for Beautiful Color, a revitalising violet cleanser that corrects brassiness and yellow-orange tones for hair that is healthier, shinier and ‘lit from within’. The sulphate-free formula is specially designed to gently cleanse without stripping, thanks to coconut and corn-derived cleansers. Available in two sizes, pick from the 250ml full size or the 75ml mini to try this fan favourite on for size (or ensure you're never without your go-to while travelling. It’s also enhanced with pure violet pigment and reflective pearls, as well as a brightening complex – of lemon, ginger root and chamomile extracts – to optimise your hair colour and luminosity. Purple orchid extract, known as the flower of longevity, repairs damage, conditions and prevents moisture loss, while Swiss garden cress sprouts, high in phyto-nutrients, detoxify and protect hair from environmental aggressors. Boosting this protection, Oribe’s signature complex (crafted from watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower extracts) defend hair from oxidative stress and the deterioration of natural collagen, while multi-UV protection shields hair from the colour-depleting effects of the sun’s rays.
how_to_use: Oribe says: Lather, indulge, rinse.

name: BLEACH LONDON Super Cool Colour Just Like Honey BLEACH LONDON Super Cool Colour Just Like Honey
description: Ensure that your mane is anything but run-of-the-mill (without the colour commitment) with BLEACH London’s Super Cool Colour, a non-permanent hair colour cream mask that transforms bleached and toned tresses. In just 30 minutes, this rich, luscious mask can reveal a rainbow of bold, chic shades. From beautifully bright ‘The Big Pink’ to perfect pastels ‘Awkward Peach’ and ‘Blullini’, to brilliantly bold turquoise ‘Washed Up Mermaid’, there’s a shade to suit every aesthetic. Each shade has a different lifecycle - the more subtle 'Rosé' will fade in 1-3 washes, while the ultra-bright 'I Saw Red' lasts from 3-30 washes - so be sure to check before you invest; plus, the colour and fade will vary depending upon the tone and porosity of your hair. Sure to satisfy the wildest colour chameleons and indecisive individuals, get ready to explore your every shade craving. Like the entire BLEACH range, Super Cool Colour is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason we love it. Want to get the best out of your new-found colour? Stock up on the corresponding toning shampoo and conditioner to maintain vibrancy!
how_to_use: Wearing gloves, apply generously to shampooed, towel dried hair. Massage or comb through mid-lengths and ends to ensure you cover all the hair evenly, leave to develop for 30 minutes. Rinse out with lukewarm water and style as desired. For best results apply on very light blonde, bleached hair. Colour may vary depending on existing tone and porosity of hair. One bottle is suitable for short hair or colouring freshly bleached and toned roots. For shoulder-length hair you'll need two bottles. For long hair that's below your shoulders, you'll need three to four bottles. If your hair is very thick we recommend adding an extra bottle.

name: VIRTUE One for All 6-in-1 Styler Cream Travel Size 60ml VIRTUE One for All 6-in-1 Styler Cream Travel Size 60ml
description: A true innovation in hair care, Virtue’s advanced formulations are enriched with Alpha Keratin 60ku, a whole, human keratin born from regenerative medicine. Since this is identical to the keratin in your hair, the protein is instantly recognised, binding directly to areas of damage and filling them – not just coating strands or weighing them down. Uniting this advanced protein with a host of other powerful ingredients, this One For All 6-In-One Styler truly does it all, providing softness, shine and light hydration, while also strengthening, polishing and protecting from heat. It’s enriched with panthenol (vitamin B5) a natural B vitamin that delivers moisture, softness and shine, cypress, an antioxidant rich essential oil known for light, soothing hydration and strengthening polymers, which work like an invisible scaffold to provide light hold and block out humidity. Fragranced with a fresh, verdant citrus blend featuring sweet orange, cypress and elemi essential oils, this truly is a gift from the hair care gods. What's more, after one week in a clinical trial, 89% of users found their hair felt softer, while 86% reported their hair looked healthier!
how_to_use: Apply to clean, damp or dry hair from mid-shaft to ends.

name: Color Wow Colour Security Conditioner for Normal to Thick Hair 250ml Color Wow Colour Security Conditioner for Normal to Thick Hair 250ml
description: Replenishing moisture-deprived hair without weighing it down with shine-dulling residue, this smoothing conditioner hydrates as it coaxes tangles out of colour-treated tresses. Available in two variations – the non-flattening, lightweight ‘Fine-to-Normal’ and the smoothing, cuticle-sealing ‘Normal-to-Thick’ – this softening formula is made without darkening agents and certain conditioning agents (particles that oxidise on your hair, corrupting your carefully chosen colour with a brassy finish). Instead, it’s powered by their colour-shielding Sealicon complex that delivers a protective, glossy finish, plus eight translucent conditioning agents to make compromised strands a whole lot more manageable.
how_to_use: After shampooing with Color Security Shampoo, apply a small amount to wet hair, starting about 2 inches from scalp, and distribute evenly along hair strand to ends. Rinse thoroughly with warm water.

name: Pattern Curl Gel 289.8ml Pattern Curl Gel 289.8ml
description: A flexible gel that keeps hair in place while giving it room to breathe, the Curl Gel does that and then some by nourishing hair with a wealth of hydrating ingredients. As with all PATTERN hair care, the Curl Gel is free of SLS/SLES, parabens, formaldehyde... the list goes on. Instead, it infuses a blend of aloe vera, coconut oil and cacay oil to fortify and hydrate hair, so your strands are just as healthy on the inside as they are on the outside. Perfect for wash 'n' go styles, braids and twist outs, this medium hold formula has just the right amount of slippage to evenly distribute the gel and coat each strand. The result? Defined, bouncy, touchable curls that last.

name: Briogeo Scalp Revival Charcoal + Biotin Dry Shampoo Briogeo Scalp Revival Charcoal + Biotin Dry Shampoo
description: With Briogeo’s Scalp Revival Charcoal + Biotin Dry Shampoo, you can continue your dry shampoo dependency without damaging scalp or strands. Unlike some dry shampoos, which can create dry flakiness, this features a host of natural, lock-loving ingredients to detoxify hair as it cleanses and refreshes between washes. Binchotan charcoal draws away impurities, while a complex of clay, tapioca and rice starches absorbs excess oil at the roots to leave hair fresh and clean. With the addition of witch hazel extract to help normalise oil production, this is a long-term solution for oily scalps, as well as a quick-fix blow dry prolonger. Super-vitamin biotin provides essential nutrients to the hair follicle, stimulating and supporting healthy hair growth.
how_to_use: Shake well before use and twist the cap to reveal spray dispenser. Squeeze the bottle and dispense evenly five inches away from hair, focusing at the roots. Let the dry shampoo sit for two minutes and then brush or finger through the hair thoroughly until the powder is removed.

name: Oribe Après Beach Spray 300ml Oribe Après Beach Spray 300ml
description: Get beachy waves and bombshell-worthy shine with Oribe’s Après Beach Wave and Shine Spray, the ideal shortcut to tousled, touchable waves and sun-kissed shine – without the salty stiffness often associated with wave sprays (or a long, languid day at the beach… if only). With a bespoke ‘beach waves complex’ – featuring hydrolysed wheat protein, pro-vitamin B5 and amber extract – the spray ‘swells’ the hair shaft and creates, wavy, ‘piecey’ texture while also providing light hold, so you’ll look like you’ve just stepped off the St. Tropez shore. Alongside this, a blend of rich moisturisers, plant extracts and oils (including safflower seed oil, marigold flower extract and amber extract) keeps everything soft and silky. If you dream of sultry texture and effortless waves, this is the ideal, nourishing way to achieve them – plus, the über-chic navy and golden bottle is a sublime addition to any hair care collection.
how_to_use: Oribe says: Shake. Spray on wet or dry hair. Tousle to taste and let dry in the St. Tropez air.

description: Getting right to the root of flakiness and excess sebum build-up, kickstart your wash day routine with the Scalp Detox, a pre-cleanse oil-rich remedy that not only rebalances your scalp (think: bye bye dandruff) but also soothes irritation to leave your head feeling aaahh-mazing. Incredibly lightweight and developed with a powerhouse blend of basil leaf, baobab and moringa oils, this growth-promoting formula nourishes your scalp, regulates sebum production and repairs the dermal structure of your hair, follicle by follicle. Totally mess-free, this vegan medley is just what your itchy scalp has been waiting for.

name: Oribe Signature Conditioner 6.8 fl. oz. Oribe Signature Conditioner 6.8 fl. oz.
description: Add a little indulgence to your hair care with Oribe's Signature Conditioner, a rich daily moisturiser that offers results certain to go straight to your head. A restorative daily moisturiser, this offers intense detangling hydration without weight, repairing and protecting strands for a lustrous, healthy result. Available in two sizes, pick from the 200ml full size or the 50ml mini to try this fan favourite on for size (or ensure you're never without your go-to while travelling.Macadamia nut seed oil, from the Australian rainforest, smoothes hair and delivers antioxidant properties, while whole wheat-derived proteins, keratin and hydrolysed keratin strengthen damaged hair and protect the surface of the hair shaft. Kaempferia galanga root extract, found in Southeast Asia, delivers natural UV protection, while Oribe's signature complex (including watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower extracts) defends hair from oxidative stress, ageing and the deterioration of natural keratin. Intensely moisturising yet weightless, this is the perfect daily conditioner - and the opulent midnight black bottle is certain to add a touch of luxe to your bathroom shelf.
how_to_use: Massage, indulge (for at least one minute), rinse.

name: Gisou Honey Infused Hair Mask 230ml Gisou Honey Infused Hair Mask 230ml
description: Looking for a hard-working, nourishing hair treatment that you can use once or twice a week? Enter Gisou's Honey Infused Hair Mask. Brimming with moisturising ingredients (not to mention the most gorgeous, subtle floral scent), this mask is formulated to hydrate and replenish hair while improving its elasticity and health. It's all about the honey here: a natural humectant (meaning it slurps up and holds hydration within the hair shaft), this star ingredient is packed with vitamins, amino acids and antioxidants to impart strength, help repair damage and addallof the shine. With a full-sized 250ml and a new sized-to-travel 75ml, you can keep your hair nourished and cared for even when you're away from your at-home shelfie.
how_to_use: Apply a generous amount of hair mask onto towel-dry hair from root to tip. Leave in for 5-7 minutes, then rinse thoroughly. For best results, use 1-2 times per week.

name: NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Texture Curl Cream NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Texture Curl Cream
description: A conditioning cream that defines your natural curls and coils, the Perfect Texture Curl Cream from NatureLab TOKYO reduces the look of frizz and offers humidity-resistant control. Like the rest of the Perfect Texture range, this curl cream strengthens and fortifies each strand to reduce the chances of breakage. It uses green sea grapes, omega 9 and Alpine rose extracts to hydrate and moisturise both hair and scalp. Blue algae strengthens hair and protects your colour against fading (whether from washing or environmental damage), and flexible film formers work to activate and define your natural curl pattern without weighing strands down. Vitamin C-rich lychee encourages a healthy scalp, and each formula even boasts a deliciously refreshing matcha and mint scent - without any sulphates, silicones or animal-derived ingredients in sight.
how_to_use: Starting with a penny-sized amount, work the cream evenly through wet or lightly towel-dried hair, starting at the crown through to the ends. Gently scrunch and shape curls as desired. Dry with a diffuser or allow to air dry for best results. Made for curl types: 3a, 3b, 3c, 4a.

description: Part of Aveda's Color Conserve range, this Color Conserve Shampoo was created to help extend the vibrance of your colour-treated hair as only nature can. Aveda's gentle and plant-infused shampoo boasts a 100% organic aroma and helps do what harsher cleansers can't - resist fading. Formulated with larch tree extract to seal in colour for longer-lasting vibrancy, this hardworking formula helps to protect colour-treated hair from the damaging effects of sun, water and environmental stresses while leaving hair silky, soft and shiny.

name: Davines Heart of Glass Sheer Glaze 150ml Davines Heart of Glass Sheer Glaze 150ml
description: Designed to brighten the tone of blondes while providing intense hydration and light-catching shine, there's no much Davines' Heart of Glass Sheer Glaze doesn't do; no, really, it even delivers heat protection, promotes hair elasticity and extends the duration of your blow dry, thanks to the brand's patented Fortifying Botanical Shield complex! Part of Davines ‘Heart of Glass’ edit – which derives its name from a famous song from the 80s, sang by a very blonde artist who has become an icon – this collection of products are designed to highlight the beauty of blonde hair, both natural and bleached, lightened and dyed; or hair that has been exposed to sunlight, the frequent use of the brushes or straighteners, all elements that could weaken its fibre. On a mission to preserve the planet’s vital biodiversity, each hair care ‘family’ (Heart of Glass, NOUNOU and so on), represents an extract under threat, so by choosing to use this elixir, you’re supporting the globe and its varied inhabitants – from plants to people!
how_to_use: Apply evenly 7 to 15 pumps on towel dried hair, comb through and proceed with desired styling. Rinse thoroughly in case of contact with eyes.

name: Davines MINU Illuminating Hair Mask 250ml Davines MINU Illuminating Hair Mask 250ml
description: With the delicate scent of orange blossom, Davines’s ‘MINU’ mask infuses coloured, chemically-treated strands with a cocktail of fortifying, botanical extracts to bolster shine, strength and resilience. Developed to counteract the ravages wrought by repeated dyeing, straightening or Brazilian blow-drying, this leaves locks feeling soft and supple with an enviable lustre that enhances the impact (and helps extend longevity) of your expensive colour.

name: Briogeo Wide Tooth Detangling Comb 1 piece Briogeo Wide Tooth Detangling Comb 1 piece
description: Relieving particularly rigorous in-shower detangling sessions with its extra wide teeth, the Wide Tooth Detangling Mask Comb effortlessly glides through tangles, eliminates ouches and hooks seamlessly onto your shower. With a delightful lilac body, this knot-busting tool works on straight, wavy, curly or coily hair while minimising snagging and enhancing ‘slip’. Coasting through wet or dry strands with minimal effort, (and without eliciting any unnecessary breakage!) you can use it on all hair types – even those that have been subject to bleach, keratin treatments, colour and the like. Also ideal for evenly distributing your favourite hair mask and conditioners throughout your lengths, this do-it-all comb will then hook onto your shower for easy storage.

ingredient: Acrylonitrile butadiene styrene

name: Amika Hair Blow Dryer Brush 2.0 Amika Hair Blow Dryer Brush 2.0
description: Fast track your mane to a salon-worthy blow dry from the comfort of your own home with the Hair Blow Dryer Brush 2.0 — an even better (if that’s possible) version of the much-loved original two-in-one styler from amika. Bringing your tresses the bouncy, frizz-free blow dry normally reserved for your bi-monthly visit to your hairdresser, is the Hair Blow Dryer Brush 2.0, back to bring your mane more volume, more shine and more effortless styling. Constantly striving to bring you your best hair ever, amika has put their bestselling tool through its paces to unveil and even more effective styling companion. Three adjustable heat and speed settings allow you to customise your blowout to create the volume your strands desire with the smoothness of a salon visit. The carefully carved oval barrel is designed to ensure you achieve optimal root lift for a bounce that just won’t quit, and weighing in at just 380g this lightweight styler won’t leave you feeling like you just left the gym either. A unique combination of short bristles for bounce, shine and polish, and long nylon ball tip bristles to detangle and smooth your strands mean all hair types can enjoy the ultimate ‘at-home’ blow dry.

Turn brush on by rotating the temperature control dial clockwise to the desired setting. Divide hair into sections. Working section by section, maneuver the brush through hair. For extra volume, over-direct sections at the crown of the head.

name: Amika Curl Corps Defining Cream Amika Curl Corps Defining Cream
description: A multi-tasking must-have. Let us introduce you to amika's Curl Corps Defining Cream. This 3-in-1 hair styling cream moisturises, softens and enhances curls for a touchable finish you'll adore. A must-have for those with natural curls, coils or waves, this moisturises curls and enhances natural texture by encouraging curl formation. But it doesn't stop there, the Curl Corps Defining Cream enhances hair's existing curl pattern, making natural waves, curls, and coils look better than ever too. Plus, it's safe for use on keratin, Brazilian or other chemically-treated hair too. It's is laced with oat peptide - which is extracted from oat kernel and forms a protective barrier on hair which locks in moisture to deliver shine and a silky feel, tapioca starch which helps provide definition and soft hold to curls and last but not least, sea buckthorn, one of amika's Holy Grail hero ingredients. It's one of the most potent natural ingredients on the planet and one of the few known plant sources of the fatty-acid omega 7 typically found in fish oil which promotes elasticity and provides superior hydration making it the ultimate holy grail ingredient for hair and scalp.

name: Oribe Curl Gloss 175ml Oribe Curl Gloss 175ml
description: Delivering ultra-hydrating control, Oribe’s Curl Gloss Hydration & Hold creates gorgeously glossy, defined curls without a hint of stiffness or ‘crunch’. A luscious, lightweight formula, this provides soft, natural hold, frizz control and brilliant shine. It’s rich in Brazilian extracts: passion flower and cupuaçu (both rich in fatty acids, amino acids and vitamins) deeply hydrate hair, jicama smooths and boosts shine and Brazil nut extract brings shine, silkiness and softness to dry, lifeless curls. Aloe vera moisturises scalp and strands, boosted by conditioning polymers and strengthening vitamin B5, while a speciality styling resin provides long-lasting curl retention for control, even in high humidity. Ideal for every kind of curl, this jade-emerald green bottle will revolutionise your hair ritual.

name: Living Proof Restore Shampoo 236ml Living Proof Restore Shampoo 236ml
description: A gentle yet conditioning cleanser for dry, damaged hair, Living Proof’s Restore Shampoo helps encourage stressed strands to behave like their former, more biddable selves from the very first use. With the brand’s signature Restorative Shield to maximise the benefits of their patented ‘Healthy Hair Molecule’ (OFPMA), this revolutionary formula leaves hair feeling squeakily clean but not stripped, with an enviably glossy lustre and dramatically improved manageability – and what’s more, OFPMA helps repel environmental grime, allowing you to wash your hair less often (a godsend if your hair is coloured or chemically treated). Painstakingly developed with never-before-used hair care ingredients and technologies, Living Proof abandoned the usual hair care ‘recipes’, choosing instead to approach aesthetics from pharmaceutical, medical and biotech perspectives – with consistent advice and consultation from some of the world’s greatest stylists and industry veterans.

description: Just landed and ready to restore damaged hair bonds to a silky-soft, healthy state is the Silkamino collection from Drunk Elephant. It’s time to meet and greet Drunk Elephant's newest masking hero… the Silkamino Mega Moisturizing Masker takes damaged, dulled and unmanageable manes and brings them back to lustrous life. Did you know your hair is made of protein? Which is made of amino acids? So naturally, the best way to repair damaged strands would be with amino acid-rich formulas. This is where Drunk Elephant’s latest strengthening line comes in… This silicone-free mask is overflowing with marula butter, an incredibly pure and concentrated marula oil-derivative that’s rich in antioxidant polyphenols, lipids and fatty acids to offer intense hydration to your hair. Silk amino acids and silk sericin combine to take on damaged strands, strengthening weak, chemically-treated hair and smoothing the shaft to get your mane back to its healthiest state. Settle in for 30 minutes of intense hydration with this powerful transformative mask, or leave in for just three quick minutes when you’re in a rush and need a quick fix… this truly does bring about mega results.

Use only as directed. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Avoid contact with eyes.

name: Innersense I Create Waves Innersense I Create Waves
description: A true wave-maker, this I Create Waves spray is a must-try for those with naturally wavy hair or those wanting to enhance lifeless locks and gain some added texture. Rich in minerals and amethyst crystal, this unique, hydrating I Create Waves Pink Himalayan salt spray adds textures and enhances waves while aloe vera provides moisture to prevent parched ends. A fuss-free yet hardworking additino to your hair care routine, you'll adore the results this formula provides. Beautifully fragranced, this boasts a blend of lavender and angelica to help restore peace and calm while the additino of amethyst crystals helps to strengthen your imagination and intuition, and refines the thinking processes.

description: Has your hair fallen flat? Ouai's pre-blow-dry Volume Spray will transform your tresses' fortunes, adding enviable 'oomph' without weight, stickiness or dreaded 'crispiness';. Utterly weightless, this body-building mist imparts mega long-lasting lift and bounce to all hair types, whether your mane's poker straight or exploding with curls. Enriched with volume polymers to lift and thicken, plus panthenol to condition, protect and add shine, this hair-friendly formula is free from parabens, sodium chloride and animal testing, so you can enjoy fabulous volume without a care in the world.

name: Hair by Sam McKnight Easy-Up Do Texture Spray Hair by Sam McKnight Easy-Up Do Texture Spray
description: Forget hairpins and get yourself grip that doesn’t slip with Hair by Sam McKnight’s Easy-Up Do Texture Spray, a fine but powerful mist. Whatever style you’re aiming for – be it braid, topknot, ponytail or chignon – this provides the body and strong hold you need to achieve it and rest assured that it will stay in place. Sam McKnight himself calls this ‘hair grips in a can’, effortlessly styling to create enviably nonchalant yet glamorous looks, without over-burdening hair or creating any crispiness. Miraculously, it disappears at the stroke of a brush, a quality that was essential to the brand's founder, who frequently creates multiple looks on the same hair backstage at fashion shows and shoots. The culmination of his iconic expertise and experience in the industry, Sam McKnight's irresistible hair care collection offers the products you need to achieve professional standards of styling at home in mere minutes – and we just can't get enough of it. As well as professional appeal, this texturising hairspray smells divine, with a fresh, botanical scent (green leaf, herbs, watery flowers and pepper, against a backdrop of frankincense, cedar and juniper wood crafted by perfumer Lyn Harris) so that your locks will smell sublime as well as looking timelessly chic.

name: Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Joia Conditioner (Various Sizes) Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Joia Conditioner (Various Sizes)
description: Need a hair hero to rescue you from your frizz? The Brazilian Joia Strengthening & Smoothing Conditioner infuses lasting moisture for a silky, soft-to-the-touch finish. Formulated with their patented SOL Seal Technology (plant-based keratin micro-capsules), this strand-smoothing conditioner works to strengthen your hair as it repairs damage by ionically bonding your split ends. Made with all hair types and textures in mind, this creamy formula cloaks your lengths with a weightless, moisture-rich blend of antioxidant Brazil nut selenium and fatty acid-rich buriti fruit oil. What's more, this luscious conditioner is infused with the brand's iconic Cheirosa '62 scent that's sure to transport you to the sun-soaked beaches of Rio as you rinse away the suds. Available in both 295ml and 90ml bottles, you can take this hero home and away.

name: BLEACH LONDON No Bleach Bleach Kit BLEACH LONDON No Bleach Bleach Kit
description: Time to show bleach the bench - this clever, salon-standard formulation lifts hair colour up to five levels without bleach, so you can achieve a lighter, brighter blonde with less damage and scalp irritation. The shade achieved and the time it will last will depend on your hair’s current colour, condition, porosity, length and thickness but, in general, No Bleach Bleach will lift medium brown hair to medium blonde and light brown hair to light blonde, and should only be used on unbleached, virgin hair. Unlike with traditional bleach, the colour achieved will continue to lighten subtly over time and the BLEACH London Reincarnation Mask included in this pack is perfect for helping your hair on its way to repair. Top roots up every 4-6 weeks for the ultimate lift!
how_to_use: The shade achieved and length of its duration can be influenced by many factors including: Current colour, condition, porosity, length and thickness of hair as well as any previous treatments. Always follow the timing guidelines given. If you do not apply enough product or leave it on for the correct time it might become patchy or not fully develop, leaving hair brassy. You may need more than one pack if your hair is long, thick or hasn’t been dyed before. It’s always a good idea to have another pack to hand just in case one runs out before you’re finished colouring. Apply BLEACH LONDON SCALP SAVIOUR before use for extra scalp protection. Follow with BLEACH LONDON WHITE TONER and BLEACH LONDON SILVER SHAMPOO and CONDITIONER to banish brassy tones. Alternatively follow with CHAMPAGNE SUPER TONER or your choice of BLEACH LONDON SUPER COOL COLOUR. Mandatory warnings: Wear suitable gloves. Contains hydrogen peroxide. Avoid contact with eyes. Rinse immediately if product comes into contact with them. Recommended warnings: Avoid contact with skin. Follow the instructions carefully and do not extend the application time beyond that indicated. Rinse immediately in case of burning or tingling. This product should only be used on undyed, virgin hair.

name: AMELIORATE Transforming Scalp Serum 125ml AMELIORATE Transforming Scalp Serum 125ml

This formula helps to ease the effects of desperately dry scalps: from flaky skin to uncomfortable itchiness. A blend of oat oil, frankincense extract, celery seed oil and minerals replenishes your moisture barrier and encourages an improved, even appearance, while establishing a healthy habitat for balanced scalp microflora (essential bacteria). Made with an infusion of lactic acid – an effective alpha hydroxy acid – it helps to dissolve the bonds between old cells, revealing a healthier layer of skin. This exfoliating action works in harmony with their proprietary LaH6 Skin Hydration Complex which is comprised of oat-based hydrating ingredients, that are clinically proven to moisturise for up to 8 hours in their wash-off products.

Thereafter, apply 1-2 times a week. For best results, follow with AMELIORATE Clarifying Scalp Exfoliant and Clarifying Shampoo.

If you’ve gone overboard with heat styling, hair colour or chemical treatments then this might just be the Holy Grail you were looking for.

name: Living Proof Restore Conditioner 236ml Living Proof Restore Conditioner 236ml
description: Daily shampooing, heat styling, chemical processing, colouring and UV exposure all wreak havoc with hair strength, health and resilience. Over time, strands become brittle, dry and more susceptible to breakage – which is why we often reach for short-term synthetic cover-ups, which only exacerbate the problem. Oils and silicones are effective ‘quick fixes’ but only temporarily disguise the underlying damage – which is why Living Proof have developed a targeted range of reparative products, to fortify strands from the inside out. Their innovative silicone and oil-free solutions star the brand’s patented OFPMA – the proprietary technology that coats each individual hair with an ultra-thin, non-greasy shield that smooths, corrects and protects from root-to-tip, whilst re-establishing moisture balance and delivering UV and thermal protection up to 235°C. With regular use, hair is proven to become up to 20 x more resistant to split ends, as well as more glossy, lustrous and reassuringly envy-inducing.

name: dpHUE Gloss 6.5 fl. oz. dpHUE Gloss 6.5 fl. oz.

Intended to enhance and deepen your current colour, use this vibrancy-boosting treatment when your strands are lacking vitality, have started to fade or when highlights need to be toned down. Free from ammonia and peroxide, this semi-permanent (it lasts for up to ten shampoos!) hair colour won’t damage your tresses; quite the contrary, it boasts a deep conditioning base that’s brimming with hydrating ingredients that leave your hair soft, shiny and illuminated. Have your pick of 11 shades, including the ‘Sheer’ variation that can be used to tailor the tone of other colours to perfectly match your hair.

Leave on for 3-20 minutes and rinse thoroughly. For less intense results, mix with Gloss+ Sheer. Darker pigments may stain hands, scrub with soap and water or use gloves.

name: Amika Plus Size Perfect Body Mousse Amika Plus Size Perfect Body Mousse
description: Stiff, crunchy finishes are a thing of the past! The Plus Size Volume & Body Mousse offers airy, medium hold and volume – letting your natural texture shine with touchable body and bounce. Giving all hair types a fuller look that won't flop when the weather gets sticky, this humidity-resistant formula amps up the volume without compromising on hair health – using sea buckthorn (an incredibly potent and natural 'superfuit') to pump strands with omega 7 fatty acids and antioxidant-rich vitamins that promote elasticity, protect and provide superior levels of hydration to both hair and scalp. Giving hair a little 'oomph', this cushiony and weightless mousse gives instant and long-lasting lift via an exquisite styling polymer that allows for flexible, malleable hold. And – last but not least – this comes with a delicious scent of warm vanilla, sweet-spicy clover and fresh citrus.
how_to_use: Shake can before use. Work a golf ball sized amount evenly through damp hair from roots to ends. Style as usual.

name: Living Proof Triple Bond Complex 15ml Living Proof Triple Bond Complex 15ml
description: The future of hair repair is here in the form of Living Proof's Triple Bond Complex. Think of this as your healthy hair architect that works within your tresses to fortify every strand and help you achieve all your hair care dreams, and with this sized-to-go 15ml you need never go without! Used weekly, this intensive reparative treatment is clinically proven to reconstruct damaged hair, while protecting it against future damage to keep your mane in optimal condition. Chemical treatments, bleach and heat-induced damage all take their toll, but thankfully, the Triple Bond Complex is on hand to deliver immediate repair and lasting protection so your hair is restored to a healthy state. Harnessing the powers of a breakthrough, patent-pending technology, this hair saviour repairs and replenishes ionic, hydrogen and covalent bonds. After just one use you'll see immediate results (the impatient amongst us can rejoice), as it will look and feel healthier, with significant improvements being made inside your strands too. Not forgetting about the element of protection, encapsulated cellular oil can be found within this little bottle of gold dust to protect your hair from thermal and UV damage. All of this in a once-a-week treatment? Our hair care routine is getting upgraded asap!
how_to_use: Shampoo and Condition hair as usual. Then apply 2 pumps to clean, damp hair. Add more as needed, based on hair length, texture, and level of damage. Comb through. Do not rinse out. For best results, wait 10 minutes before applying other treatments or stylers and blow dry. Product does not require heat, but you will see best results with heat activation. Use weekly.

name: Oribe Gold Lust Shampoo Refill 1000ml Oribe Gold Lust Shampoo Refill 1000ml
description: Don’t let your shower-time staple run out; stock up on Oribe’s Gold Lust Repair & Restore Shampoo with this refill. This luscious, rejuvenating cleanser restores moisture while refreshing hair thanks to centuries-oil healing oils and extracts — including deeply moisturising Mediterranean Cyprus extract, shine-boosting argan oil and hydration-boosting maracuja oil. Alongside this, Oribe’s signature complex (of watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower extract) defends hair from oxidative stress, damage and the colour-fading effect of the elements. A bio-restorative complex (including plant collagen, caffeine and biotin) strengthens the hair cuticle from inside out, while bromelain (an enzyme derived from pineapple) gently exfoliates and balances the scalp to cultivate the optimal environment for hair health. After use, your hair will feel gently cleansed and royally rejuvenated.
