name: Innersense Hydrating Cream Hairbath Innersense Hydrating Cream Hairbath
description: Formulated with hard-working coconut, this Hydrating Cream Hairbath is a mild yet effective deep cleanser and conditioner that easily foams and reduces static without stripping hair of its natural oils. Rich in fatty acids, shea butter also intensely moisturises parched strands while tamanu oil helps to regenerate, strengthen and protect precious locks throughout the day. Luxe yet completely lightweight, this hairbath is quick-absorbing and rich in vitamins A, B, D and E to keep locks in tip-top condition. Formulated with therapeutic essential oils, this divine product also allows you to take a moment to re-centre and rebalance while practising self-care. We're obsessed! Now available in full size 295ml and travel-friendly mini 59ml bottles, you never have to be without this hair hero again.
how_to_use: Thoroughly saturate hair with water. Taking a deep breath and become centred. Begin by dispensing a small amount of hairbath into hands and emulsify into a light lather. Apply with fingertips to scalp, massaging and cleansing. Rinse thoroughly. Repeat if necessary and follow with Hydrating Cream Conditioner.

name: Philip Kingsley Overnight Scalp Barrier Serum with Triple Balancing Action 60ml Philip Kingsley Overnight Scalp Barrier Serum with Triple Balancing Action 60ml
description: Strengthening your scalp while you snooze, the Overnight Scalp Barrier Serum with Triple Balancing Action soothes sensitivity and regulates sebum production. Yes, dreams really do come true… Supercharged with calming aloe vera leaf juice extract and gently exfoliating AHAs that are both backed up by Triple Balancing Action, this fast-absorbing formula works to seal in moisture, retain hydration and keep your scalp at a happy, itch-free equilibrium.
how_to_use: Apply in the evening, the day before you wash your hair. Fill the pipette by pressing down on the top of the dropper. To dispense, gently press again. Apply directly to the scalp in 4-5 sections, using 2-3 drops per section. Massage over your scalp gently. A soothing sensation can be expected. Do not rinse. Upon waking, wash and style as usual. For best results, repeat every evening.

name: Larry King Hair Care My Nanna's Mousse 150ml Larry King Hair Care My Nanna's Mousse 150ml
description: Forget beachy waves, we’re going for big, bouncy volume and Larry King Hair Care’s mousse is the key. Inspired by the lift and volume of styles from the past, My Nanna's Mousse is a lightweight styler that preps hair for blow drying. A nostalgic reinvention of the humble mousse, it plumps and thickens to help hair appear fuller without feeling stiff and sticky. Instead, hair is left with soft, bouncy volume and shine. How? It helps to boost elasticity and provides soft hold that feels as if you’ve used no product at all. Best of all, it’s been designed to be suitable for all hair textures.
how_to_use: Squirt into the palm of your hand and distribute through wet hair. Perfect for use with a classic round brush blow dry or for a diffuse dry.

name: BLEACH LONDON White Heat Super Colour Colour 150ml BLEACH LONDON White Heat Super Colour Colour 150ml
description: Ensure that your mane is anything but run-of-the-mill (without the colour commitment) with BLEACH London’s Super Cool Colour, a non-permanent hair colour cream mask that transforms bleached and toned tresses. In just 30 minutes, this rich, luscious mask can reveal a rainbow of bold, chic shades. From beautifully bright ‘The Big Pink’ to perfect pastels ‘Awkward Peach’ and ‘Blullini’, to brilliantly bold turquoise ‘Washed Up Mermaid’, there’s a shade to suit every aesthetic. Each shade has a different lifecycle - the more subtle 'Rosé' will fade in 1-3 washes, while the ultra-bright 'I Saw Red' lasts from 3-30 washes - so be sure to check before you invest; plus, the colour and fade will vary depending upon the tone and porosity of your hair. Sure to satisfy the wildest colour chameleons and indecisive individuals, get ready to explore your every shade craving. Like the entire BLEACH range, Super Cool Colour is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason we love it. Want to get the best out of your new-found colour? Stock up on the corresponding toning shampoo and conditioner to maintain vibrancy!
how_to_use: Wearing gloves, apply generously to shampooed, towel dried hair. Massage or comb through mid-lengths and ends to ensure you cover all the hair evenly, leave to develop for 30 minutes. Rinse out with lukewarm water and style as desired. For best results apply on very light blonde, bleached hair. Colour may vary depending on existing tone and porosity of hair. One bottle is suitable for short hair or colouring freshly bleached and toned roots. For shoulder-length hair you'll need two bottles. For long hair that's below your shoulders, you'll need three to four bottles. If your hair is very thick we recommend adding an extra bottle.

name: Pattern Styling Cream 88.7ml Pattern Styling Cream 88.7ml
description: Rich and juicy with nourishing ingredients, the versatile Styling Cream delivers unrivalled levels of moisture to coat curls and bring out the best of your curl pattern, no matter what style you don. As with all Pattern hair care, the Styling Cream is free of SLS/SLES, parabens, formaldehyde… the list goes on. But what it has got is a oil-rich blend of shea butter, cacay oil and sweet almond oil that helps to nourish curls and protect them from breakage, while improving hair retention so all the good stuff can stay in. Holding frizz down with a lightweight hold, this curl cream is perfect for setting twist outs, braid outs, bantu knots and much much more. Leaving a light floral scent comprised of neroli, rose and patchouli, this cream makes dry, frizzy hair a thing of the past and is designed the bring out the best of your own unique curls.
how_to_use: Apply hair styling cream on wet hair or dry hair as you style or braid. Pro tip: For protective styles, use this hair product to seal the hair with moisture before styling. Extra pro tip for healthy hair: For locs hair type, apply styling curl cream as you retwist each strand for shine, definition & hold.

name: Oribe Hair Alchemy Fortifying Treatment Serum 175ml Oribe Hair Alchemy Fortifying Treatment Serum 175ml
description: This styling treatment serum delivers instant shine and strengthens your hair ahead of forthcoming styling tools. Taking a preventative approach to weak, damaged hair, this revitalising formula is brimming with botanical extracts – including strengthening chia seed and active antioxidant-enhancing bio-fermented bamboo leaf. This on the go elixir also has daisy and honeysuckle extracts that fortify from root to tip, no matter how brittle. If you thought Oribe’s signature complex (of watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower extract) was good, this curative blend works overtime to strengthen hair by forming a protective scaffold around hair strands to boost cuticle strength. A multi-action hyaluronic acid complex injects a dose of moisture and increases elasticity; cotton seed extract softens stiff hair, while green tea and plant polysaccharides ward off pollution particles. Just a small amount of this super serum goes a long way towards a strong and soft mane that is healthy from the inside out.
how_to_use: Work a dime-sized amount of product into damp or dry hair to strengthen. More product can be added for thicker textures or longer lengths. Style as usual. Can also be used as an overnight treatment.

name: MONPURE London Follicle Boost Hair Density Serum 50ml MONPURE London Follicle Boost Hair Density Serum 50ml
description: Free of harsh chemicals, silicones, sulphates – the list goes on – this scalp serum gets to work on preventing hair loss and promoting a thick, full mane you can wear out with confidence. This supercharged formula heroes a special pumpkin seed extract that has been scientifically proven to block an enzyme called 5-alpha reductase (which then produces a chemical called DHT that causes hair loss). Good news, right? What’s more, this lush serum infuses a gentle form of retinol and lactic acid to promote cell turnover, resurface the scalp and unclog follicles from debris and dead skin cells getting in the way of growth. Encased in a handy (and very chic) dropper, stimulating your scalp towards full, lustrous locks has never been easier.
how_to_use: 1. Starting with dry or towel-dried hair, part the hairline and apply one to two drops of serum, spaced evenly, onto the scalp. 2. Work across the head, section by section, focusing on areas of concern. 3. Gently massage until the serum has fully absorbed into the scalp. Do not rinse. We recommend using once daily.

name: Kitsch Satin Lined Jersey Sleep Beanie - Black Kitsch Satin Lined Jersey Sleep Beanie - Black
description: Satin-lined and silky smooth, you’ll never want to take this beany off. Although perfect for bedtime, the Satin Lined Jersey Sleep Beanie would look chic during the day too – there are no rules when it comes to keeping your hair friction-free! Bad hair day who? Enter the Satin Lined Jersey Sleep Beanie: luxury at its finest, for all hair types. Boasting some seriously soft jersey, this beanie will prevent your hair from tangling, thinning or breaking, while keeping your hairstyle intact. With satin that’s heavenly to the touch, your locks are kept friction-free. Wear at night for an I-woke-up-like-this ‘do come morning, or wear during the day as a chic, multi-tasking accessory.
how_to_use: Scoop your hair in place and cocoon the wrap around it. Be sure to tuck any wayward strands within the wrap so the edge is completely covering your hairline and the tip of your ears – this will ensure it sits tight, protecting your hair through the night.
ingredient: 50% rayon, 45% polyester, 5% spandex

name: Briogeo Superfoods Banana + Coconut Hair Pack Briogeo Superfoods Banana + Coconut Hair Pack
description: A bright and happy pairing that’s set to revive your smile as well as hair, the Banana + Coconut Superfoods Hair Pack unites the {Be Gentle, Be Kind Banana + Coconut Nourishing Superfood Shampoo} and the {Be Gentle, Be Kind Banana + Coconut Nourishing Superfood Conditioner}. Boasting gentle, everyday essentials that hydrate and restore shine to dull, lifeless and dry strands, see this couplet as a duo of superfood smoothies – bursting with nutrient-rich ingredients that will provide hair with its daily dose of vitamins, antioxidants, and essential fatty acids. Safe for those with colour-, keratin- or chemically-treated hair, the shampoo harnesses the power of antioxidant-rich fruits to support both hair and scalp health – gently cleansing without stripping away natural oils. The creamy conditioner offers a true medley of barnet-boosting ingredients: nourishing banana extracts contain potassium and antioxidants to nourish and protect; hydrating coconut is rich in fatty acids and vitamin E to provide essential hydration; antioxidant-rich acai contains powerful antioxidants, vitamins and minerals to support healthy hair; and finally, vitamin-rich mango is loaded with vitamins and antioxidants to also nourish and protect.
how_to_use: Apply shampoo to wet hair and vigorously massage for 30 seconds as the lather builds, then rinse. After shampooing, apply the conditioner and massage into the hair from root to tip. Leave in for up to two minutes before rinsing.

description: Keeping your goddess-like highlights high and your lowlights low, the Color Protection Hair Goal shields your delicate strands against sun damage and harmful UV rays to ensure your colour-dyed hair stays as vibrant as possible. Fused with shaft-strengthening rice proteins, this hefty shot of barrier-boosting benefits protects and enhances your hair’s vibrancy, shine and manageability like never before.

name: Oribe Hair Alchemy Resilience Shampoo 75ml Oribe Hair Alchemy Resilience Shampoo 75ml
description: Prep your hair against future damage - and undo what's already been done - with Oribe's Resilience Shampoo. Taking a preventative approach to weak, damaged hair, this restorative cleanser is brimming with botanical extracts - including strengthening chia seed and active antioxidant-enhancing bio-fermented bamboo leaf. Add to this magic potion extracts of daisy and honeysuckle and expect hair to be fortified from roots to tip, no matter how brittle. If you thought Oribe's signature complex (of watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower extract) was good, this curative, travel-sized blend has just upped the ante on building strong, resilient hair by forming a protective scaffold around hair strands to boost cuticle strength. A multi-action hyaluronic acid complex injects a dose of moisture and increases elasticity, while green tea and plant polysaccharides protect from environmental stressors by warding off any pollution particles that are tempted to sit on your precious locks. Plus, it's safe to use on coloured hair, so if you've been searching for a remedy to damaged hair, split ends, flyaways and thinning, this shampoo sorcery will leave hair feeling cleansed, healthier and stronger.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair as the first step in your cleansing routine. Lather, indulge, rinse.

name: Slip Pure Silk Skinny Scrunchies - La Dolce Vita Slip Pure Silk Skinny Scrunchies - La Dolce Vita
description: Made from a carefully chosen elastic tie with a sumptuous silk covering, Slip’s Skinny Scrunchies minimise damage while looking totally chic. Get ready to upgrade your updo in more ways than one. Crafted from the highest grade (6A) long fibre mulberry silk, with a thickness of 22 momme, the Skinny Scrunchie is a must-add to your hair styling rituals. Whether you’re creating a ballet bun, the highest high ponytail, tossing your hair in a topknot or creating an intricate ’do, this sumptuous silk leaves no trace of kinks or creases. What’s more, they’re kind to your delicate locks, ensuring that there’s no damage or breakage.

name: Philip Kingsley Flaky/Itchy Scalp Conditioner 200ml Philip Kingsley Flaky/Itchy Scalp Conditioner 200ml
description: The perfect follow-up to the bestselling cleansing formula, Philip Kingsley’s Flaky Itchy Scalp Hydrating Conditioner is key to calming, comforting and stimulating healthy growth while lending light hydration. Developed to nourish your hair at the source while respecting the natural flora and fauna that thrive on your scalp, this soothing blend swiftly relieves irritation and works to restore equilibrium. Calming, refreshing and nourishing, this deeply replenishing (but featherweight!) blend of provitamin B5 with betaine, patauá oil (a plant-derived oil rich in essential fatty acids) and VarisoftBT 85 (a vegetable-based conditioning agent with potent antistatic properties) works to cherish your lengths – from the roots to the tips – while addressing the ‘upset’ that leads to an itchy, inflamed and dandruff-prone scalp. Completely non-stripping and perfect for fragile or delicate textures – as well as fine, oily or colour-treated hair – this slots neatly into the award-winning ‘Flaky Itchy’ ritual; use after Flaky Itchy Scalp Anti-Dandruff Shampoo to 're-set' and quickly make dandruff a thing of the past.
how_to_use: Apply to damp lengths, minimising direct contact with the scalp - the balm texture helps to tease tangles for minimal strain on the strands. Comb through gently and rinse thoroughly, to leave your hair supple and nourished without any 'weight' that can compromise lift or exacerbate greasiness.

name: Oribe Volumista Mist for Volume 5.9 oz Oribe Volumista Mist for Volume 5.9 oz
description: Take your hair higher with Oribes Volumista Mist for Volume, a mane-plumping spray that will ensure your do doesnt fall flat. Formulated with copolymer resins and marine glycogen, the mist enhances volume while providing humidity-resistant hold, as well as delivering antioxidant protection with amber extract. Swelling strands, the spray creates soft, natural-looking volume and brilliant lustre, also offering light, flexible hold. Also enhanced with Oribes Signature Complex (featuring watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower extracts) the formula defends hair from the drying, damaging and colour-depleting effects of the elements. Simply mist it lightly into towel-dried hair and youre good to go the opulent ruby garnet-hued bottle makes a stunning addition to any hair care collection too.
how_to_use: Mist lightly into towel-dried hair from roots to ends and blow-dry. To add more body, add Velcro rollers once hair is dry.

name: Oribe Bright Blonde Conditioner - Travel 1.7 fl. oz. Oribe Bright Blonde Conditioner - Travel 1.7 fl. oz.
description: Achieve your most beautiful blonde with Oribe’s Bright Blonde Conditioner for Beautiful Color, a revitalising, moisturising violet conditioner that corrects brassiness and hydrates for hair that is soft, strong, shiny and ‘lit from within’. The formula moisturises and restores strands without weighing them down, smoothing each cuticle to seal in moisture and help to reduce split ends. Available in two sizes, pick from the 200ml full size or the 50ml mini to try this fan favourite on for size (or ensure you're never without your go-to while travelling. Pure violet pigment, reflective pearls and a brightening complex – of lemon, ginger root and chamomile extracts – optimise hair colour and luminosity, while luscious natural oils (including moringa seed and jojoba oils) condition locks. Purple orchid extract, known as the flower of longevity, repairs damaged hair, conditions and prevents moisture loss, while Swiss garden cress sprouts detoxify and protect hair from environmental aggressors. Boosting this protection, Oribe’s signature complex (crafted from watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower extracts) defends hair from oxidative stress and the deterioration of natural collagen, while multi-UV protection shields hair from the colour-depleting effects of the sun’s rays.

name: Aveda Scalp Solutions Stimulating Scalp Massager Aveda Scalp Solutions Stimulating Scalp Massager
description: Introducing the Scalp Solutions Stimulating Scalp Massager, your new hair care essential set to restore out-of-whack scalps and reveal a healthy mane. The skinification of hair is here to stay, and Aveda’s problem-solving Scalp Solutions range has everything you need to restore harmony and reset your scalp. What’s more relaxing than that indulgent scalp massage at the salon? While you ponder on that, allow us to introduce you to Aveda’s sensorial scalp massager, featuring carefully designed thin and flexible long bristles that reach the scalp even when your hair is wet. Uniquely formulated with bi-level filaments that target the scalp and your strands, each finished with a rounded ball tip that provide gentle yet thorough exfoliation. The result? Impurities are lifted, micro-circulation of the scalp is boosted and your relaxation levels will go through the roof. A must-add to your wash day rituals...
how_to_use: Start at the front line down to the nape in 3 gentle circular movements, covering your entire head. Reverse the technique and work from the nape to the front hair line using the same gentle circular motions. Use daily or as often as desired.
ingredient: Bi-level Filaments. Double Concave Design.

name: RANAVAT Mighty Majesty Fortifying Hair Serum RANAVAT Mighty Majesty Fortifying Hair Serum
description: Elevating your hair care ritual to a level fit for royalty, RANAVAT's Mighty Majesty Fortifying Hair Serum helps to manage breakage, nourish the scalp, and protect against heat damage to leave hair stronger and more supple. No stranger to industry acclaim, this length-loving formula was crowned 'Best Hair Serum' by Women's Health and 'Best Hair Serum' by Harper's Bazaar India. Here's why: the jasmine-scented serum is infused with amla extract, which is overflowing with a high concentration of oleic acid, vitamin C, and vitamin E to control breakage, encourage hair growth, and nourish the scalp. Formulated with their own cold-pressed extraction method, each and every ingredient in the mane-changing formula is blended at the highest potency to promote your most lustrous locks yet.
how_to_use: Apply 2 to 3 drops into the palms and smooth onto wet or dry locks from mid-length to ends to target frizz and flyaways. This serum also functions as an overnight deep conditioning mask. Just massage into the scalp, leave on overnight and rinse with your favourite shampoo the next morning.
ingredient: Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Jasminium Sambac (Jasmine) Oil* and Phyllanthus Emblica (Amla) Fruit* *Organic

name: Amika Fluxus Touchable Hairspray Amika Fluxus Touchable Hairspray
description: The brainchild of a collective of creatives, hairstylists, chemists and formula enthusiasts, amika’s mantra is “all hair is welcome”. No exception to the rule, the Fluxus Touchable Hairspray delivers stay-all-day style that will leave your hair feeling like, well, your hair. Never sticky or flaky - you could run your fingers through your hair should you wish - it maintains a natural feel as it locks in your style du jour. It's infused with a butyl ester of pvm/ma copolymer (technical, we know!) that protects hair against high humidity plus, omega 7-rich sea buckthorn to promote elasticity and deliver impressive hydration. It's even laced with amika's signature scent, so you can expect your tresses to smell like their intoxicating blend of warm vanilla, spicy-sweet clover, and fresh citrus. Psst, did we mention it's safe for colour-treated, Brazilian-treated and keratin-treated hair? Committed to creating formulas that fit your values, all amika products are cruelty-free, held in 100% recyclable packaging and made with 90%+ post-consumer recycled plastics to reduce virgin plastic production.
how_to_use: Shake, spray on styled hair. Repeat. Benefits everyday styles and increases blowout longevity – mist before or after ironwork for a flexible hold and perfect finish.

name: Aveda Heat Relief Thermal Protector and Conditioning Mist 100ml Aveda Heat Relief Thermal Protector and Conditioning Mist 100ml
description: Don't let your styling routine get the better of your tresses, let Aveda's Heat Relief formula be on hand to ward against heat damage and boost the shine of your strands. It's safe to say that our hair goes through a lot - from heat damage and friction to pollution and chemical treatments - and an effective hair care regime is the best way to keep it in tip-top condition. That's where this styling aid comes in! Made from 97% naturally derived ingredients, this clever formula provides thermal protection and condition your hair to encourage a soft, glossy finish. What's more, it boasts Aveda's shampure aroma: a calming, signature blend of 25 pure flower and plant essences that leave your tresses divinely scented.

name: R+Co Atlantis Moisturising B5 Conditioner (Various Sizes) R+Co Atlantis Moisturising B5 Conditioner (Various Sizes)
description: Want maximum moisture? Get yourself R+Co's ATLANTIS Moisturising Conditioner, which gives parched hair a much-needed shot of hydration. Formulated with witch hazel to balance out hydration levels (to avoid dreaded heavy roots and parched ends) as well as preventing frizz, rosemary to remove product build up and maintain a healthy scalp and finally, nettle to condition and protect against colour fading - making this perfect for those who colour their hair and need a reparative conditioner to undo the damage. This hard-working product is also scented with R+Co's signature ROSY EYED scent (blended with bergamot, wild fig, cyclamen, lotus flower, cedarwood and tonka beans) to add a refreshing and beguiling scent to your happy and healthy hair that will linger for days. Packaged in a sleek white opaque tube with quintessential R+Co imagery, ATLANTIS (like the rest of this unmissable range) is vegan, cruelty-free, gluten-free, colour-safe and free from parabens, sulphates, mineral oils and petrolatum. description: We all need a little TLC every now and then (especially our tresses when we’ve gone a little OTT on chemical treatments) and we'll be taking our hair care self care in the form of Briogeo’s reparative duo. Elevate your hair wash ritual with the Don't Despair, Repair! MegaStrength Treatment. Suitable for absolutely all hair types (though particularly potent for restoring dry, damaged or chemically-treated manes), this intensive weekly treatment combines a two-part formula that utilises a unique set of natural and vegan ingredients. To strengthen hair right from the cuticle, look to the ‘Proprietary Rice Protein Complex’, which undoes existing damage and prevents further damage from taking place. To hydrate, there’s fatty acid-rich rosehip oil which not only injects moisture but also helps to reduce the appearance of split ends for an all-over more glossy mane. Lightweight and silicone-free the Don’t Despair, Repair! Strengthening Treatment Oil is perfect for brittle hair prone to split ends — sealing each strand to protect and promote healthy shine. Brimming with nourishing ingredients to reinforce the cuticles and help to fuse split ends, this luscious elixir is perfect for those who crave sleek, silky locks — reversing 88% of damage within just two uses. You can thank a complex of fortifying ceramides, shine-optimising macadamia nut derivatives and antioxidant rose flower oil, that deflects the hair-harming effects of heat, chemicals and the elements, for these hair-swishing results. 97% natural, vegan and cruelty-free — as well as free from phthalates, parabens, sulphates, silicones and artificial dyes — this oil is S.O.S. for lengths in crisis.
how_to_use: Don’t Despair, Repair! Strengthening Treatment Oil: Apply a few drops to dry or damp hair, focusing on mid-length to ends or other areas of damage. Don't Despair, Repair! MegaStrength Treatment: After shampooing, wring hair of excess water and apply the treatment evenly throughout damp hair. Leave in for at least 10 minutes or longer/overnight as desired. Rinse out and then apply the Don’t Despair, Repair!™ Deep Conditioning Mask to complete your intensive treatment process. For best results, use weekly.

Using naturally-derived cherry blossom and sweet almond oil, this delicate conditioner swiftly restores softness and shine to lacklustre locks from root to tip – giving your mane a weightless bounce with every swish of your head. Organic coconut oil and shea butter deeply condition for effortless detangling, lending a gorgeous silky, ‘slippery’ texture that smooths right through any knots. A whopping 38 flower and plant essences (think: tonka bean, organic orange and ylang ylang) also lend a perfumey aroma that infuses hair with a sweet, juicy scent. 98% naturally derived and safe for coloured hair, this scrumptious formula is ideal for all lengths of normal to dry textures, and is especially effective on longer locks in need of a delightful boost.

The luscious formula is inspired by the nourishing ingredients typically found in rejuvenating, ultra-healthy superfood smoothies (it even comes in the same kind of bottle), harnessing the fruit and vegetable nutrients to support healthy-looking hair and a balanced scalp. Powerful antioxidants from matcha provide impressive protection from damaging environmental elements and guard against colour fade, while apple is rich in natural procyanidin, a compound shown to encourage hair health. Completing the nourishing cocktail, there's also spinach, broccoli, cucumber and lemon extracts – all the green goodness your hair could hope for. Gently cleansing away oil and impurities, this will leave your hair and scalp clean and clear, while also helping to enhance hydration, shine and vitality.

The sulphate-free formula is specially designed to gently cleanse without stripping, thanks to coconut and corn-derived cleansers. Available in two sizes, pick from the 250ml full size or the 75ml mini to try this fan favourite on for size (or ensure you're never without your go-to while travelling. It's also enhanced with pure violet pigment and reflective pearls, as well as a brightening complex - of lemon, ginger root and chamomile extracts - to optimise your hair colour and luminosity. Purple orchid extract, known as the flower of longevity, repairs damage, conditions and prevents moisture loss, while Swiss garden cress sprouts, high in phyto-nutrients, detoxify and protect hair from environmental aggressors. Boosting this protection, Oribe's signature complex (crafted from watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower extracts) defend hair from oxidative stress and the deterioration of natural collagen, while multi-UV protection shields hair from the colour-depleting effects of the sun's rays.

name: Drybar The 3-Day Bender Digital Curling Iron, 1 Inch Drybar The 3-Day Bender Digital Curling Iron, 1 Inch
description: Promote flawless-looking curls and waves with Drybar’s The 3-Day Bender Digital Curling Iron 1 Inch. The tool boasts a rotating clamp, quickly styling the hair for long-lasting, salon-worthy results. Ergonomically designed with dual ceramic heaters to deliver even heat distribution, the curler’s digital temperature control function warms up to 226°C, helping to ensure suitability for all hair types. Ionic technology smooths the strands and encourages a glossy shine, while infrared technology works to protect against heat damage. Complete with a 60 minute automatic safety shut-off, the tool is the perfect addition to your styling routine.
how_to_use: For a traditional curl: Hold iron vertically and clamp hair high on the barrel midway up the strands. Use thumb and forefinger to rotate the clamp away from face. When curl is finished, it will slip out of the clamp. For a wave or bend: Hold iron horizontally and wrap a section of hair over the clamp away from face. Leave ends out 1'' (2.54 cm). Hold for 3-5 seconds and release the clamp. Tug slightly on the ends while hair is still warm.

name: Amika Brooklyn Bombshell Blowout Volume Spray Amika Brooklyn Bombshell Blowout Volume Spray
description: Stiff, crunchy finishes are a thing of the past! The Brooklyn Bombshell Blowout Volume Spray offers weightless volume, body and shine for all hair types – from curly through to colour-treated. Working to effortlessly plump strands, this blow dry primer even moisturises for ultimate bounce, with vitamin B5 promoting moisture and shine while sea buckthorn (an incredibly potent and natural ‘superfuit’) pumps strands with omega 7 fatty acids and antioxidant-rich vitamins to promote elasticity, protect and provide superior levels of hydration to both hair and scalp. With an intoxicating scent of warm vanilla, sweet-spicy clover and fresh citrus, this is set to be your new go-to styling product. Flat hair? Never heard of her.

name: Bouclème Curl Cream 300ml Bouclème Curl Cream 300ml
description: Tired of limp and lifeless curls? Let us introduce you to Bouclème's Curl Cream - TLC in a bottle, this ultra-nourishing formula defines, softens and enhances your natural curl for an eye-catching result. Jam-packed with certified organic shea butter, coconut fruit extract, kukui nut oil, coconut oil and castor oil, this intensely moisturising and nourishing leave-in from Bouclème is not one to be missed. Bouclème's Curl Cream is here to give lacklustre curls an instant revival as it offers unrivalled moisture and humidity protection. The leave-in effortlessly softens and defines all curl types, helping harness the power of your frizz to create bouncy, velvety curls and coils - we're obsessed! What's more, it's also 96% naturally derived and 100% vegan!
how_to_use: Can be used on wet hair for styling and dry hair for an extra moisture boost. On wet hair: Fine textures, start with a pea-sized amount and build slowly as needed. Medium/thick textures use ½-1 pump per section. Rake Curl Cream through curls using fingers, ensure even distribution. For extra hold follow with the Curl Defining Gel. For curls that lose moisture quickly apply on top of your conditioner, add 1 or 2 pumps of Revive 5 hair oil and then follow with Curl Defining Gel. For an extra moisture boost after wash day, take a 5p sized amount with a little water, loosen in your hand and either squeeze into hair or spot treat individual curls.

name: Davines MELU Conditioner for Fine, Delicate Hair Davines MELU Conditioner for Fine, Delicate Hair
description: This conditioner has been formulated for long or over-processed hair that's prone to breakages and split ends. It has a delicate floral scent thanks to natural ingredients like hydrating apricot kernel oil and sweet almond oil. It'll leave hair soft, shiny and de-tangled, so you can comb it through more easily and use your hairdryer or straighteners without worrying that you're frazzling your locks. MELU products are intensely nourishing but won't weigh hair down, making them ideal for long, fine tresses.

name: Aveda Botanical Repair Strengthening Leave-In Treatment 100ml Aveda Botanical Repair Strengthening Leave-In Treatment 100ml
description: Whether you've dyed your hair to within an inch of its life, burnt it to a crisp or simply neglected your tresses to the point of breakage, consider this Botanical Repair Strengthening Leave-In Treatment from Aveda a hair necessity. It's powered by a medley of plant extracts and oils that encourage the repair of your hair from the inside out, building bonds for stronger hair that's more resistant to damage. What's more, it protects against heat damage up to 450°F and the drying effects of the sun's UV rays. We're obsessed!

name: Act+Acre Hair Comb Act+Acre Hair Comb
description: This isn’t just a detangling comb — although it’s a brilliant (and beautiful) one at that. Act + Acre has created this deceptively simple tool to give your scalp the TLC it’s been craving. In other words, it’s your at-home, on-call, personal scalp massage therapist. According to research, scalp massages are known to increase blood flow, which aids the natural growth cycle of your hair as well as improving follicle health. They can also reduce inflammation that may trigger hair loss — so using this comb to stimulate the root is never going to be a bad idea, just make sure you’re gentle. Look closely and you’ll see that the first tooth is shorter than the rest — a smart design detail that will help you create the perfect parting.

description: Increase the volume on your weekly self care ritual with the Intense Thickening Hair and Scalp Mask. name: Bouclème Super Hold Styler 250ml Bouclème Super Hold Styler 250ml
description: Looking for extra hold, well, here it is. Introducing our new Super Hold Styler! The ultimate in firm hold, this stellar styler gel will ensure you keep your curls even on the busiest of days. With nourishing plant extracts such as chia seed, blue agave, algae sugars, kahai oil and linseed, this skilful Super Hold Styler from Bouclème effortlessly helps to prevent split ends and keeps curls in check from desk to disco! Ideal for defining and holding loose waves, curls and kinky coily curls, this 99% naturally-derived and 100% vegan formula means your curls will be soft, glossy and gorgeous! Go on, give it a go - we think you'll be impressed!
how_to_use: Happy to work on its own, it’s also an excellent team player and can be layered on top of the Curl Defining Gel for ultra definition, hold and shine. Unlike other stylers, this does not stiffen or weigh down your hair - apply to soaking wet hair for maximum effect! Using alone - less is more! For waves start with 20p amount and smooth down the length of the hair and scrunch up towards the scalp hold, pulse and release working your way through the in sections. For curly and kinky curls, with 10p amount rake through hair in sections from root to tip, using fingertips to smooth as you go. Once hair is completely dry, tip head forward and scrunch out gel to release the cast. Using with Curl Defining Gel: Apply your Curl Defining Gel as normal, then whilst hair is still wet, smooth 2 -3 x 10p sized amounts of Super Hold Styler over canopy and scrunch into ends. Once hair is completely dry, tip head forward and scrunch out gel to release the cast.

description: Ensure that your mane is anything but run-of-the-mill (without the colour commitment) with BLEACH London’s Super Cool Colour, a non-permanent hair colour cream mask that transforms bleached and toned tresses. From beautifully bright ‘The Big Pink’ to perfect pastels ‘Awkward Peach’ and ‘Blullini’, to brilliantly bold turquoise ‘Washed Up Mermaid’, there’s a shade to suit every aesthetic. Each shade has a different lifecycle - the more subtle 'Rosé' will fade in 1-3 washes, while the ultra-bright 'I Saw Red' lasts from 3-30 washes - so be sure to check before you invest; plus, the colour and fade will vary depending upon the tone and porosity of your hair. Sure to satisfy the wildest colour chameleons and indecisive individuals, get ready to explore your every shade craving. Like the entire BLEACH range, Super Cool Colour is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason we love it. Want to get the best out of your new-found colour? Rinse out with lukewarm water and style as desired. For best results apply on very light blonde, bleached hair. Colour may vary depending on existing tone and porosity of hair. One bottle is suitable for short hair or colouring freshly bleached and toned roots. For shoulder-length hair you'll need two bottles. For long hair that's below your shoulders, you'll need three to four bottles. If your hair is very thick we recommend adding an extra bottle.

name: Oribe Royal Blowout Heat Styling Spray 5.9 fl. oz. Oribe Royal Blowout Heat Styling Spray 5.9 fl. oz.
description: Help your hairdryer out with Oribes Royal Blowout Heat Styling Spray, an ultra-lightweight mist that smooths and softens even the unruliest tresses for a sleek, chic result and minimised hair drying time. Fortifying and softening strands, the formula is enriched with argan oil and an exclusive silicone complex that binds to keratin, forming a sheer layer that boosts shine and provides thermal protection. Ceramides provide further heat protection and help to repair splits ends, aided by a patented film-forming polymer that provides a breathable, long-term protective barrier. Fit for royalty, this opulent spray promises to speed up drying time too, so youll be left with more precious getting ready minutes its highly concentrated and best used sparingly, so itll also last you ages too.
how_to_use: Spray on damp hair from mid-shaft to ends and blow out (for best results, use sparingly, as this is a highly concentrated formula).

name: Davines More Inside Curl Gel Oil Davines More Inside Curl Gel Oil
description: Curly and coily manes, listen up, the uniquely formulated More Inside This Is A Curl Gel Oil boasts a highly moisturising formulation that hydrates every single strand while offering hold and definition. Created for curls, this transformative gel/oil treatment can be diffused or air-dried so you can style your tresses your way. Carefully created to bring much-needed moisture to your mane, the ‘Extreme Moisturising Factor’ found inside helps to control frizz, while the ‘Extreme Bounce Factor’ brings about soft and shiny tresses with perfect definition. Unleash a lust-worthy shine as this transforms from a gel to an oil, leaving your hair naturally soft, free from frizz and with a medium hold to keep your curls or coils locked in place all day.
how_to_use: Distribute between the palms and smooth through damp curls. Comb through and style as desired. Can be diffused or air-dried.

name: Aveda Nutriplenish Leave-in Conditioner 200ml Aveda Nutriplenish Leave-in Conditioner 200ml
description: The ultimate treatment for dry and ultra-dry tresses, Aveda's Nutriplenish Leave In Conditioner is formulated to tackle tangles, protect against heat damage (up to 230° C), all while hydrating and replenishing your hair for up to 72 hours! It doesn't even end there! This conditioning mist also harnesses a naturally derived UV filter to help protect your strands from the depleting effects of the sun plus, it can be used as a pre-shampoo treatment to make wash day worries (if the knots are that bad, you know what mean...) a thing of the past. Suitable for all hair types and textures, this 98% naturally derived, no-rinse-necessary formula is made without silicones and sulphates since Aveda is committed to thoughtfully chosen, good-to-hair ingredients. The finishing touch? It boasts their signature pure-fume aroma with cocoa, certified organic ginger, cardamom and other pure flower and plant essences. Ultra-smooth, luscious locks never smelt this good!
how_to_use: Shake well. Lightly mist clean, damp hair-or dry hair for added nourishment. Do not rinse. Detangle or style as usual. Adjust usage for your hair types. For fine to medium hair, apply mid-shaft to ends only. For thick and highly textured hair, apply from roots to ends.

name: Living Proof Full Dry Volume & Texture Spray 238ml Living Proof Full Dry Volume & Texture Spray 238ml
description: Achieve fuller-looking hair with the Living Proof Full Dry Volume & Texture Spray. Delivering volume, texture and a long-lasting finish, the styling spray helps create salon-worthy results. Dispensing texturising molecules throughout the hair, the spray instantly elevates your locks, adding dimension and voluminous shape. The improved valve enables a controlled distribution and a softer spritz, allowing you to have more precision over the product. Formulated to provide heat protection up to 210°C, the spray is compatible for use with heated styling tools.
how_to_use: For use on dry hair. Shake the bottle well before each spritz and hold 6-10 inches away from the head. Begin spraying from the root, moving through to the ends of the hair and work in with your fingers. To create even more volume, tilt your head sideways or upside down and apply for bigger results.

name: Philip KingsleyFlaky/Itchy Scalp Anti-Dandruff Scalp Toner 250ml Philip KingsleyFlaky/Itchy Scalp Anti-Dandruff Scalp Toner 250ml
description: Water-based and fragrance-free, this clear formula provides immediate and long-lasting relief from flaking and itchy scalps. With continued use alongside the wider Flaky/Itchy Scalp range, this prevents the recurrence of flakes and build-up of dead skill cells due to its anti-microbial and anti-flaking formula. Simply apply to damp, freshly washed hair and work into the scalp with fingertips. There’s no need to rinse, simply let this leave-in product do the hard work for you.
how_to_use: Apply to freshly washed, damp hair. Apply to the scalp from nozzle in 1" (3cm) sections (tip head back when applying to avoid product running into eyes). Distribute with fingertips. Do not rinse. Use cotton buds to apply to difficult to reach sensitive areas of the scalp. Can also be applied to dry hair to refresh.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Alcohol Denat., Benzalkonium Chloride, Camphor, Piroctone Olamine, Alcohol.

name: Living Proof No Frizz Conditioner 236ml Living Proof No Frizz Conditioner 236ml
description: The ultimate mane-taming follow up to No Frizz Shampoo, Living Proof’s No Frizz Conditioner has a weightless, detangling formula to minimise hair stress when styling, whilst nourishing strands to preserve precious pigment and leave your locks feeling super-soft, shiny and ‘slippery’. Powered by the brand’s patented ‘Healthy Hair Molecule’ (OFPMA), which helps block humidity 70% more effectively than traditional oils and silicones whilst repelling environmental grime and pollutants – this heavenly hair-hydrator is a must-have in the war against frizz – rendering tresses more meek, mild and manageable. Painstakingly developed with never-before-used hair care ingredients and technologies, Living Proof abandoned the usual hair care ‘recipes’, choosing instead to approach aesthetics from pharmaceutical, medical and biotech perspectives – with consistent advice and consultation from some of the world’s greatest stylists and industry veterans. The outcome? The happy fact that A-List-worthy hair now comes in bottles.
how_to_use: Start with No Frizz Shampoo. Apply No Frizz Conditioner to clean, wet hair, focusing on midshaft to ends. Spread evenly throughout hair. Rinse. Follow with one of Living Proof's No Frizz styling products.

name: Larry King Hair Care Velvet Texture Clay Larry King Hair Care Velvet Texture Clay
description: A great way to add instant body to ‘second day’ hair, Velvet Texture Clay provides non-greasy ‘oomph’ to limp locks that could desperately do with some ‘va va voom’. With a matte finish and featherweight, non-sticky feel, this gives ‘guts’ to cropped styles or some super-cool, Courtney Love texture to mid-lengths and ends for some ‘90s grunge-glamour. Delectably scented – an evocative blend of log fires, musk, moss and warm cedarwood (Larry calls it ‘Autumn Fog’) – this perfect pomade is contained in a gorgeous glass jar while its beautiful box is suffused with a medley of wildflower seeds so that should it wind up where it probably shouldn’t, the carton will sow some new blooms as it biodegrades.
how_to_use: Rub a pea-sized amount between your hands, as if you’re using hand cream. For shorter lengths, rub throughout your hair, working from the back to the front. Imagine you’re running your hands over velvet, pushing the pile in all different directions. For mid-lengths and ends, rub hair between the palms of your hands back and forth. Once the product is thoroughly distributed you’re free to work your style into shape.

name: invisibobble Original Hair Tie (3 Pack) - Crystal Clear invisibobble Original Hair Tie (3 Pack) - Crystal Clear
description: Named invisibobble because it leaves no trace in the hair, this next-generation hair tie has already converted hosts of hair care aficionados – and with good reason! Crafted from hygienic polyurethane in a market-leading spiral shape, the invisibobble Original offers strong hold without leaving a trace of damage in your hair – so you can say goodbye to kinks, snagging and painful tightness. Thanks to its smooth surface (it absorbs no bacteria or water) this innovation is clean as well as comfortable. What’s more, it provides impressive hold for all kinds of updos, requiring fewer hair pins than when using traditional hair ties. Kind to hair, the invisibobble original also looks great worn on your wrist, available in a multitude of cute colours and patterns.
how_to_use: Use to secure all kinds of updos.
ingredient: Polyurethane

name: Pattern Intensive Conditioner 384.5ml Pattern Intensive Conditioner 384.5ml
description: Low-porosity hair types, listen up! If you feel like your hair just can't get enough moisture, the Intensive Conditioner is about to change your tune as it soaks strands in a potent, moisturising formula, turning the tide on undefined, frizzy curls. As with all PATTERN hair care, the award-winning Intensive Conditioner is free of SLS/SLES, parabens, formaldehyde... the list goes on. But what it has got is a moisturising blend of avocado oil, shea butter, safflower oil and acacia decurrens flower that penetrates even the porest of strands with moisture. Not only that, this oil-rich blend protects from breakage and washes through hair, leaving behind a bounty of beautifully-defined curls. Leaving behind a light floral scent comprised of neroli, rose and patchouli, this deep conditioning treatment is a treat for dry, brittle tresses.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair from roots to ends. For extra dense curls or long hair, section with PATTERN Hair Clip while conditioning to ensure every strand gets the love it deserves. Use PATTERN Shower Brush or fingers to help detangle & bring curls together. Rinse thoroughly. Pro tip: For dry or brittle hair, leave conditioner on for 10 minutes as a repair treatment mask to help restore & revitalize your curls.

name: R+Co Death Valley Dry Shampoo (Various Sizes) R+Co Death Valley Dry Shampoo (Various Sizes)
description: Scented with R+Co's ROSY EYED scent (a beautiful blend of bergamot, wild fig, cyclamen, lotus flower, cedar wood and tonka beans) this multi-tasking miracle will leave your hair fresh and fragrant all day long. Simply spray DEATH VALLEY Dry Shampoo at the root to achieve your desired finish, whether you're removing excess oil, adding volume or creating 'bedhead' texture, this spray does it all - effortlessly. Silica absorbs excess oil, vitamin E nourishes and strengthens and pro-vitamin B5 thickens and builds volume for a lust-have hair look that will give everyone around you a major case of hair envy. Packaged in a sleek white opaque can with quintessential R+Co imagery, like the rest of this range DEATH VALLEY is vegan, cruelty-free, gluten-free, colour-safe and free from parabens, sulphates, mineral oils and petrolatum. An essential part of the trustworthy and transparent hair care range you need in your life.

name: dpHUE Cool Blonde Shampoo 8.5 fl. oz. dpHUE Cool Blonde Shampoo 8.5 fl. oz.
description: Brassiness, be gone! Just a few of minutes with the Cool Blonde Shampoo will help you to neutralise yellow tones within your strands, while gently cleansing your mane of dirt, excess sebum and debris. Looking for a shampoo superstar to help you indulge in your most beautiful blonde (even when you’re not fresh from the salon)? This rich, foaming and colour-locking formula uses specially formulated violet pigments to tone your mane — without harsh ingredients that might actually strip or dull your colour in the long run. And because the dpHUE team knows the toll bleach and colour (not to mention heat and environmental damage!) can take on your hair, this formula is brimming with hydrating ingredients like silk proteins and hibiscus flower extract to strengthen the hair, improve lustre and increase brightness.!
how_to_use: 1. Apply to wet hair, massaging into the hair & scalp. 2. Rinse thoroughly. For more intense results, leave on hair for up to five minutes. Use weekly or as often as needed.

name: Melanin Haircare Twist-Elongating Style Cream 475ml Melanin Haircare Twist-Elongating Style Cream 475ml
description: Designed to adapt to your hair's specific needs, the Twist-Elongating Styling Cream by Melanin Haircare nourishes, defines and detangles in one do-it all formula. The lightweight and buildable cream features five rich hair butters that work in harmony to condition the strands, including shea, mango, cocoa, kokum and cupuaçu. The benefits don't end there, as a blend of aloe vera, avocado, sweet almond oil and argan oil (phew) deliver a much-needed boost of hydration. Whether your hair is wet, dry, thick or thin, this versatile styling cream leaves strands ready to face the day.
how_to_use: Use as little or as much as needed. If you have thin hair, use less. For thicker hair, use more. Massage styling cream into wet or dry hair, one section at a time, and style as desired. Use with your favourite leave-in conditioner.
ingredient: Use as little or as much as needed. If you have thin hair, use less. For thicker hair, use more. Massage styling cream into wet or dry hair, one section at a time, and style as desired. Use with your favourite leave-in conditioner.

name: Innersense I Create Volume Lotion 59ml Innersense I Create Volume Lotion 59ml
description: A lush formula that unites Certified Organic honey and aloe vera to bring fullness and manageability to even the finest or damaged of hair. Wheat amino acids and eucalyptus then add moisture, improving expansion and shine. Make hair styling a luxe, lush and relaxing experience with the sublime Innersense range. The I Create Volume Lotion allows you to take a moment, rebalance and reach a newfound calm during styling. Use your fingertips to work the product roots to end, then blow- dry or style and feel ready for the day or night ahead. Now available in a handy travel sized 59ml version, you can take this dreamy formula wherever you go.

name: Living Proof Full Shampoo 236ml Living Proof Full Shampoo 236ml
description: When hair falls flat, you feel flat – which is why the brains and beauty experts behind Living Proof’s Full Shampoo, strove tirelessly to develop new and innovative technology, to create body and volume that lasts! Powdered by the brand's patented Healthy Hair Molecule (OFPMA), this must-have body-builder helps cleanse delicate hair types, whilst repelling dirt and oil to ensure your hair is not weighed down, promoting natural-looking fullness without any stiffness or restrictive weight. Painstakingly developed with never-before-used hair care ingredients and technologies – and without parabens, sulphates or silicones – Living Proof abandoned the usual shampoo ‘recipe’, choosing instead to approach aesthetics from pharmaceutical, medical and biotech perspectives – with consistent advice and consultation from some of the world’s greatest stylists and industry veterans. The outcome? The happy fact that A-List-worthy hair now comes in bottles.

name: BLEACH LONDON Silver Conditioner 250ml BLEACH LONDON Silver Conditioner 250ml
description: A clever cleanser that’s completely free from sulphates, BLEACH London’s Sulph Obsessed Shampoo is the only option for refreshing thirsty, dry hair without sacrificing the colour of a single strand. Enriched with sweet almond and lotus oil extracts, it boosts shine, strength and hydration, to keep hair looking healthy and full of vibrant colour. Like the entire bleach line, the shampoo is also completely cruelty-free and vegan, so your conscience – as well as scalp and strands – can be comforted.

name: Philip Kingsley Bond Builder Split End Remedy 50ml Philip Kingsley Bond Builder Split End Remedy 50ml
description: Working on and beneath the hair’s surface, Philip Kingsley’s pioneering Bond Builder Split End Remedy physically fortifies heat-weakened lengths and protects against damage from styling. Sealing and strengthening each individual strand, this ingenious formula fuses the compromised bonds to ‘undo’ any breakage and ward against ravages wrought by your straighteners, bleach, colour, sun and pollutants. Like ‘shrink-wrap’ for tresses, this has an immediate smoothing (and protective!) impact, granting a freshly cut feel that lasts up to three washes. In independent trials, 98.6% of split ends were sealed after one application, making this a boon for those susceptible to brittleness and breakage.
how_to_use: Start with a large pea sized amount, spreading in sections through mid-lengths and ends of towel dried hair. Pay close attention to the most damaged areas. Apply more to thicker or more damaged hair. For best results, blow-dry hair into desired style. Hair can be left to air dry. Re-apply at least every third wash. description: Going above and beyond in its hair-caring role, BREAD BEAUTY SUPPLY's hair-oil: everyday gloss — now available in a mini 30ml serving — is a versatile treatment that floods thirsty tresses with glossy hydration! Instantly redefine your your loosening curl with the Power Hour Curl Refreshing Spray and turn heads wherever you go… Fighting off frizz and sealing in moisture with a powerhouse blend of soybean extract, tapioca starch and sea buckthorn that’s enriched with hair-loving omega 7, this hydrating hero delivers a surge of energy to otherwise dreary-looking locks and amps up every single coil with optimal hydration that you can spot from a mile away. Bid crunchiness adieu and say bonjour to ultra-soft coils that’ll have everyone asking for your beauty secret.
how_to_use: Spritz through dry hair to instantly refresh curls. Scrunch hair upwards. To further boost body, tilt head forward and scrunch hair in an upward motion. Use throughout the day whenever curls need moisture or revived shape. Pro tip: Use on wet, freshly washed hair prior, then layer on top of curl corps cream and curl corps gel. Diffuse. You’ll have bounce and definition for days.

name: Aveda Cherry Almond Shampoo 250ml Aveda Cherry Almond Shampoo 250ml
description: Turning a mundane ritual into a luxury spa-like treat, the Cherry Almond Shampoo offers intense results and a deliciously floral fragrance that’ll have you saying “oooh” and “aaah” with every scrub of your scalp. Using naturally-derived cherry blossom and sweet almond oil, this delicate shampoo swiftly restores softness and shine to lacklustre locks – giving your mane a weightless bounce with every swish of your head. Babassu and coconut oils allow for a deep cleanse that maintains optimum oil and lipid levels, and a whopping 38 flower and plant essences (think: tonka bean, organic orange and ylang ylang) lend a perfumey aroma that infuses hair with a sweet, juicy scent. 98% naturally derived and safe for coloured hair, this scrumptious formula is ideal for all lengths of normal to dry textures, and is especially effective on long locks in need of a delightful boost.
how_to_use: Massage into wet hair. Rinse. Follow with cherry almond softening conditioner.

name: Hair By Sam McKnight Rich Nourish Conditioner 200ml Hair By Sam McKnight Rich Nourish Conditioner 200ml
description: The time has come to skinify your hair care rituals with Sam McKnight's deeply replenishing conditioner... the ultimate wash day essential. If your tresses have gone from lustrous to lacking lustre then you've come to the right corner of the beautysphere. A duo of two deeply replenishing seed oils -castor and sunflower - deliver a high concentration of omegas and minerals to cloak strands with a shiny, soft veil. Sustainable sugar beet and panthenol target dehydration and an infusion of Sam's signature botanical fragrance blend make this luxe conditioner a salon-worthy treat for your tresses.

name: Christophe Robin New Shade Variation Care - Ash Brown 250ml Christophe Robin New Shade Variation Care - Ash Brown 250ml
description: Part nourishing treatment, part colour-booster, the Shade Variation Mask in ‘Ash Brown’ is designed to restore and replenish your brunette mane in between colour treatments (or even if your hair shade is totally au natural!). As anyone will colour treated hair will know, keeping your lengths looking as fresh and vibrant as the day you stepped out of the salon is tricky. Luckily, this rich, velvety colour revival mask glazes strands with a unique blend of blue pigments and liquorice extracts to help neutralise brassiness and red tones, revitalising the coolness of a luminous brown. To smooth, soften and add a glossy shine you’ll find omega 6-rich almond oil and buriti oil which conditions and nourishes your mane, without weighing it down.
how_to_use: Apply the shade variation care to clean, towel-dried hair from root to tip. Lather by massaging into hair and leave in for 5-30 minutes, depending on the desired intensity. Rinse thoroughly. Tones are removed after 3-5 washes. Warning: Make sure you only leave the product in for 5 minutes the first time you use it to test how the pigments interact with your hair. Carry out a patch test 48 hours before application to avoid any allergic reactions. Wash hands immediately after application to avoid staining your nails. Avoid contact with eyes.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Glycerin, Cetrimonium Chloride, Mauritia Flexuosa Fruit Oil, Parfum (Fragrance), Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Citric Acid, Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract, Sericin, Disodium EDTA, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Ci 12245 ( Basic Red 76), Ci 60730 (Acid Violet 43), Ci 12719 (Basic Yellow 57), Ci 12250 ( Basic Brown 16), Ci 56059 ( Basic Blue 99), Tocopherol, BHT.

name: Davines Liquid Spell Davines Liquid Spell
description: Visibly transforming the structure of your strands – while enhancing their health and strength – Davines’ Liquid Spell is magical enough to live up to its name. Designed specifically for fine or sensitised hair, the liquid turns into a mousse when dispensed and grants instant texture and body to even the most limp, lacklustre locks. Thanks to a complex of amino acids, it boosts hair’s external structure to boost body, enhanced by a ‘thermo-activated molecule’. This helps to defend hair from heat damage: the formula ‘compacts’ your hair fibre to minimise damage while granting softness, shine and tone and boosting enviable vitality. This miraculous fluid can be used alone or in conjunction with your favourite hair care formulas – combine it with Davines’ {OI All In One Milk} for example, to immediately strengthen and boost your hair while reducing blow-dry time and leaving your mane magnificently fully-bodied, shiny and durable.
how_to_use: Dispense 3-4 pumps on towel-dried hair, applying it evenly from the roots to the ends and comb through. Finally, blow-dry and style as desired. It can be used in combination with any of your usual hair care products applying it after any product intended for scalp treatment and before hair treatments or styling products. Apply Liquid Spell Reinforcing Bodifying Fluid followed by OI All In One Milk. It will immediately strengthen and give body to your hair, for a time-reduced blow-dry and hair that’s full-bodied, shiny and durable
ingredient: Aqua / Water / Eau. Polysorbate 20, Propanediol, Parfum / Fragrance, Alcohol Denat, 1,2-Hexanediol, Coco-Betaine, Polyquaternium-11, Disodium Edta, Polyquater-Nium-53, Soy Amino Acids, Wheat Amino Acids, Citric Acid, Glycine, Lysine Hcl, Polyester-11, Pvp, Sodium Chloride, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Arginne Hcl, Serine, Threonine, Polyarcrylamidopro-Pyltrimonium Chloride, Polyquaternium-55, Quaternium-18, Phenoxyethanol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Benzyl Alcohol, Gamma-Docosalactone, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Caprylyl Glycol, Glycine Soja Sterols / Glycine Soja (Soybean) Sterols

name: Innersense Colour Radiance Daily Conditioner 946ml Innersense Colour Radiance Daily Conditioner 946ml
description: Lightweight and build-up-free, this Color Radiance Daily Conditioner moisturises and strengthens hair while imparting intense shine. A lust-have daily conditioner, this rich and luxe cream is formulated with intensely moisturising and cleansing rice bran oil and avocado oils that also provide effective smoothing, frizz-taming and elasticity-boosting properties. Rice proteins moisturise and strengthen while repairing and protecting, and shea butter naturally defines your hair texture for intensified waves and curls. Formulated with therapeutic essential oils, this divine product also allows you to take a moment to re-centre and rebalance while practising self care. Now even available in a huge, value-saving 946ml bottle, you never have to be without this hair hero again. We're obsessed!
how_to_use: After cleansing hair with Color Awakening Hairbath, take another deep breath and appreciate clean hair. Dispense Color Radiance Daily Conditioner, emulsify in hands and distribute from mid-length to ends with fingertips or comb. Leave on one to five minutes, then rinse thoroughly.

name: Living Proof PhD Conditioner Travel Size 60ml Living Proof PhD Conditioner Travel Size 60ml
description: Formulated to ensure every day is a Perfect Hair Day, this conditioner hydrates and nourishes without weighing down locks. What makes this particular product oh-so-special? It’s clever formulation is designed to give you the perfect balance of five of the most-coveted benefits in hair care: smoothness, volume, conditioning, strength and polish. We’re selling you on it, right? Add in a sulphate-free INCI list (sulphates can lead to serious dryness in your strands over time) and a light, fresh, citrusy fragrance, and you’re on to a winner.
how_to_use: Start with Perfect hair Day Shampoo. Then apply Perfect Hair Day Conditioner, spread through hair and rinse.

name: dpHUE Gentle Brightening Conditioner for Blonde Highlighted Hair 6.5 fl. oz dpHUE Gentle Brightening Conditioner for Blonde Highlighted Hair 6.5 fl. oz
description: Wash day shouldn’t cost your colour. Maintain the vibrancy of your blonde hair with dpHUE’s Gentle Brightening Conditioner. As well as leaving your strands silky, soft and strong, it’s formulated to prevent dullness and keep brassiness at bay too! This colour-safe conditioner provides much-needed slip and hydration to chemical-treated hair, helping to prevent damage and breakage. It’s also formulated with a gentle chelating agent that draws out dulling minerals, product residue and impurities to reveal your brightest blonde yet. Although it has the most visible results on blonde and highlighted hair, it can be used on darker hair to purify and condition it without impacting its colour.
how_to_use: Apply through clean, damp hair. Rinse thoroughly. For best results, use with dpHUE Gentle Brightening Shampoo.

name: ghd The Comb Out Detangling Hair Comb ghd The Comb Out Detangling Hair Comb
description: Whether you're detangling damp hair, combing through mousse or conditioner, or dressing bouncy curls into soft waves, The Comb Out does it all with gentle precision. This wide-toothed, anti-static design ensures that your hair is cared for even when it's at its most fragile and prone to damage. It's also heat-resistant so you can use it alongside blow-dryers, straighteners and curling wands alike. Start using this essential tool and you can guarantee that every day lives up to the brand's 'good hair day' motto.
how_to_use: Work on detangling your hair from the ends to the root. Hold each section as you comb to avoid causing stress to the root area.

name: Oribe Gold Lust Conditioner Refill 1000ml Oribe Gold Lust Conditioner Refill 1000ml
description: Don’t let your shower-time staple run out; stock up on Oribe’s Gold Lust Repair & Restore Conditioner with this refill. The luscious, restorative conditioner seals in moisture without weighing hair down, thanks to centuries-oil healing oils and extracts — including deeply moisturising Mediterranean Cyprus extract, shine-boosting argan oil and hydration-boosting maracuja oil. Alongside this, Oribe’s signature complex (of watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower extract) defends hair from oxidative stress, damage and the colour-fading effect of the elements. A bio-restorative complex (including plant collagen, caffeine and biotin) strengthens the hair cuticle from inside out, boosted by a protein blend that reverses existing damage and reduces split ends. Ultra-hydrating, this will leave your mane soft, smooth and magnificent.
how_to_use: Use to refill your luxe bottle. Massage, indulge (for at least one minute), rinse.

name: We Are Paradoxx Repair 3-in-1 Conditioner 250ml We Are Paradoxx Repair 3-in-1 Conditioner 250ml
description: There are not one, not two but three functions to this conditioner! Meaning whatever tantrum your hair is throwing, it’s nothing this repair-focused conditioner can’t handle. This 3-in-1 conditioner works with you not against you by offering flexibility so you can tweak your hair care regime as you please. When days call for more TLC, leave the conditioner in as a mask to soak in all the goodness or rinse and go if you’ve got to dash! No matter the method, you can still reap the benefits of We are Paradoxx’s holy trinity of ingredients: carragreen moss to fortify hair, coconut oil for hydration and matcha green tea for fuller-looking (and healthy!) hair.
how_to_use: After shampooing, work into wet hair and rinse. You can also apply to towel dried hair as a leave in conditioner or on dry hair as a styling balm.

name: Briogeo MegaStrength Dandruff Control Shampoo 248ml Briogeo MegaStrength Dandruff Control Shampoo 248ml
description: Providing a gently cleansing exfoliation, the Scalp Revival MegaStrength+ Dandruff Relief Shampoo Charcoal + AHA/BHA is specifically formulated for those with scalp itching, irritation, redness or flaking due to dandruff, psoriasis, and seborrheic dermatitis. You’ll probably recognise some of your favourite skin care ingredients within this innovative formula — your scalp is just an extension of the skin on your face and body after all. 3% salicylic acid (a beta-hydroxy acid) and hydrating lactic acid (an alpha-hydroxy acid) gently slough away dead skin calls on your scalp that can cause itchiness and flakiness, while also lifting away dryness, excess oils, product build up, and dirt. To really prevent your hair follicles getting clogged up with impurities, products and excess sebum (this can cause that itchiness and irritation!), there’s also binchotan charcoal which detoxifies your scalp and draws out all that build up. The result? A happy, healthy and flake-free head of hair!
how_to_use: Gentle enough for daily use. For best results, use at least twice a week or as directed by a doctor or physician. Massage into wet scalp and hair to build lather, then rinse.

name: Hair By Sam McKnight Rich Cleanse Shampoo 250ml Hair By Sam McKnight Rich Cleanse Shampoo 250ml
description: The time has come to skinify your hair care rituals with Sam McKnight's deeply replenishing shampoo... the ultimate wash day essential. Scalp care goes strand in strand with healthy hair, which is why finding the right shampoo to care for your hair is of the utmost importance. The Rich Cleanse Nourishing Shampoo from Sam McKnight has been designed to care for coloured, thirsty and damaged lengths. Naturally derived mild surfactants sweep away excess oil, dirt and product residue without drying out your scalp, making this gentle shampoo a must for those with sensitive scalps. A quinoa pro complex and conditioning plant keratin have been combined to create a nourishing powerhouse. These hair heroes are rich in amino acids that leave brittle hair feeling instantly softened. Finished with moisturising and shine-inducing sugar beet and Sam's signature botanical fine fragrance to start you on your healthy hair journey.
how_to_use: Gently massage into wet hair and scalp. Repeat and follow with conditioner if required.

name: BREAD BEAUTY SUPPLY hair-wash: gentle milky hair cleanser BREAD BEAUTY SUPPLY hair-wash: gentle milky hair cleanser
description: Get wash day off to a good start with BREAD BEAUTY SUPPLY's hair-wash: gentle milky hair cleanser — a refreshing and replenishing blend that effectively cleans without drying or tangling your curls. Think: when a cleanser and co-wash collide... Inspired by sensitive skin cleansers for your face and perfectly suited to 3a–4c curl types, this ultra-gentle hair and scalp cleanser has a lightly foaming action that spruces up your strands without leaving them feeling stripped or depleted - all thanks to a nourishing medley of botanical oils and plant extracts. It's infused with hero hair care ingredient, argan oil to moisturise and soften your hair; vitamin- and mineral-rich aloe vera juice to balance your scalp and deliver the hydration that curls and coils crave; as well as lemon tea tree oil to soothe delicate and stressed scalps. We're obsessed!
how_to_use: Section wet hair into four equal parts. Apply, section at a time, making sure the product reaches both your scalp and strands. Scrub using the pads of your fingers, then rinse. Repeat. Or don’t.

name: Briogeo Scalp Revival Charcoal + Tea Tree Scalp Treatment Serum Briogeo Scalp Revival Charcoal + Tea Tree Scalp Treatment Serum
description: Detoxifying, soothing and hydrating, Briogeo’s Scalp Revival Charcoal + Tea Tree Scalp Treatment is the SOS dry, flaky and irritated scalps are crying out for. At the forefront of the crack team of reviving ingredients, Binchotan charcoal draws impurities from the scalp and hair follicle to remove build up. Cooling peppermint, spearmint and tea tree oils reduce itchiness and offer healing antiseptic properties to reduce inflammation. And as if that wasn’t enough, super vitamin biotin provides essential nutrients to the hair follicle to support healthy hair growth.
how_to_use: Part the hair into sections, apply 1-2 drops to each partition and massage into the scalp. Do not rinse out. The treatment should be applied after washing and before styling. It can also be applied before bedtime as a pre-shampoo scalp treatment. Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. For external use only.

name: Kitsch Satin Pillow Scrunchie Kitsch Satin Pillow Scrunchie
description: Minimising damage while looking totally chic, these scrunchies are far more than a nod to the 90s Covering specially selected elasticated bands with beautifully soft satin, Kitschs Satin Pillow Scrunchies won't crimp or disrupt your strands while you sleep, allowing you to wake up frizz and crease-free! Whether youre creating a ballet bun, the highest high ponytail, tossing your hair in a topknot or creating an intricate do, this sumptuous silk ensures that you create no kinks or creases while being kind to your delicate locks, ensuring that theres no damage or breakage. Think: night-time necessity.

name: Innersense Pure Harmony Hairbath 946ml Innersense Pure Harmony Hairbath 946ml
description: A sulphate-free formula that’ll leave your precious locks feeling (and smelling) wonderful, this gentle shampoo is a must for fine to medium hair types. Featuring a series of natural ingredients such as coconut, rice bran and avocado oils, it purifies your hair and scalp while granting soft-to-the-touch smoothness. A dream team of antioxidant-rich green tea and cranberry seed oils help to heal and soothe any irritation at your scalp, while imparting moisture and softness to your strands. Incorporating a sensual element into your shower routine, pumpkin seed and orange flower oils add an uplifting top note, releasing tension and boosting circulation. Now available in full size 295ml, travel-friendly 59ml and huge, value-saving 946ml bottles, you never have to be without this hair hero again.
how_to_use: Thoroughly saturate hair with water. Take a deep breath and become centred. Begin by dispensing a small amount of hairbath into hands and emulsify into a light lather. Apply with fingertips to scalp, massaging and cleansing. Rinse thoroughly. Repeat if necessary and follow with Pure Inspiration Daily Conditioner.

name: Philip Kingsley Flaky/Itchy Scalp 8-Day Kit (Worth £39.50) Philip Kingsley Flaky/Itchy Scalp 8-Day Kit (Worth £39.50)
description: Celebrating the multi-award winning range that's specially designed to relieve and clear irritated scalps of flakes and build up, the Flaky Itchy Regime Kit stars deluxe editions of the Flaky Itchy Scalp Shampoo (75ml), Flaky Itchy Scalp Toner (75ml) and a full size duo of the Flaky/Itchy Scalp Masks (2 x 20ml). Unlike other dandruff treatments, the Flaky Itchy Scalp Shampoo does not dry out the hair or strip it of colour, instead, it gently cleanses with specialised ingredients to remove build up and irritation. Water-based and fragrance-free, with continued use the Flaky Itchy Scalp Toner prevents the recurrence of flakes and build-up of dead skill cells due to its anti-microbial and anti-flaking formula. Finally, the tubes (one tube is adequate for one full scalp application) of Flaky Itchy Scalp Mask is formulated with anti-fungal piroctone olamine, exfoliating salicylic acid and antioxidant-rich green tea extract to calm whilst tackling the root cause of dandruff and dry, flaking scalps at bay.
how_to_use: Please see individual product pages.

name: Philip Kingsley Pure Colour Anti-Fade Shampoo 250ml Philip Kingsley Pure Colour Anti-Fade Shampoo 250ml
description: Benefitting course, fine, medium and naturally coiled hair types, the Pure Colour Anti-Fade Shampoo locks in and extends the lifetime of your colour – whether you dyed it at home or in the salon – while extending the life of chemical styling treatments, with an aim to help you go for longer between salon appointments. Working to improve on vibrancy and shine, this sulphate-free formula even adds body and bounce while soothing and conditioning the scalp for optimum hair health. In fact – when compared to a standard shampoo in a lab-controlled test – this formula prolongs colour by up to 100% longer, and protects your colour for up to 24 washes! It does this via green tea extract – an antioxidant-rich ingredient than protects hair colour from water, UV rays and free radical pollutants. A protein-based complex also strengthens the hair and builds its resistance to brushing and combing, while pro vitamin B5 imparts moisture, shine and silkiness to improve on manageability while limiting the damage caused by chemical treatments.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair and lather, gently kneading the scalp for 60 seconds. Rinse well and repeat if necessary. If colour treating your hair at home, use to wash out colour following application and for each wash following. If having hair colour treated or chemically processed in the salon, use from the first wash after having hair treated.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Disodium Laureth-9 Sulfosuccinate, Sodium Lauroamphoacetate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Steareth-100/PEG-136/HDI Copolymer, Betaine, Sodium Cocoyl Alaninate, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Parfum (Fragrance), Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Polyquaternium-53, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Phytic Acid, Panthenyl Hydroxypropyl Steardimonium Chloride, Butylene Glycol, Coumarin, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Disodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin.

name: BLEACH LONDON I Saw Red Super Cool Colour 150ml BLEACH LONDON I Saw Red Super Cool Colour 150ml
description: Ensure that your mane is anything but run-of-the-mill (without the colour commitment) with BLEACH London’s Super Cool Colour, a non-permanent hair colour cream mask that transforms bleached and toned tresses. In just 30 minutes, this rich, luscious mask can reveal a rainbow of bold, chic shades. From beautifully bright ‘The Big Pink’ to perfect pastels ‘Awkward Peach’ and ‘Blullini’, to brilliantly bold turquoise ‘Washed Up Mermaid’, there’s a shade to suit every aesthetic. Each shade has a different lifecycle - the more subtle 'Rosé' will fade in 1-3 washes, while the ultra-bright 'I Saw Red' lasts from 3-30 washes - so be sure to check before you invest; plus, the colour and fade will vary depending upon the tone and porosity of your hair. Sure to satisfy the wildest colour chameleons and indecisive individuals, get ready to explore your every shade craving. Like the entire BLEACH range, Super Cool Colour is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason we love it. Want to get the best out of your new-found colour? Stock up on the corresponding toning shampoo and conditioner to maintain vibrancy!
how_to_use: Wearing gloves, apply generously to shampooed, towel dried hair. Massage or comb through mid-lengths and ends to ensure you cover all the hair evenly, leave to develop for 30 minutes. Rinse out with lukewarm water and style as desired. For best results apply on very light blonde, bleached hair. Colour may vary depending on existing tone and porosity of hair. One bottle is suitable for short hair or colouring freshly bleached and toned roots. For shoulder-length hair you'll need two bottles. For long hair that's below your shoulders, you'll need three to four bottles. If your hair is very thick we recommend adding an extra bottle.
