name: Aveda Sap Moss Weightless Hydration Shampoo 200ml Aveda Sap Moss Weightless Hydration Shampoo 200ml
description: Looking to the earth's produce to enrich your tresses, this Sap Moss Shampoo from Aveda is carefully crafted to cleanse and hydrate your hair without the weighing it down, so you achieve beautifully shiny, manageable locks. The 94% naturally derived, silicone-free formula is made with a unique blend of Iceland moss and larch tree sap and coconut extract to deliver featherweight yet effective hydration to thirsty, frizz-prone strands. Helping to refresh and revitalise your hair without leaving it feeling stripped in any way, this clever concoction will sweep through the competition to win a spot in your shower. Not convinced? In consumer testing of 420 women (with hair of all textures) using the shampoo and conditioner, 90% said their hair was immediately left feeling hydrated without feeling weighed down. Plus, the formula is infused with a beautiful, earthy aroma that boasts notes of jasmine and certified organic olibanum and cypress.
how_to_use: Emulsify a small amount into hands, massage into wet hair and scalp. Rinse thoroughly. Follow with sap moss™ weightless hydrating conditioner.

name: WetBrush Pro Detangler - Purple WetBrush Pro Detangler - Purple
description: An innovation in hair care, the Pro Detangler has totally transformed our locks (and lives)! Detangling in mere minutes, this (let’s be honest, fairly ordinary looking) brush is the secret to happy hair, healthy scalp, and no more mornings spent wrestling (crying) over that nape-of-the-neck dread that’s developed… Lightweight and easy to wield, the Pro Detangler seamlessly separates all knots and tats without compromising precious strands. This is all due to the revolutionary ‘Intelliflex’ technology; the thin, strong yet super flexible bristles have brains – yielding or unbending as required – to glide through tangles with next-to-no tugging, tearing or tress distress. What’s more, the ball-tip bristles are perfect for gently stimulating circulation near the scalp, to better feed your follicles and encourage new growth.
how_to_use: Use to smooth and detangle wet or dry hair. Suitable for all lengths and textures.

name: Oribe Bright Blonde Conditioner for Beautiful Color 200ml Oribe Bright Blonde Conditioner for Beautiful Color 200ml
description: Achieve your most beautiful blonde with Oribe’s Bright Blonde Conditioner for Beautiful Color, a revitalising, moisturising violet conditioner that corrects brassiness and hydrates for hair that is soft, strong, shiny and ‘lit from within’. The formula moisturises and restores strands without weighing them down, smoothing each cuticle to seal in moisture and help to reduce split ends. Available in two sizes, pick from the 200ml full size or the 50ml mini to try this fan favourite on for size (or ensure you're never without your go-to while travelling. Pure violet pigment, reflective pearls and a brightening complex – of lemon, ginger root and chamomile extracts – optimise hair colour and luminosity, while luscious natural oils (including moringa seed and jojoba oils) condition locks. Purple orchid extract, known as the flower of longevity, repairs damaged hair, conditions and prevents moisture loss, while Swiss garden cress sprouts detoxify and protect hair from environmental aggressors. Boosting this protection, Oribe’s signature complex (crafted from watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower extracts) defends hair from oxidative stress and the deterioration of natural collagen, while multi-UV protection shields hair from the colour-depleting effects of the sun’s rays.
how_to_use: Massage, indulge (for at least one minute), rinse

name: ghd The All-Rounder Paddle Hair Brush ghd The All-Rounder Paddle Hair Brush
description: ghd stands for 'good hair day' - a motto that the All-Rounder Paddle Brush certainly lives up to. If you're looking to create smooth and shiny salon-worthy locks at home, and receive multiple compliments, this is your new can't-live-without-it tool.  Designed for mid to long hair, the All-Rounder gently detangles tresses without creating static (cue extra points from us). The broad flat base is ideal for styling larger sections of hair, whether you're creating a Hollywood-inspired blowout or smoothing your locks into a sleek updo - although it's just as good at ensuring your fringe sits perfectly straight, too. And just to make things extra easy and efficient, it has a non-slip handle so you'll feel like a total pro every time you use it.
how_to_use: Blast your hair on a low heat and medium speed setting until 80% dry, then brush it through from root to tip using swift strokes, while following the direction of your brush with your hairdryer. Ensure your dryer's nozzle is on to concentrate the air flow. Top tip: For a straight fringe that sits perfectly, alternate between brushing to the left and right with the paddle brush, while blasting with your dryer on a low heat and medium speed setting.

name: Living Proof PhD Shampoo 236ml Living Proof PhD Shampoo 236ml
description: A fan favourite, Living Proof's Perfect Hair Day (PhD) Shampoo is a beautiful phthalate, paraben, silicone, sulfate and cruelty-free formula that helps you wash your hair less often, improves health and condition over time and makes locks feel cleaner for longer. A revolutionary formula, the shampoo is powered by the brand's patented 'Healthy Hair Molecule' (OFPMA), which does four things: smooths hair, polishes and protects strands, creates visibly healthier hair over time and helps repel dirt and oil to keep hair cleaner, longer. Prepare to become seriously obsessed.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair. Lather. Rinse. Follow with Perfect hair Day Conditioner.

name: Act+Acre Cold Processed Scalp Renew 2 oz Act+Acre Cold Processed Scalp Renew 2 oz
description: Hit the refresh button on your tender scalp with the itch-preventing Scalp Renew, an gently exfoliating scalp treatment that helps to rebalance sebum levels, remove build and - yes and target dandruff. Phew! Applying a skin care approach to your wash day rituals and bursting with a cooling and soothing blend of peppermint extract, papaya extract and salicylic acid, this oil-balancing remedy works to give your delicate scalp the much-needed exhale it needs. Perfect for all hair types from straight to coily, this restorative must-have is just what you need to give your scalp the reboot it's been longing for.
how_to_use: Ensure hair is dry. Section and apply Scalp Renew directly to scalp. Concentrate a thin layer on problem areas and massage. Leave for 15 minutes, then rinse with the cleanse and conditioner.

name: Living Proof Curl Enhancer 200ml Living Proof Curl Enhancer 200ml
description: Weightless – that’s how your hair will feel after treating it to Living Proof’s Curl Enhancer. Formulated to boost naturally wavy heads, this conditioning style enhances natural texture without compromising on weight. Working to moisturise and provide protection against frizz while helping you to regain control of disobedient flyaways, the Curl Enhancer won’t weigh heavy on your head – even when used from the very root! Using the brand’s ‘Healthy Curl Complex’, this formula ensures effortlessly soft, shiny and healthy waves – all while helping to improve wave definition. Safe for coloured and chemically treated lengths, the Curl Enhancer is cruelty-free and doesn’t include any silicones, parabens, phthalates or sulphates. *Hair flips*
how_to_use: Start with a small amount and add more as needed. If you have coarse, wavy hair, you may prefer the medium conditioning benefits of the {Curl Definer}. For added hold, we recommend finishing your style with {Curl Defining Gel}. For added shine, we recommend finishing your style with {Curl Moisturizing Shine Oil}. Curl Enhancer does not make straight hair wavy as it was designed for naturally wavy textures. If you're looking to add waves to naturally straight hair, try the Perfect hair Day (PhD) In-Shower Styler.

name: Amika Un.Done Volume & Texture Spray Amika Un.Done Volume & Texture Spray
description: For an effortlessly undone, piecey, just-stepped-off-the-catwalk-into-the-streets-of-Paris look, the Un.Done Volume & Texture Spray adds instant volume and purposefully imperfect texture. Cruelty-free and vegan, this lightweight finishing spray will give you the bedhead without the bed, adding tousled texture to already-styled hair. Also providing light hold with an intoxicating scent that’ll have other heads turning (think: warm vanilla, spicy-sweet clover and fresh citrus), this spray enhances your hair’s own natural texture – encouraging volume and giving flat hair the boot. Zeolite minerals fight frizz and detoxify; rice starch absorbs dirt and oil while adding body; and sea buckthorn (an incredibly potent and natural ‘superfuit’) pumps strands with omega 7 fatty acids and antioxidant-rich vitamins to promote elasticity, protect and provide superior levels of hydration to both hair and scalp.
how_to_use: Shake well. Spray on dry, styled hair all over or where needed for texture, volume, and undone sexiness. Tousle hair.

name: Aveda Shampure Nurturing Shampoo 250ml Aveda Shampure Nurturing Shampoo 250ml
description: Treat your tresses to a shampoo that's so gentle, so nourishing that you'll never want to part from it. That's where Aveda's Shampure Nurturing Shampoo comes in! Refreshing in an instant and revealing beautifully soft hair, don't be surprised if you feel the urge to swish your strands... This effective formula is powered by a medley of conditioning ingredients that help to leave your hair feeling squeaky clean, revitalised and ever-so shiny. This silicone-free shampoo is made from 96%(!) naturally derived ingredients, including Abyssinian oil, an impressively lightweight extract that delivers intense hydration without overloading your hair. Best of all, it's made with Aveda's signature calming aroma that's crafted from 25 pure flower and plants essences that will ensure your shower and your strands are scented to perfection.
how_to_use: Massage into wet hair. Rinse. Follow with shampure™ nurturing conditioner.

name: BLEACH LONDON Lavender Grey Toner Kit BLEACH LONDON Lavender Grey Toner Kit
description: Grey is officially chic… and lilac-tinted grey is even chicer – and there’s no better way to nail this trend than BLEACH London’s Lavender Grey Toner Kit. A nourishing semi-permanent toner, this covetable kit contains all you need to add a lavender- grey sheen tones to pre-lightened hair. There’s a tube of colourant, a bottle of developer lotion (peroxide) and a deeply conditioning treatment mask to care for coloured strands, as well as a pair of plastic gloves and an instruction leaflet to keep things as foolproof as possible. As if all that wasn’t enough, the collection is completely cruelty-free and vegan – like all of BLEACH’s products – so you can feel caring as well as über-cool. It will last for around 16-20 washes on pre-lightened hair.
how_to_use: Lasts for around 16-20 washes. For use on pre-lightened hair. If your hair isn’t already blonde, use BLEACH LONDON TOTAL BLEACH, BLEACH LONDON DIY DIP DYE or BLEACH LONDON BEACH LIGHTS to lighten hair first. The colour achieved and the length of its duration can be influenced by many factors including: Hair condition, porosity, length, fineness, shade and any previous treatments. The final effect will depend on your current hair colour. Best results will be seen on already bleached or highlighted blonde hair. You may need more than one pack if your hair is long, thick or hasn’t been dyed before. It’s always a good idea to have another pack to hand just in case one runs out before you’re finished colouring.

name: Amika Bust Your Brass Intense Repair Mask 100ml Amika Bust Your Brass Intense Repair Mask 100ml
description: All blondes are welcome — bring your strands back to life with this transformative hair wash treatment, infused with brass busting ultra-violet pigments and plant butters to keep your mane strong and colour vibrant. Here to bring the best out of lighter-toned tresses, amika’s Bust Your Brass Cool Blonde Repair Shampoo unites innovative ‘Bond Cure Technology’ to keep breakage at bay, with corrective pigments to leave your hair strong and colour on point. Working alongside your normal hair wash days, this ultra-violet hued shampoo counteracts unwanted brassy and yellow tones to keep blondes, silvers or greys as intended. Damaged hair, we don’t know her! This cleansing treatment is packed full of vegan proteins derived from quinoa (it’s not just for your bougie salad) to help provide keratin-like benefits for your strands that don’t leave your hair feeling brittle and weak. Three nourishing plant butters, including mango butter extract and shea butter, provide a supercharged dose of omegas, essential vitamins and fatty acids, so even the most lacklustre hair will be revived after a little one on one time with this innovative and intoxicatingly scented shampoo… we’re just about ready to bathe in the warming aroma of spicy sweet clover, fresh citrus and vanilla. Get ready to bust your brass and perfect your hair flick.
how_to_use: If you are a natural (non-colour treated) blonde: In the summer months (when hair is more likely to become brassy), use the bust your brass shampoo + conditioner every other wash. use the Bust Your Brass Repair Mask 1x per week in place of conditioner. If you are a platinum blonde: To maintain tone, use Bust Your Brass Shampoo + Conditioner every other wash. We suggest alternating Bust Your Brass Shampoo + Conditioner with the Kure Shampoo + Conditioner and Multi-Task Repair Treatment. Use bust your brass repair mask 1x per week in place of conditioner. If you notice pesky brassiness pop up, use the Bust Your Brass system every wash until desired tone is reached. Keep track of your tone: if you're loving your tone, keep up your routine as is. If you notice brassiness peeking in, increase use of the Bust Your Brass mask an additional time per week. If you are a little too cool-toned and nearing a violet tone, cut back on the Bust Your Brass routine for a week or two. If you have highlights, a balayage, or natural-looking (colour-treated) blonde hair: Use bust your brass shampoo + conditioner every other wash. Assess hair's tone and pivot (increase or decrease usage) as needed. Those with naturally dark hair should use the bust your brass intense repair mask 1x per week in place of conditioner. Please note: naturally darker or brunette hair will fight to return to natural hair color; in this case, increase the usage of system. If you have grey hair: Use bust your brass shampoo + mask every wash or alternate every other wash with the kure collection. If you are a textured blonde: Follow the regimen suggested above based on the type of blonde, but use the Bust Your Brass Repair Mask in place of conditioner for an extra dose of moisture. The bust your brass repair mask is the perfect mix of toning, moisture, and repair which is just what a textured blonde needs.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Peg-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Glyceryl Stearate, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn/Argousier) Fruit/Seed Oil, Borago Officinalis (Borage/Bourrache) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado/Avocat) Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango/Mangue) Seed Butter, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea/Karite) Butter, Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender/Lavande) Flower Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria/Matricaire) Flower Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary/Romarin) Leaf Extract, Hydrolyzed Quinoa, Aminomethyl Propanol, Bis-Pca Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Disodium Edta, Disodium Peg-12 Dimethicone Sulfosuccinate, Peg-55 Propylene Glycol Oleate, Peg-12 Dimethicone, Peg-150 Distearate, Peg-150 Stearate, Polyquaternium-10, Polyquaternium-7, Polysorbate 20, Propylene Glycol, Polyethylene Glycol, Citric Acid, Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Benzoic Acid, Stearic Acid, Sodium Chloride, Fragrance/Parfum, Benzyl Benzoate, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Ext. name: VIRTUE Full Shampoo 240ml VIRTUE Full Shampoo 240ml
description: Fancy a shampoo that rebuilds damage with every use? Us too! Enter, Virtue’s Full Shampoo, a game-changing way to cleanse and care for your (increasingly) magnificent mane. A true innovation in hair care, Virtue’s advanced formulations are enriched with Alpha Keratin 60ku, a whole, human keratin born from regenerative medicine. Since it is identical to the keratin in your hair, the protein is instantly recognised, binding directly to areas of damage and filling them – not just coating strands or weighing them down. This Full Shampoo also creates enviable volume, dissolving excess oil, lifting the root and plumping each strand for weightless, long-lasting body. Alongside the advanced keratin, the formula is enriched with pink pomelo (rich in vitamins A, C, B1 and zinc), moisture and shine-boosting hydrolysed quinoa and biotin, a hard-working form of vitamin B known for boosting strength and shine. Ideal for fine, flat hair that won’t hold, this luscious shampoo is scented with a revitalising citrus blend of flowers and greens, including stimulating spearmint leaf oil and bright lemon essential oil. What's more, after one week of using the shampoo and conditioner in a clinical trial, 87% of users reported that their hair had more body, while 84% found their hair felt thicker!
how_to_use: Work a small amount between palms, apply to wet hair, from mid-shaft to ends; leave in for 1-3 minutes before rinsing thoroughly. For best results, pair with your favourite Virtue Conditioner.

name: BLEACH LONDON Super Cool Colour - Odd Fuchsia 150ml BLEACH LONDON Super Cool Colour - Odd Fuchsia 150ml
description: Ensure that your mane is anything but run-of-the-mill (without the colour commitment) with BLEACH London’s Super Cool Colour, a non-permanent hair colour cream mask that transforms bleached and toned tresses. In just 30 minutes, this rich, luscious mask can reveal a rainbow of bold, chic shades. From beautifully bright ‘The Big Pink’ to perfect pastels ‘Awkward Peach’ and ‘Blullini’, to brilliantly bold turquoise ‘Washed Up Mermaid’, there’s a shade to suit every aesthetic. Each shade has a different lifecycle - the more subtle 'Rosé' will fade in 1-3 washes, while the ultra-bright 'I Saw Red' lasts from 3-30 washes - so be sure to check before you invest; plus, the colour and fade will vary depending upon the tone and porosity of your hair. Sure to satisfy the wildest colour chameleons and indecisive individuals, get ready to explore your every shade craving. Like the entire BLEACH range, Super Cool Colour is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason we love it. Want to get the best out of your new-found colour? Stock up on the corresponding toning shampoo and conditioner to maintain vibrancy!
how_to_use: Wearing gloves, apply generously to shampooed, towel dried hair. Massage or comb through mid-lengths and ends to ensure you cover all the hair evenly, leave to develop for 30 minutes. Rinse out with lukewarm water and style as desired. For best results apply on very light blonde, bleached hair. Colour may vary depending on existing tone and porosity of hair. One bottle is suitable for short hair or colouring freshly bleached and toned roots. For shoulder-length hair you'll need two bottles. For long hair that's below your shoulders, you'll need three to four bottles. If your hair is very thick we recommend adding an extra bottle.

name: Davines Alchemic Conditioner - Silver 250ml Davines Alchemic Conditioner - Silver 250ml
description: A colour-based conditioning cream designed to intensify and protect your natural or chosen hair colour. This luxurious conditioner contains hydrolysed milk proteins that deeply moisturise and protect hair. It is formulated with strong colour pigments to enhance and maintain your colour for a vibrant, long lasting effect. This conditioner leaves your hair feeling salon treated after just one use & works best when used after Alchemic Shampoo. Available in 'Silver Fox' for light/ash blondes and grey hair to bring down any brassiness, 'Golden Blond' to bring warmth and depth to honeyed blonds, 'Chocolate' to add a warm richness to Brunettes and 'Red' to add fire to auburn to redheads.

name: Christophe Robin Cleansing Purifying Scrub with Sea Salt 250ml Christophe Robin Cleansing Purifying Scrub with Sea Salt 250ml
description: Discover this deeply cleansing shampoo that works to slough away daily build up as it cleans your locks, revealing a rebalanced and refreshed scalp and radiant lengths. For a gentle exfoliation (that won’t irritate already sensitive or inflamed skin!), this detoxing formula uses sea salt crystals (which won’t clog up your plug or cause damage to the environment like other exfoliants!). There’s a ‘Natural Carbohydrate Complex’ which helps to rebalance your scalp's natural defences by reducing the moisture barrier-compromising effects of dehydration. And you’ll also find bisabolol, extracted from the Brazilian candeia tree, which helps to calm your scalp as it cleanses away dirt, pollution and excess oil.
how_to_use: Once a week, or immediately after rinsing a chemical colourant, apply a tablespoon of product onto wet hair. Gently massage into the scalp, including the nape of the neck, and emulsify. Rinse thoroughly.

name: Living Proof No Frizz Smooth Styling Spray 198ml Living Proof No Frizz Smooth Styling Spray 198ml
description: Specifically formulated for fine hair, Living Proof No Frizz Smooth Styling Spray might be light in weight but its multi-tasking ability is next-level: it offers heat protection up to 450°F/232°C, detangles, boosts shine, and leaves strands more manageable to make styling a breeze. Amaranth seed extract tops up the hair’s lipid levels and locks out humidity, restoring natural slip and silkiness — without the need for silicones. Living Proof’s might-be-magic proprietary smoothing technology aligns hair fibres for locks that look 6x smoother for up to 96 hours. Say bye-bye to those flyaways.
how_to_use: Apply to clean, damp hair from roots to end. Comb through. Blow-dry for a smooth style.

name: Color Wow Dream Cocktail - Carb Infused 200ml Color Wow Dream Cocktail - Carb Infused 200ml
description: A leave-in conditioning, thickening treatment, Color Wow’s Carb Cocktail Bionic Tonic not only protects but transforms your blow-dry into something that’s actually great for your hair. Packed with vital nutrients to amplify your ‘oomph’, this heat-activated tonic works to ‘fatten’ strands to volumise for big and bouncy lengths. Perfect for those with fine, compromised hair, this wraps every strand with a weightless, invisible cocktail of cellulose, starch and oat bran which responds to the heat of your dryer to optimise fullness.

name: Oribe Serene Scalp Balancing Conditioner 6.8 fl. oz. Oribe Serene Scalp Balancing Conditioner 6.8 fl. oz.
description: Ideal for tresses in a tizz, the Serene Scalp Balancing Conditioner works to balance, deeply hydrate and soothe the scalp using acacia tree extract while giving troublesome dandruff flakes the boot. Ultra-nourishing, this conditioner encourages a happy equilibrium atop your scalp while quenching thirsty strands with shea butter and unwinding tangles for soft, silky, more manageable hair. Oribé’s Signature Complex feeds hair with watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower to defend against oxidative and environmental stress alongside the deterioration of natural keratin. Biotin and quinoa strengthen the hair cuticle, prevent breakage and revitalise brittle strands, while caffeine stimulates the scalp and rejuvenates hair follicles. Expect gorgeous shine via lightweight olive oil with restored levels of elasticity as the super sweet, Insta-worthy packaging adds a pretty, pastel touch to your shower-side décor.

name: Oribe Free Styler Working Hairspray 9 oz. Oribe Free Styler Working Hairspray 9 oz.
description: Achieve ‘workable’ hold with this ultra-fine, ultra-dry mist, which can be layered, styled and reworked to perfection. With a flexible polymer blend, the spray gives light styling hold with a ‘brushable’, satin finish, while kukui seed oil moisturises and protects, ginseng root extract prevents breakage and hydrogenated cottonseed oil strengthens, promotes elasticity and softens strands. It can be layered with other products for stronger hold and is perfectly suitable for colour and keratin-treated manes, all while being totally vegan and cruelty-free.
how_to_use: Shake and spray to add light hold. Shape and reshape as desired. Finish with a final mist to set styles.

name: Oribe Power Drops Damage Repair Booster Oribe Power Drops Damage Repair Booster
description: Supercharge your hair care with this potent booster from Oribe. Highly-concentrated, this Power Drops Damage Repair Booster provides an intense dose of essential nutrients to rebuild and restore dry, damaged, time-weakened hair. Formulated with linoleic acid, biotin and sea kelp extract, just a few drops of this powerful elixir repairs and fortifies strands. Tired of dry, damaged hair? Then let us introduce you to Oribe's Power Drops Damage Repair Booster. This mini but mighty formula is jam-packed with good-to-hair actives that promise to revive lacklustre locks. It's formulated with a 2% hyaluronic acid complex which acts like a sponge, holding onto moisture in hair while creating a barrier around the cuticle for deep hydration and conditioning as well as Oribe's signature complex of watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower which defends hair from oxidative stress, photoageing and the deterioration of natural keratin all while protecting from the drying, damaging and color-depleting effects of the elements. But it doesn't stop there, this booster is also brimming with linoleic acid - an essential fatty acid that strengthens and repairs damage by rebuilding hair's healthy structure and functionality, biotin - which is known to strengthen strands and reduce hair fallout caused by breakage and finally, sea kelp extract - rich in vitamins A, B and E, this deeply hydrates and restores elasticity while smoothing the cuticle and enhancing softness, just a few drops of this powerful elixir repairs and fortifies strands. Entirely fuss-free, you can mix this with any Oribe hair product to create your very own potent concoction of hair-strengthening goodness that you'll never want to be without again.
how_to_use: Mix 3-5 drops with any Oribe product in the palm of your hand to give your regular routine a boost. To use alone, apply to damp hair.

name: Briogeo Curl Charisma Rice Amino and Avocado Hydrating Shampoo Jumbo 1000ml Briogeo Curl Charisma Rice Amino and Avocado Hydrating Shampoo Jumbo 1000ml
description: Formulated with clever, naturally-derived cleansers that remove dirt and build up without stripping curls of much-needed moisture, Briogeo's Curl Charisma Rice Amino + Avocado Hydrating Shampoo is a game-changing must-have for all those with coiling curls, wild waves and formidable frizz. Ultra-hydrating shea butter and avocado oil increase hair's softness and enhance the body of curls without weighing them down. Meanwhile, rice amino acids penetrate the hair shaft to effectively lock out frizz-causing environmental moisture, while tomato fruit ferment seals the cuticle to ensure that hair dries consistently, allowing for uniform curl formation.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair and massage vigorously for about 30 seconds as the lather builds, then rinse. If your hair has extra build-up, rinse and repeat. For best results, follow with Curl Charisma Rice Amino + Shea Curl Defining Conditioner. Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. For external use only.

name: Drybar The Bouncer Diffuser Drybar The Bouncer Diffuser
description: So, you've got your eye on the happy-hued powers of the Buttercup Blow-Dryer, but your curly tresses need a little more TLC... look no further than the Bouncer Diffuser to care for your curls! If you're a curl connoisseur or wondering why your curls don't stay in line after your blowout, then chances are you need this blow-dryer partner in your life. Brightly coloured and created to perfectly fit your Buttercup Blow-Dryer, Baby Buttercup (P.S. and most other blow-dryers too!) this diffuser broadens and reduces the speed of airflow as you dry to offer a gentle breeze that defines your curls and keeps frizz at bay. Simply attach to the nozzle of your blow-dryer and, using a low or medium heat, work slowly up from the ends to the roots of your strands in large, scooped sections. It's time to let your curls do all the talking.
how_to_use: Attach to the nozzle of your blow-dryer and adjust the temperature setting to low or medium. Start at the ends. Gently scoop large amounts of hair into the diffuser, allowing the natural curls to form. Work slowly up to the root, gently massaging your hair in a circular motion with the diffuser's "fingers." Hold each section in place for several seconds before moving on to the next section. Continue until the hair is dry. TIP: Tilt your head so you can "dip" your hair into the diffuser.

name: Aveda Scalp Solutions Replenishing Conditioner 200ml Aveda Scalp Solutions Replenishing Conditioner 200ml
description: Introducing the Scalp Solutions Replenishing Conditioner, your new wash day essential set to restore out-of-whack scalps and reveal silky soft strands. Available in a full size 200ml and travel-friendly 40ml, this conditioner is a must-add to your wash day rituals. The skinification of hair is here to stay, and Aveda’s problem-solving Scalp Solutions range has everything you need to restore harmony and reset your scalp. Cloak your strands and your scalp in this ultra-nourishing conditioner that works to boost scalp hydration by up to 92%! Enriched with moringa and sunflower seed oils, this thirst-quenching wash day essential has been carefully formulated to be kind to your scalp and reveal beautifully healthy hair. A salon-worthy shine is incoming in three, two, one...
how_to_use: After shampooing with scalp solutions balancing shampoo massage into hair and scalp. Rinse well. Use daily or as often as needed.
ingredient: Water\Aqua\Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Distearyldimonium Chloride, Orbignya Oleifera (Babassu) Seed Oil, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Andrographis Paniculata Extract, Centella Asiatica (Hydrocotyl) Extract, Lactobacillus Ferment, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Arginine, Zinc Pca, Lactic Acid, Tocopherol, Propanediol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Fragrance (Parfum), Linalool, Limonene, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Benzyl Salicylate, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.

name: Philip Kingsley Density Preserving Scalp Drops 85ml Philip Kingsley Density Preserving Scalp Drops 85ml
description: Hello… is it volume you’re looking for? Conservation is the name of the game with Philip Kingsley’s new Density Preserving Scalp Drops — formulated to help slow hair loss with continued use. Trust in the science of Trichology and let the hair and scalp specialists at Philip Kingsley restore volume and health back to even the finest of strands. This innovative combination of actives comes together to help prolong your hair’s lifecycle through a biomimetic peptide blend and saw palmetto: two vital ingredients that may not only help slow hair loss but also improve hair density and quality over time. Follicle health is cared for and excess oil reduced thanks to a complex of azelaic acid, zinc PCA and pyridoxine HCL. Let the invigorating sensation of a menthyl-derived stimulant give an instant boost to your strands, as well as a long-lasting and somewhat satisfying cooling effect. When used for three continuous months these scalp-loving drops can protect your hair density and quality over time to leave you with a fuller-looking mane that boasts an enviable *swish*.
how_to_use: Apply 2.5ml (5 x 0.5ml pipettes) daily to freshly washed hair (or dry hair if you are not able to wash hair daily). Tilt your head back and apply using the pipette, over the whole top area of your scalp, including your front hairline, the centre areas and the crown. Massage over your scalp gently. A cooling, tingling sensation can be expected. Blow-dry or style as usual.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Polysorbate 20, Butylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Menthol, Menthyl Lactate, Azelaic Acid, Disodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Piroctone Olamine, Pyridoxine HCL, Zinc PCA, Sodium Hydroxide, Dehydroacetic Acid, Caffeine, Glycerin, Dextran, Serenoa Serrulata Fruit Extract, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-3, Trifolium Pratense (Clover) Flower Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate.

name: Aveda Be Curly Style-Prep 100ml Aveda Be Curly Style-Prep 100ml
description: Part of Aveda's Be Curly range, this Be Curly Style Prep adds much-needed moisture back into dry curls while helping to define curls and coils too. Aveda's Be Curly Style Prep adds moisture and curl definition as it seals the cuticle, taming frizz all day. Perfect for smoothing out tangles, this reduces breakage from combing and also makes styling curls easier, helping to maintain them longer while leaving hair soft and never crunchy. Combine it with the brand's Be Curly Curl Enhancer to boost the effects of both treatments too!
how_to_use: Apply daily after be curly™ shampoo and conditioner to prepare your hair for styling and protect from frizz. Work a small amount of product in hands, apply evenly through damp hair and comb to distribute. Do not rinse out. Style with be curly™ curl enhancer to intensify curl, fight frizz and boost shine. To reactivate curls on non-shampoo days, simply dampen your hair and apply. Comb through to distribute evenly-then style. Air-dry or blow-dry with a diffuser. RECYCLE IT: 100% post-consumer HDPE bottle. Please recycle.
ingredient: Water\Aqua\Eau , Vp/Va Copolymer , Glycerin , Propanediol , C14-22 Alcohols , Caprylyl Glycol , Decyl Glucoside , Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein , Adansonia Digitata Seed Oil , Orbignya Oleifera (Babassu) Seed Oil , Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice , Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride , Laurtrimonium Chloride , Glyceryl Stearate , Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil , Peg-100 Stearate , C12-20 Alkyl Glucoside , Hydroxyethylcellulose , Polyquaternium-4 , Maltodextrin , Fragrance (Parfum) , Eugenol , Linalool , Citronellol , Citral , Limonene , Geraniol , Potassium Sorbate , Phenoxyethanol

name: Oribe Serene Scalp Balancing Conditioner 6.8 fl. oz. Oribe Serene Scalp Balancing Conditioner 6.8 fl. oz.
description: Ideal for tresses in a tizz, the Serene Scalp Balancing Conditioner works to balance, deeply hydrate and soothe the scalp using acacia tree extract while giving troublesome dandruff flakes the boot. Ultra-nourishing, this conditioner encourages a happy equilibrium atop your scalp while quenching thirsty strands with shea butter and unwinding tangles for soft, silky, more manageable hair. Oribé’s Signature Complex feeds hair with watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower to defend against oxidative and environmental stress alongside the deterioration of natural keratin. Biotin and quinoa strengthen the hair cuticle, prevent breakage and revitalise brittle strands, while caffeine stimulates the scalp and rejuvenates hair follicles. Expect gorgeous shine via lightweight olive oil with restored levels of elasticity as the super sweet, Insta-worthy packaging adds a pretty, pastel touch to your shower-side décor.
how_to_use: Massage, indulge (for at least one minute), rinse.

name: NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Smooth Shampoo NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Smooth Shampoo
description: NatureLab TOKYOs Perfect Smooth Shampoo goes right to the root of the frizz problem. Nourishing your scalp and strands with a deeply moisturising blend, this dryness-defeating shampoo is a must for mane management. The ultra-softening blend of argan, baobab and marula oils helps to smooth frizzy follicles, while yuzu ceramides detangling action makes worn-out hair all the more manageable. Protein- and mineral-rich quinoa is a source of all eight essential amino acids which makes it perfectly suited to repairing and strengthening your strands. Encouraging hair renewal at a cellular level, argan stem cells stimulate the follicles of your lengths to promote growth and improved quality. Smelling as good as it does, this formula has a warm and fresh scent profile that is inspired by freshly peeled Japanese yuzu (y-u-m). Need a final nudge? After 30 day clinical study, 83% of users saw an improvement in frizz reduction and hair smoothness! Want to top up your bottle without getting another bottle? You can now invest in refills; double the portion of a bottle but with 85% less plastic than two full-size bottles, these eco-friendly pouches are as good for the earth as they are your purse.
how_to_use: No points for guessing this one - wash and rinse your way to smoothness.

name: Hair By Sam McKnight Light Nourish Conditioner 200ml Hair By Sam McKnight Light Nourish Conditioner 200ml
description: Rinse it out or leave it in, this versatile conditioning formula works to reduce frizz and improve manageability. The ultimate wash day and hair care essential. No, you're not seeing double... Sam McKnight's Light Nourish Conditioner can be used as part of your wash day ritual and as a daily hair care treatment to improve the condition of your strands. Packed with amino acids; honeysuckle, chamomilla and velvet flower extracts make tangled hair a thing of the past thanks to their conditioning powers. Active polymers derived from hydrolysed corn starch take stressed out strands from frizz-ridden to smooth and sleek in one nourishing sweep. Of course, no Sam McKnight creation would be complete without a final flourish of his signature botanical fine fragrance to ensure your hair looks and smells as chic as can be.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair, gently comb through and rise. Use daily or as a leave-in conditioner for extra care.

name: Davines LOVE Curl Cleansing Cream 500ml Davines LOVE Curl Cleansing Cream 500ml
description: Davines has taken the fear out of the all-in-one hair treatment and given it a luxe makeover in this curl taming cleansing cream. Introducing the new and even more effective extract of noto almond, a Slow Food Presidia to ensure native fruits and foods are cared for, this gives curly and coiled hair an intense dose of moisture that counteracts persistent dryness. Removing impurities and softening hair is the name of the game with this light cleansing cream, and even better, there’s no need to condition afterwards. Simply slot this into your hair care cycle, and alternate every third wash with your favourite curly shampoo and conditioner for a strand-softening reset. Rich in proteins, magnesium, copper and phosphorus this leaves curls elasticised and volumised without the frizz, and did we mention silky-soft to the touch too?
how_to_use: Apply a generous amount of product to damp hair, gently massaging in. Leave on for 5 minutes, then rinse. Applying conditioner is not necessary. Every third shampoo, alternate using LOVE/Curl Shampoo and Conditioner or Hair Mask.

name: VIRTUE Smooth Conditioner 200ml VIRTUE Smooth Conditioner 200ml
description: Fancy a conditioner that rebuilds damage with every use? Us too! Enter, Virtue’s Smooth Conditioner, a game-changing way to care for your (increasingly) magnificent mane. A true innovation in hair care, Virtue’s advanced formulations are enriched with Alpha Keratin 60ku, a whole, human keratin born from regenerative medicine. Since this is identical to the keratin in your hair, the protein is instantly recognised, binding directly to areas of damage and filling them – not just coating strands or weighing them down. This Smooth Conditioner also refines and de-frizzes strand by strand, sealing in moisture and shine. Alongside the advanced keratin, the formula is enriched with pink pomelo (rich in vitamins A, C, B1 and zinc), phospholipids – derived from natural soybeans – to help fight frizz and protect against humidity and moisturising shea butter. name: Aveda Damage Remedy Daily Hair Repair 100ml Aveda Damage Remedy Daily Hair Repair 100ml
description: Classed as a hair necessity by all who try it, Aveda's Damage Remedy Daily Hair Repair is an ultra-restorative, leave-in treatment that delivers instant protection against the ravages of heat styling as well as detangling and dramatically improving the appearance of damage. We know air-drying is all the rage but it's not always realistic (who has the time or can bear the cold?), and Aveda has the answer for all those who are unwilling to relinquish their heat styling rituals. Enter the Damage Remedy Daily Hair Repair: a 98% naturally derived formula that was crowned the winner of Byrdie's 2020 Eco Award for Best Leave-In Conditioner - no mean feat! It's no wonder since it's been seen to reduce breakage by 90% in just one week, when used daily in a repeat grooming study vs non-conditioning shampoo. It's formulated with nourishing soy, quinoa protein to encourage stronger, longer hair, and conditioning macadamia oil to help smooth the surface of your strands. What's more, it boasts Aveda's own pure-fume aroma of certified organic bergamot, mandarin, ylang ylang and other pure flower and plant essences that leave your tresses divinely scented. Just when we thought we couldn't love it any more, this product is manufactured with 100% wind power through renewable energy credits and carbon offsets - as all Aveda products are(!) - so you can feel good about your strand investment.

description: Your one-way ticket to 'I woke up like this' hair each morning, the Satin Sleep XL Adjustable Bonnet will envelop your strands in Kitsch's finest satin. Passion fruit seed oil intensely hydrates to replenish hair’s natural moisture, while acai fruit oil (rich in essential fatty acids such as omegas 3, 6 and 9) smooths strands and enhances shine. Perfect as a blow-dry lotion, light texturiser or finishing balm, this can be used on wet or dry hair – it’s formulated without parabens or sulphates and is vegan and cruelty-free, plus the opulent navy bottle is a beautiful addition to any hair care collection.

name: Olaplex The Anti-Damage Duo - No.3 & No.9 Olaplex The Anti-Damage Duo - No.3 & No.9
description: Brimming with OLAPLEX’s superstar bond repairing ingredient bis-aminopropyl diglycol dimaleate, The Anti Damage Duo unites the beloved No.3 Hair Perfector and all new No. 9 Bond Protector Nourishing Hair Serum with the promise to deliver a stronger, shinier and healthier mane. The first step in this two-part bundle is the No.3 Hair Perfector. A brand bestseller for good reason, this once-a-week treatment seeks out broken bonds in the hair (which are caused by chemical, thermal and mechanical damage) and repairs them, restoring compromised hair to former glory in the process. Use overnight for maximum results, or as a quick 10-minute pre-wash treatment. For post-wash, look to the second step here: the No.9 Bond Protector Nourishing Hair Serum (that’s the newest addition to the OLAPLEX clan!). Packed with antioxidants to neutralise free radicals, this leave-in serum acts as a shield against pollution, guarding your hair from breakage and protecting against heat styling. Alongside this, the lightweight formula will envelop locks in softness and shine, making it easier to detangle and style too.
how_to_use: No.3 Hair Perfector: Apply to damp hair, combing through, and leave on for a minimum of 10 minutes before washing as normal, or leave on overnight. No.9 Bond Protector Nourishing Hair Serum: Apply a small amount to damp, towel-dried hair working upward from ends to roots. Use more as needed for longer, thicker hair. Air-dry for a soft texture. Blow-dry for a smooth finish. Diffuse for waves or curls. Apply sparingly to dry hair for frizz and static control and added shine.

But it doesn't stop there, this hero protect also lightly moisturises, controls frizz, seals in moisture, and holds the definition of curls for a long-lasting style. Penetrating deeply, this conditioner intensely moisturises, nourishing and repairing damage, detangling and preventing frizz. A rich blend of shea butter, illipe butter and olive oil swiftly softens and smooths, while Mirabelle plum seed oil provides sheer, weightless shine. Rice protein strengthens and protects hair fibres, keratin protein creates a sheer protein shield that protects from environmental damage and hydrolysed vegetable protein penetrates the hair shaft to increase moisture content and strengthen. Use it several times a week or daily for trickier tresses the opulent emerald green tube will be a super-chic addition to your bathroom shelf.

name: Hair By Sam McKnight Deeper Love Intense Treatment Mask 200ml Hair By Sam McKnight Deeper Love Intense Treatment Mask 200ml
description: Is your mane calling out for a little tender loving care? Treat your tresses to the newest launch from the genius mind that is Sam McKnight and introduce the Deep Love Intense Treatment Mask to your hair care ritual. Intensely nourishing, this hydration mask restores dull and lacklustre hair to its former glory. Brimming with shea butter and ‘RepHair’ to soften stressed-out strands and bring back the much-coveted lustre you’ve been lacking, this 5-minute mask is the perfect excuse to indulge in self care moment. Catering for damaged strands, an infusion of plant keratin gives your hair the love and attention it deserves and is sure to leave you with that ‘just-left-the-salon-’ swish. With a 50ml and long-lasting 200ml to choose from, you’d need never be without the ‘love’ of your hair’s life…

name: Sachajuan Scalp Conditioner 100ml Sachajuan Scalp Conditioner 100ml
description: Increasingly, we’re noticing a movement towards the ‘skinification of hair’, as more and more of us begin to treat our tresses with the same care and attention that we afford our face. This starts with taking care of your scalp – Sachajuan’s ocean silk-infused Scalp Conditioner is the perfect way to start doing so. The stars of the show are a double act of anti-fungal piroctone olamine and climbazole which, according to the Australasian College of Dermatologists, are less toxic than regular flake-fighting ingredients. The addition of rosemary oil, menthol, salicyclic acid and ginger extracts then combine to soothe and nourish irritated, scale-prone scalps. If you suffer from an itchy scalp or dandruff and don't want to load your hair up with chemicals, this conditioner, used after Sachajuan’s Scalp Shampoo, is the perfect antidote.

name: BREAD BEAUTY SUPPLY hair-mask: creamy deep conditioner BREAD BEAUTY SUPPLY hair-mask: creamy deep conditioner
description: Whether you shampoo, 'low-poo' or co-wash, it's always a good idea to recharge your moisture levels with a generous helping of BREAD BEAUTY SUPPLY'S hair-mask: creamy deep conditioner. Made with curly, textured and dry hair in mind, this velvety emulsion packs a powerful (and yet lightweight!) punch of hydration! Adored for achieving a finish of cloud-like softness, this moisturising emulsion is powered by superfruit extracts, including Australian Kakadu plum and starflower oil, to leave your curls soft, hydrated and buttery smooth without feeling weighed down. What's so super about those oils? The potent Kakadu plum contains the highest concentration of vitamin C than any other fruit - it even boasts 50 times more than an orange! It doesn't end there, it's also a moisturising powerhouse that lends a hand in the maintenance of collagen and elastin levels in your scalp and hair to keep them soft and supple. As for starflower oil - otherwise known as borage oil - it possesses more gamma-linoleic acid than any other seed oil and helps to strengthen your hair follicle to prevent hair from breaking and shedding. The results? Curls that feel cushioned in moisture!

name: Kitsch Satin Sleep Cap - Black Kitsch Satin Sleep Cap - Black
description: Your one-way ticket to ‘I woke up like this’ hair each morning, the Satin Sleep Cap will envelop your strands in Kitsch’s finest satin. This is no ordinary sleep cap — it’s coated in Kitsch’s luxurious satin, which is known for its gentleness and ability to prevent hair damage. Incredibly comfortable, it allows you to say “bye” to bedhead and frizz, giving you total protection against friction with its unique charmeuse construction. Sealing in moisture when used alongside your favourite leave-in conditioner, this luxurious piece of kit encourages growth and banishes night-time breakage, though it would look chic during the daytime too – there are no rules when it comes to keeping your hair friction-free!

name: Briogeo Farewell Frizz Smoothing Conditioner Briogeo Farewell Frizz Smoothing Conditioner
description: Infused with Briogeo’s signature blend of ultra-nourishing rosehip, argan and coconut oils, Rosarco Repair Conditioner swiftly restores silky sheen to dry, brittle and lacklustre locks. Coconut oil penetrates the hair shaft to nourish and repair from the inside out, sealing the uplifted cuticle to lock in moisture and reduce environmental impurities. Argan oil provides further conditioning to fight frizz, while antioxidant-rich rosehip oil shields strands from the damage wrought by UV rays and free radicals. Perfect for those with damaged, chemically-treated hair, this conditioner protects against future breakage and colour fade, so you can rest assured that your locks will continue to look luscious.

For best results, finish with Rosarco Milk™ Reparative Leave-In Conditioning Spray and/or Rosarco Oil™ prior to blow drying or using heat tools. Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. For external use only.

name: Living Proof No Frizz Shampoo 236ml Living Proof No Frizz Shampoo 236ml
description: Living Proof’s No Frizz Shampoo has a rich, nourishing formula that lathers beautifully to eliminate product build-up, dirt and residue, whilst the brand’s patented ‘Healthy Hair Molecule’ (OFPMA) works to weightlessly block humidity. Hair is left feeling squeakily clean but not stripped, with an enviably glossy lustre and dramatically improved manageability. What’s more, OFPMA helps repel environmental grime, allowing you to wash your hair less often (a godsend if your hair is coloured or chemically treated). Painstakingly developed with never-before-used hair care ingredients and technologies, Living Proof abandoned the usual hair care ‘recipes’, choosing instead to approach aesthetics from pharmaceutical, medical and biotech perspectives – with consistent advice and consultation from some of the world’s greatest stylists and industry veterans. The outcome? The happy fact that A-List-worthy hair now comes in bottles.

name: Kitsch Satin-Wrapped Microfiber Hair Towel - Aura Kitsch Satin-Wrapped Microfiber Hair Towel - Aura
description: Don’t undo your wash day efforts by taking a run of the mill towel to wet hair, instead, use this soft hair towel that quickly dries hair with its microfibre material whilst taming frizz. Satin-wrapped to protect hair from breakage, this multi-tasking towel in an array of plush shades is a simple yet effective way to upgrade your hair care routine. Thanks to the incredibly absorbent microfibre layer, you can dry your tresses in half the time and it works wonders for dry hair that needs a little help in retaining moisture and natural oils. Don’t skimp on this simple yet game-changing step to healthy hair!
how_to_use: Flip head over, letting hair fall toward the ground. Place towel with button at nape of neck. Wrap towel around hair, twisting tightly downward from forehead. Flip head up and fasten elastic loop to button at nape of neck.

name: Philip Kingsley Vitamin C Jelly Detoxifying Hair and Scalp Treatment 5g Philip Kingsley Vitamin C Jelly Detoxifying Hair and Scalp Treatment 5g
description: The Vitamin C Jelly Detoxifying Hair and Scalp Treatment is – not to sound dramatic – like nothing you’ve ever tried before. The texture is a unique powder to jelly, which – stay with us here – actually helps you to get the most out of your vitamin C. Allow us to explain… Vitamin C is an unstable molecule that oxidises on exposure to light, air and heat, which instantly reduces its efficacy, rendering it pointless. This is common in liquid formulas, which is why Philip Kingsley has made this pre-shampoo treatment in powder form – thus removing any instability and making the vitamin much more potent. Impurities on the scalp can accrue with exposure to city pollution, hard water and product build-up, leaving your hair limp and lacklustre. Vitamin C’s acidity helps to remove these impurities – deeply cleansing residue and restoring radiance. Being a strong antioxidant, it also protects your scalp from free radicals – neutralising them and aiding in skin’s natural healing process to allow later treatments to work more effectively. Also starring naturally derived amino acids and vitamin B5 (AKA panthenol) this sensational formula even provides lasting moisture, conditions, thickens and helps to prevent damage.
how_to_use: Before shampooing, thoroughly wet the hair and scalp. Empty one sachet into the applicator bottle and fill with 60ml of warm water (to the measured mark). Shake for 30 seconds to activate the formula, until a light jelly forms. Apply the jelly directly from the bottle to the hair and scalp and work in with fingertips. Ensure all hair is covered. Use all of the jelly and dispose of any which is not used. Thoroughly rinse out the bottle and keep for your next treatment. Leave on for 5 minutes and then rinse thoroughly. Follow with shampoo and conditioner as normal. Use once every 2-3 weeks to remove all impurities. Do not use for the first 3 washes after having hair colour treated.
ingredient: Panthenol, Ascorbic Acid, Betaine, Xanthan Gum, Disodium EDTA, Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Linalool, Hydroxycitronellal.

name: Pattern Jojoba Oil Blend Serum 115.3ml Pattern Jojoba Oil Blend Serum 115.3ml
description: Show some love for your scalp as much as your strands with the Jojoba Oil Blend serum. Lightweight and residue-free, this heavenly serum reduces itchiness, flaking, and feels so luxe, you won't be able to stop yourself from getting all up in there. As with all PATTERN hair care, the Jojoba Oil Blend is free of SLS/SLES, parabens, formaldehyde... the list goes on. But what it has got is a beautiful blend of safflower oil, jojoba oil, rosehip oil, olive oil & lavender oil that penetrates even the porest of strands with moisture. Not only that, this rich blend works perfectly on its own or can be infused with your other products – either way, it promises to protect hair and maintain elasticity, so you can let your curls live their best bounciest life.
how_to_use: A little goes a long way! Apply a few drops to the palm of your hand & work the oil evenly into your hair. Can be used on wet or dry hair for added moisture either on its own or cocktailed together with other PATTERN products. As a scalp treatment, apply a few drops to targeted areas around your head. Massage oil into scalp.

description: Formulated with clever, naturally-derived cleansers that remove dirt and build up without stripping curls of much-needed moisture, Briogeo's Curl Charisma Rice Amino + Avocado Hydrating Shampoo is a game-changing must-have for all those with coiling curls, wild waves and formidable frizz. Ultra-hydrating shea butter and avocado oil increase hair's softness and enhance the body of curls without weighing them down. Meanwhile, rice amino acids penetrate the hair shaft to effectively lock out frizz-causing environmental moisture, while tomato fruit ferment seals the cuticle to ensure that hair dries consistently, allowing for uniform curl formation.

description: Your curls, defined — that’s the end goal of Pacifica’s Pineapple Swirl Curl Defining Cream. name: Philip Kingsley Pure Colour Frizz Fighting Gloss 50ml Philip Kingsley Pure Colour Frizz Fighting Gloss 50ml
description: The perfect way to extend your colour between appointments and nourish chemical-treated strands, Philip Kingsley’s Pure Colour Frizz Fighting Gloss grants a beautifully sleek and smooth finish. Designed to supplement your heat-styling routine, this innovative treatment casts an invisible, weightless veil over your hair that delivers mirror-like shine and effectively tames wayward frizz. It boasts incredible heat protection up to 190°C, as well as fending against UV damage and free radicals in order to maintain the vibrancy of your colour. The formula is infused with a lightweight blend of silicones – that won’t build up on your hair - to protect and condition for a high-shine finish. What's more, phytantriol encourages suppleness and sheen as it improves the texture of damaged, chemical-treated hair and boosts moisture retention. We'll take three, please!

name: invisibobble ORIGINAL Value Pack (8pc) invisibobble ORIGINAL Value Pack (8pc)
description: Whether you’re after extra hold for a mane with a mind of its own, or undetectable slimline styles there’s a set of spirals for every hair type. Thanks to its smooth surface (it absorbs no bacteria or water) this innovation is clean as well as comfortable. What’s more, it provides impressive hold for all kinds of updos, requiring fewer hair pins than when using traditional hair ties. For fine hair that craves high wearing comfort without effort or drama — the superb Extra Slim pack is nearly undetectable with a gentle grip but no less hardworking. Thicker hair from curls to coils — opt for the ultra powerful Extra Hold pack to provide even more grip for your tresses. Ideal for use during workouts, or to secure the most magnificent of lion’s manes that can’t be tamed by smaller sized ties. Last, but certainly not least, the Original pack caters for all with a strong and comfortable fit without leaving a trace. With three colourways in each set the world is your hair… or at least your hair is anyway, so throw up your hair and go about your day without worrying about snagging ties that snap and fray.

ingredient: Polyurethane.

name: Amika Water Sign Hydrating Hair Oil Amika Water Sign Hydrating Hair Oil
description: Opening the floodgates for frizz-free hydration, the Water Sign Hydrating Hair Oil unlocks mirror-like shine that'll have everyone asking for hair-oic secret... Powered by eight (yes - eight!) strand-saving oils starring mango seed butter, sweet almond oil, squalane and hyaluronic acid, this potent blend is a magnet for up to three times more hydration and instantly tames flyaways by almost 70% for 24 hours! Perfect for all hair types from sleek and straight to tight coils and curls, this oil-rich formula is both lightweight and nourishing beyond compare.
how_to_use: For fine to medium hair, use 1-2 pumps. For medium to thick hair, use 2-3 pumps. For thick or coarse hair, use 3-4 pumps. Remember, a little goes a long way! Drop oil into palms and rub hands together, coating both front and back to evenly disperse. Run your fingers through damp or dry hair from mid-lengths to ends. For damaged and colour-treated hair, apply to damp strands before heat styling to protect and reduce breakage. For braids, apply directly onto the scalp and throughout damp hair. Apply more as needed. Tame flyaways with any excess oil. Too much too soon? Apply Perk up Plus Extended Clean Dry Shampoo to absorb any excess oil.

name: Philip Kingsley Pure Blonde Booster Mask 75ml Philip Kingsley Pure Blonde Booster Mask 75ml
description: Working double duty to correct colour that’s gone astray and strengthen chemical-treated strands, the Pure Blonde Booster Mask will help take brassy tones to radiant blondes in ten minutes or less. Suitable for all textures – from fine to coarse – this weekly treatment is designed to neutralise brassiness and deeply condition overworked lengths. Starring the optimal balance of violet micro-pigments to neutralise warmth and keep platinum manes looking fresh-from-the-salon, this nourishing blend also stars keratin and panthenol to hep fortify your hair against breakage: smoothing and moisturising each strand to enhance elasticity and flexibility while easing frizz and granting enviable shine. And now this blonde-boosting superhero comes in a handy travel size (75ml) — because nobody wants to be worrying about brassy, thirsty hair when they should be laying about by the pool.
how_to_use: After shampooing, gently work through the hair, avoiding the scalp. Leave for up to 3 minutes if hair is bleached, up to 5 minutes if hair is dyed, and up to 10 minutes if hair is naturally blonde. Rinse thoroughly. Use once per week. These timings are a guide only and should be halved for first use. All hair will react differently so test a small section of your lightest hair before first use. Wait at least two weeks after having hair coloured, bleached or permed before using.

name: VIRTUE CORRECT Healing Oil 20ml VIRTUE CORRECT Healing Oil 20ml
description: Available in 20ml and 50ml sizes, the Healing Oil infuses dry and damaged lengths with an impressive dose of shine-giving moisture, calling upon a nourishing blend of proteins and oils to protect and restore your hair. Formulated with Alpha Keratin 60ku, a whole- human keratin born from regenerative medicine - this restorative formula binds directly to areas of damage and fills them. What’s more, there’s a nourishing blend of Tahitian tiare flower (to help remedy weak and damaged strands) and antioxidant-rich Kalahari melon seed oil to protect against environmental aggressors while imparting lasting hydration. The luscious oil has a delicious tropical scent with notes of creamy coconut, yuzu extract and woody undertones that linger subtly on your tresses after use. The results? Seriously soft, healthy-looking hair with an unrivalled shine.

A true innovation in hair care, Virtue’s advanced formulations are enriched with Alpha Keratin 60ku, a whole, human keratin born from regenerative medicine. Since it is identical to the keratin in your hair, the protein is instantly recognised, binding directly to areas of damage and filling them – not just coating strands or weighing them down. This Full Conditioner also creates enviable volume, deeply moisturising without adding weight and creating lasting lift, body and lustre. Alongside the advanced keratin, the formula is enriched with pink pomelo (rich in vitamins A, C, B1 and zinc), moisture and shine-boosting hydrolysed quinoa and artichoke leaf, loaded with lipids and protein to help seal and strengthen your hair’s cuticle. Ideal for fine, flat hair that won’t hold, this luscious shampoo is scented with a revitalising citrus blend of flowers and greens, including stimulating spearmint leaf oil and bright lemon essential oil. Powered by ground-breaking keratin proteins, the Flourish range works to cleanse, purify and enrich your scalp, creating the foundation for new growth. As each new strand emerges, it’s supplied with the nourishment needed to stay strong and resist breakage. As well as the brand’s world-worshipped Alpha Keratin 60ku complex that binds directly to areas of damage and fills them, this formula is also enriched with sodium hyaluronate and red algae extract; this cocktail provides lightweight hydration and a sheer ‘moisture shield’ to thicken your hair and keep the fibres supple. When the shampoo and conditioner are used alongside the Flourish Density Booster, the regimen has seen impressive results. After six months of use, 90% of women in an independent third party test said their hair feels healthier; 90% said they have more volume and 83% said they saw less fall-out. We like those numbers!

name: Briogeo Scalp Revival Soothe + Detoxify Minis Hair Kit Briogeo Scalp Revival Soothe + Detoxify Minis Hair Kit
description: Uniting four of Briogeo's Scalp Revival heroes, this kit of deluxe minis help nourish, soothe, and hydrate an itchy, irritated, and flaky scalp. Uniting the brand's award-winning Charcoal + Coconut Oil Micro-Exfoliating Shampoo, Charcoal + Tea Tree Cooling Hydration Scalp Mask, Charcoal + Tea Tree Scalp Treatment and Charcoal + Biotin Dry Shampoo, this Scalp Revival Soothe + Detoxify Minis Hair Kit removes deep rooted impurities with this award-winning, charcoal-based scalp treatment collection that detoxifies, nurtures, and soothes a dry, flaky, itchy or oily scalp. Perfect for those with a dry, irritated, flaky and/or oily scalp, this set will help lift away impurities and buildup on the scalp, restore vital scalp hydration and restore scalp hydration and absorb excess oils.
how_to_use: Scalp Revival™ Charcoal + Coconut Oil Micro-Exfoliating Scalp Scrub Shampoo: Part wet hair, massage into the scalp, then rinse clean. Use once per week or every other week. Hydration is important after exfoliation; apply Scalp Revival™ Charcoal + Tea Tree Cooling Hydration Scalp Mask to scalp after treatment. For best results, apply your favorite Briogeo™ deep conditioning mask or conditioner from mid-lengths to ends after cleansing. Scalp Revival™Charcoal + Tea Tree Cooling Hydration Scalp Mask: For best results, use in the shower after exfoliating with Scalp Revival™ Charcoal + Coconut Oil Micro-Exfoliating Shampoo. Apply directly to the scalp and massage it in. Leave on for up to 10 minutes. Rinse out thoroughly and condition the hair as normal with your preferred Briogeo™ deep conditioning hair mask or conditioner. Scalp Revival™ Charcoal + Tea Tree Scalp Treatment: Part clean and conditioned damp hair into sections; apply 1-2 drops to each partition. Massage into the scalp; do not rinse out. name: NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Shine Conditioner NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Shine Conditioner
description: A restorative post-cleansing treatment for lacklustre locks, NatureLab TOKYOs Perfect Shine Conditioner bestows weightless, mirror-like gloss to dulled hair thanks to platinum fibres and precious pearl extracts. Brimming with antioxidant-rich grape extracts key to protecting the scalp by reducing the cell-damage wrought by free radicals alongside pearl extract (it boosts hairs own enzymes to grant an iridescent finish) and platinum fibre (which wraps every shaft with a weightless, naturally reflective veil that ensures a phenomenal, mirror-like shine), this silky conditioner swiftly resuscitates limp, lifeless locks. With a delicate perfume of violet and almond, as well as strand-plumping hyaluronic acid (it absorbs up to 1000 times its own weight in water), this super-charged blend is a boon for all those with bleached, coloured of chemically-treated tresses protecting your mane to help widen the gap between salon appointments. Sulphate-, paraben- and cruelty-free, and made with sustainably sourced ingredients not to mention the minimum packaging say Hello! to great hair and a squeaky-clean conscience. Want to top up your bottle without getting another bottle? You can now invest in refills; double the portion of a bottle but with 85% less plastic than two full-size bottles, these eco-friendly pouches are as good for the earth as they are your purse.
how_to_use: Use after Perfect Shine Shampoo. Apply from roots to ends of damp hair - leave for a minute or two before rinsing.

name: Amika Double Agent 2-in-1 Straightening Blow Dry Brush Amika Double Agent 2-in-1 Straightening Blow Dry Brush
description: Fusing the power of a hairdryer with the smoothing capabilities of a straightener, amika’s Double Agent 2-in-1 Blow Dryer Straightening Brush promises to reduce your styling time (and frizz) with this ergonomically designed tool. The sleek blowout has never been so attainable than with this multitasking tool from amika. Boasting 3 adjustable air/thermal brush settings and far-infrared heat that ensures to lock in moisture and reduce thermal damage, your strands will be left smooth, shiny and ready to take on whatever the day has to throw at you. Fed up with frizzy flyaways ruining your day? The negative ion generator will deliver on shine while banishing frizz. With a maximum temperature of 365f/185c, and flexible outer teeth that provide the perfect grip (without the damage), this hardworking tool will take your hair from just-washed to perfectly coiffed in no time… you can even use this on dry hair to smooth away kinks on second… third… or even fourth-day hair (we don’t judge here!).
how_to_use: Towel or air dry hair so it's damp, not wet. Heat protect and detangle hair. select your setting by twisting handle to the right. Glide brush through hair section by section, making sure you're not applying the bristles directly onto scalp. For a sleeker look, use the 3rd setting until you have desired results. to keep your tool clean, twist bottom handle towards the unlock icon, and pull downwards to release filter. Wipe with a damp cloth.
ingredient: This tool comes complete with a UK plug. 220-240 Volts.

name: NatureLab Tokyo Perfect Clean Dry Shampoo 21g NatureLab Tokyo Perfect Clean Dry Shampoo 21g
description: There are dry shampoos and then there are dry shampoos. This is the latter. Small and purse friendly and not an aerosol, we promise this will fast become the mid-day hair pick-me-up you won't want to be without. Infused with Japanese rice powder, this little hair saviour neutralises the musty scent of your strands, absorbs excess oils and gets your locks looking and smelling as good as the day you washed them. It's not just the rice powder working hard to have your hair looking luscious; the silica in the formula also helps to absorb impurities and the addition of the natural Shiso oil is antimicrobial and deodorises any staleness... Clean, fresh and fabulous hair without any of the work!
how_to_use: Apply to dry hair at roots and massage.

name: Aveda Nutriplenish Daily Moisturizing Treatment 40ml Aveda Nutriplenish Daily Moisturizing Treatment 40ml
description: Part of the Nutriplenish range, Aveda's Nutriplenish Daily Moisturizing Treatment melts moisture into thirsty locks, locking in four times the hydration of untreated hair. Infused with a superfood blend of oils and butters, the creamy leave-in treatment from Aveda is true nourishing decadence for all textures of dry hair. A leave-in you'll come back to time and time again, this instantly hydrates all textures of dry hair thanks to a formula jam-packed with nourishing and shine-boosting mango butter, softening and moisturising coconut oil, omega 5-rich pomegranate seed oil which revitalises brittle strands and finally, sand ginger which provides a natural UV filter, helping to protect hair from the drying effects of the sun. name: Innersense Colour Awakening Hairbath 946ml Innersense Colour Awakening Hairbath 946ml
description: Delivering naturally clean, healthy and vibrant hair without residue, dryness or fading, this Color Awakening Hairbath is a must-have revitalising treatment perfect for coloured hair that is in serious need of a moisture and lustre boost. Inside this hard-working formula you'll find gentle and hair-softening coconut, fatty acid-rich avocado oils and rice bran to effectively cleanse the hair and scalp, leaving your hair feeling deeply refreshed and squeaky clean. Finally, the addition of pumpkin seed oil helps to harmonise and uplift tired locks while also delivering a relaxing and therapeutic experience as the lush formula increases circulation and releases tension and anxiety. Now also available in a huge, value-saving 946ml bottle, you never have to be without this hair hero again.

name: Malin + Goetz Cilantro Hair Conditioner 236ml Malin + Goetz Cilantro Hair Conditioner 236ml
description: MALIN + GOETZ’ Cilantro Hair Conditioner is an intensely hydrating, yet lightweight formula that nourishes your precious locks without weighing them down or irritating sensitive scalps. Enriched with shea butter and easily absorbed fatty acids, it offers moisture, balance and frizz control – perfect for detangling, styling, softening and smoothing. name: Davines OI Hair Butter 75ml Davines OI Hair Butter 75ml
description: Quirkily cool yet results-driven, Davines’s ‘OI’ range is powered by roucou oil (pronounced ru ‘ku) – a ‘secret’ ingredient beloved by native inhabitants of the Amazon rainforest, who rely on the fruits of the ‘Lipstick Tree’ to protect their skin and hair against the sun and other daily stresses. Intensely replenishing, Davines have harnessed the potency of this wonder-extract to create a range of shine-enhancing, moisture-boosting hair care treatments – suitable for all hair types, these exquisite products are perfect for nourishing, smoothing and ‘controlling’ weakened, dry or tempestuous tresses. By combining high-grade natural ingredients with first-rate scientific rigour, Davines’s founders the Bollati family have expanded their Parmese research laboratory into a multi-national hair care business with an inspiring range of original and authentic products, beloved by hosts of discerning celebrities and beauty buffs around the world. Available in two sizes, pick from either 250ml or 75ml for home and away.
how_to_use: Warm product onto the palm of your hand before applying. For medium to thick hair: apply product on towel-dried hair and leave in for 5-10 minutes. Proceed to rinse well. For medium to fine hair: apply on dry hair and leave in for 10 minutes. Proceed to rinse well and shampoo as usual. For an extra nourishing boost: apply both before and after shampooing as noted above.

name: Kitsch Ponyfull Kitsch Ponyfull
description: The ultimate low-maintenance hair hack for a more voluminous-looking ponytail that means you don't need to wake up at 6:30 AM to intricately curl each strand Kitsch's Ponyfull is a covert styling tool that fits into your natural hair to add fullness and height. A savvy and time-saving alternative to extensions, this patent-pending tool slides into your ponytail effortlessly to comfortably create a fuller and thicker-locking ponytail in minutes. Perfect for lengths that look a little limp or to spruce up your strands with minimal effort, simply part your pony and slip this styling essential in between before easily rearranging your hair to ensure no one can see the secret to your voluminous ponytail.
how_to_use: Gather your hair into a ponytail and wrap KITSCH NO SNAG ELASTIC around two to three times depending on hair thickness. Split your ponytail in half horizontally. With your non-dominant hand, hold the to half up above your head. With your dominant hand hold PONYFULL with pick facing downward and the self-gripping material side facing your palm. Gently hook the pick into the centre of the pony pushing downward making a C shape. Elastic should naturally settle around the narrowest groove of PONYFULL. It will instantly expand the elastic and make your ponytail feel tighter. Release the top half of the ponytail down & adjust hair to cover the self-gripping material. This will secure the PONYFULL & keep it from being seen. Adjust PONYFULL to sit comfortably as needed and enjoy the results as PONYFULL instantly thickens and lifts your Ponytail.
ingredient: Silicone 95%, TPU 5%.

name: Philip Kingsley Body Building Weightless Shampoo 75ml Philip Kingsley Body Building Weightless Shampoo 75ml
description: To give your hair maximum volume while gently cleansing, Philip Kingsley’s Body Building Shampoo boosts fine, limp hair with weightless body and bounce. Ideal for flat hair that’s prone to getting oily quickly, the formula plumps each and every strand for thicker, fuller looking hair. It’s enriched with natural cellulose to achieve this plumping, as well as keratin proteins to help strengthen hair and improve its overall volume. Meanwhile, copolymers control flyaway and static and the gentle cleansing action removes excess build-up and product residue. Suitable for daily use and safe for colour-treated hair, the Body Building Shampoo makes fine hair healthier and more manageable. And now this 'oomph'-boosting formula comes in a handy travel size (75ml) too — because nobody fancies flat hair on their holidays.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair Lather well with a gentle kneading of the scalp Rinse and repeat if necessary Follow with the appropriate Philip Kingsley conditioner and scalp toner

name: Hair by Sam McKnight Self Control Gel 150ml Hair by Sam McKnight Self Control Gel 150ml
description: If you're after all-day hold that won't strip or damage your hair, you've come to the right corner of the beautysphere. The Self Control Gel will satisfy your every styling whim. No matter what your hair type or texture, Sam McKnight's water-based styling gel brings you the power to create and set whatever style your heart desires... while still being able to effortlessly wash it out come nightfall. Conditioning honeysuckle and amaranthus seed extracts are combined with panthenol to care for your strands all day and impart an enviable shine. This transparent gel will do everything from smoothing edges to polishing updos, sculpting an editorial-worthy wet look and creating the perfect groomed short style. Direct your mane into place and set with a diffuser to keep your style locked in place from dawn till dusk... well technically, until you wash it out!
how_to_use: Apply required amount onto hands and style in wet or dry hair. To set style in place, blow dry with a diffuser. Super-sleek ponytails or Sculpted chignons: apply one or two pumps into the roots in sections and then brush flat and tight to the head to create a sleek silhouette. description: Made from ultra-water-absorbent microfibre material, Coco & Eve’s Palm Print Headwrap works to dry the hair quickly, minimising blow dry time. The soft hair wrap helps to diminish the look of flyaways and protects your bedsheets from the residue of hair products, such as overnight masques. Designed in the brand’s signature palm leaf print, the wrap provides comfortable wear and a weightless feel.
how_to_use: 1. Hold the Towel Wrap with both hands with the button facing upwards. 2. Tip head and hair forwards and position around the back of the head until the Towel Wrap is fully covering the hair. 3. Gather hair inside the towel wrap and twist the front section several times into a coil. 4. Bring the twist round to the nape of the neck and loop the elastic around the button.

name: Davines This Is A Sea Salt Spray Davines This Is A Sea Salt Spray

With just the right amount of ‘grit’ to give that sexy, tousled texture, this matte mist provides soft and flexible hold without stiffness or stickiness. name: VIRTUE Smooth Shampoo 240ml VIRTUE Smooth Shampoo 240ml
