A true innovation in hair care, Virtue’s advanced formulations are enriched with Alpha Keratin 60ku, a whole, human keratin born from regenerative medicine. Since this is identical to the keratin in your hair, the protein is instantly recognised, binding directly to areas of damage and filling them – not just coating strands or weighing them down. This Smooth Shampoo also refines and de-frizzes strand by strand, sealing in moisture and shine. Alongside the advanced keratin, the formula is enriched with pink pomelo (rich in vitamins A, C, B1 and zinc), phospholipids – derived from natural soybeans – to help fight frizz and protect against humidity and gotu kola, a multi-tasking Indian herb that promotes strength, smoothness and lustre. Ideal for medium-to-thick, hard to manage hair, this nourishing blend is scented with soothing lavender, sweet pear and fresh mint essential oils.

description: Part of the Anti-Hair Fall collection, the Anti-Hair Fall Scalp Serum is the second step in an effective strengthening and nourishing routine to prevent hair breakage and promote all of the volume and thickness. The nourishing leave-in treatment takes a three-pronged approach to keeping hair fall at bay. Firstly, it uses camellia and larch extracts to strengthen strands from the very root, nourishing the follicles and encouraging the growth of thicker, healthier hairs less prone to breakage. Next, it uses pro-vitamin B5 to up the resilience of the hair shaft, offering an 'anti-split end' effect - particularly useful for battling the friction hair experiences courtesy of jumpers, hats, scarves or even just overzealous styling. Finally, to keep your hair in overall great condition, this clever formulation is infused with seriously hydrating cationic hyaluronic acid. A velvety-soft, thick head of hair is within your reach!

Distributed evenly throughout hair as you brush, the oils supply tresses with nutrients for moisturised, repaired, conditioned, smooth, glossy hair. With silky-soft, intelligent IntelliFlex bristles for maximum comfort and minimum snagging, brushing is a quick, easy, painless experience – allowing you to efficiently go about your day knot-free and sans unnecessary hair breakage. Even suitable for use while hair is wet (and at its most vulnerable to snapping from brushing), the Go Green Treatment and Shine brush is surprisingly gentle, making it ideal for all hair types and scenarios.

A 98% naturally derived silken cream that calls upon a decadent medley of plant oils, waxes and butter, this restorative mask works within minutes to reveal visibly healthier, soft, smoother and shinier strands. Plus, the results speak for themselves; according to the brand, 92% of women said their hair instantly looked healthier and less damaged, while 95% of women said their hair instantly felt repaired. Safe for colour-treated and chemically processed hair and best-suited to fine to medium hair types, this lightweight mask is the key to lusciously soft lengths that aren't weighed down!

name: Davines DEDE Hair Mist Davines DEDE Hair Mist
description: A leave-in detangling spray that maintains moisture levels while limiting frizz, Davines’ DEDE Hair Mist remineralises fine, delicate lengths without weighing them down so your hair feels incredibly soft with a beautiful bounce. Boasting mineral-rich red celery extract (it’s packed with fortifying sodium, potassium and calcium), this featherlight formula is great for brittle strands – making it easy to comb through the ‘tats’ without breakage. Sourced from a farm in Orbassano (a town in the Torino region), the red celery used within Davines’ DEDE range – part of their ‘Essential Haircare’ edit – is one of a handful of crops that are lovingly reared by Italian growers; showcasing the brand’s commitment to sustainability, as well as to supporting local industry. On a mission to preserve the planet’s vital biodiversity, each hair care ‘family’ (DEDE, NOUNOU and so on), represents an extract under threat, so by choosing to use this incredibly gentle (and very good-looking!) mist, you’re supporting the globe and its varied inhabitants – from plants to people!
how_to_use: Apply to towel dried hair after using {DEDE Shampoo} and {Conditioner}. Do not rinse off.
ingredient: Aqua / Water / Eau, Amodimethicone, Benzyl Alcohol, Polysorbate 20, Parfum / Fragrance, Sodium Benzoate, Polyquaternium-11, Panthenol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Citric Acid, Trideceth-12, Apium Graveolens Extract / Apium Graveolens (Celeryl) Extract, Cyclopentasiloxane, Hydrolyzed Sweet Almond Protein, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool, Citronellol, Hydroxycitronellal, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Limonene, CI 19140 / Yellow 5, CI 14700 / Red 4.

name: R+Co ON A CLOUD Baobab Oil Repair Masque 5 fl. oz. R+Co ON A CLOUD Baobab Oil Repair Masque 5 fl. oz.
description: For cloud-like softness, the ON A CLOUD Baobab Oil Repair Masque transforms and renews damaged lengths via intense nourishment to restore strength and elasticity to depleted tresses. Reviving lacklustre lengths with vigour, this masque uses baobab oil-protein to rebuild bonds, nourish and repair, while powerful antioxidants vitamins C and E protect against free radical attack. Plant proteins fortify each strand’s inner and outer structure too, while maca extract ensures hair is happily moisturised. Teamed with the brand’s delicious ‘Rosy Eyed’ scent, your hair will feel healthy and leave a tantalising trail of bergamot, wild fig, cyclamen, lotus flower, cedarwood and tonka beans in its wake with every swish.
how_to_use: After shampooing, apply and work through wet hair from roots to ends. Leave-on for five minutes and rinse. On very damaged hair or for deep repair, leave masque for ten minutes and rinse.
